GSP28mimslovu:15: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa vijñānavādānte“ato na vyabhicarati pratyakṣam“iti pratyakṣāvyabhicāritvamupasaṃhṛtya 'anumānaṃ jñātasambandhasye' tyādinānumānalakṣaṇaṃ praṇītam /
GSP28mimslovu:20: tatra pratyakṣāvyabhicāritve pratipādite vyabhicārikaraṇaprabhavatvena tāvad vyabhicāraśaṅkā prayuktā /
GSP28mimslovu:29: anena ca ślokena samarthitārambhāvasara' prapañco viśeṣato vyākhyāsyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:31: nātra naiyāyikādivadalokikaṃ pramāṇānāṃ svarūpamupadarśayituṃ lakṣaṇāni praṇītāni /
GSP28mimslovu:38: tatra na vidma' ko jñātasambandhasamāsārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:39: na tāvata puruṣa' sambandhī samudāyo vā /
GSP28mimslovu:42: nanu buddhisambandhopasthāpita' puruṣa' samudāyidvayākṣipta' samudāyo vā viśeṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:56: ata' kasyaigadeśasyetyākāṅkṣāyāṃ sa evaikadeśo jñātasambandhasyeti viśeṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:59: na hi bhavati puruṣaṃ pratyupasarjanībhutasya rājña' ṛddhasya rājapuraṣa iti viśeṣaṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:62: ka ākāṅkṣitaṃ hi pūraṇasamarthamupasarjanenāpi sambadhyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:67: ata eva hi kasya gurukulamiti vyavahāropapatti' /
GSP28mimslovu:68: tatra hi kulopasarjanasyaiva guro' kasyeti viśeṣaṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:69: api ca darśanakriyākarmaṇo dṛśyasyaikadeśasya prādhānyamaprādhanasya sāpekṣasyāpi padāntareṇa sambandho dṛṣṭa',
GSP28mimslovu:73: uktaṃ hi guruṇaiva-“nopasarjanaṃ padaṃ padāntareṇa samabadhyate ṛddhasya rājapuruṣa itivat“iti /
GSP28mimslovu:79: yattūktam- ākāṅkṣā sambandhe hetu'' iti tadayuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:81: athocyeta ekavākyatāyāmayaṃ doṣa' ekadeśadarśanāda ekadeśāntare buddhiranumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:82: ata' paryavasite vākye kasyaikadeśasyetyākāṅkṣāyāṃ vākyagatamekadeśasyeti padaṃ jñātasambandhasyeti viśeṣyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:91: na ca vāstavaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvamāśritya padāntarasambandho dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:103: naca vāstavaṃ prādhānyamupasarjanasya padāntarasambandhe sāpekṣasamāse vā hetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:104: kasya gurukulamiti nityasāpekṣatvād guruśabdasya nāsāmarthyaṃ doṣa' na hyanantarbhāvya pratisambandhinaṃ gurvartho 'vagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:112: kintu pramātaiva buddhisambandhopasthāpito jñātasambandha iti nirdiśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:114: na hi nama' pinākapāṇaya ityanayapadārthānupādānaṃ doṣāya /
GSP28mimslovu:115: api ca aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātīti bahuvrīhisamāsārtho devatātaddhita' kathamāhṛtyānupātte somarase vartate /
GSP28mimslovu:116: atha somaṃ krīṇāti abhiṣuṇoti pāvayatidhārayā gṛhṇātīti prakaraṇavagata' somaraso 'nyapadārtha ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:118: pūrvapakṣasthitena vārtikakṛtā gamyamānaṃ na viśeṣyata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva durlabhalabdhamivamanvānai' kaiścidvalgitamityupekṣaṇīyameva /
GSP28mimslovu:119: siddhānte hi gamyamānāyā eva vyaktergāvau gāva' śuklo gauriti ca vibhaktyā śabdāntareṇa ca viśeṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:128: yastu vaiyātyād dhūmaśabdenāgniṃ lakṣayitvā tathā prayuyuṅkṣati na taṃ nivārayāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:129: nanvevaṃ pramātari jñātasambandhe sati naikadeśo viśeṣita iti vyāpakakaikadeśadṛśo vyāpyasmṛtiranumānamāpadyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:133: tatra hi jñātasambandhasyaikadeśasyeti ṣaṣṭhyā vyāpya eva sambandhī pratipādyate /
GSP28mimslovu:134: sarvatra hi vyāpya eva hi ṣaṣṭhī dṛṣṭā /
GSP28mimslovu:137: lokaprasiddhameva tvaparīkṣāpratipādanārthaṃ svarūpamanūdyate loke hi niyāmyaikadeśadarśana eva niyāmakaikadeśajñānamanumānamiti prasiddhamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:149: bhavati hi 'vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna tu sandehādalakṣaṇam' iti sūktaṃ pramātā jñātasambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:154: ekadeśau hi naikadeśinamantareṇa syātāmiti ākṣiptasyaikadeśino yuktamanyapadārthatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:157: yadyekatadapi paramparayā vājapeyasya yūpa itivadekadeśino bhavatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:158: ka' punaratraikakadeśī jñātasambandha' pakṣa' sapakṣo vā /
GSP28mimslovu:162: ata' pakṣaikadeśino 'pi sāmānyato dhūmavattaupādhikasambandho jñāta iti sa eva jñātasaṃbandha' /
GSP28mimslovu:168: atra ca pakṣe saṃbandhini gamye gamake caikadeśatā /
GSP28mimslovu:180: kiṃ puna' karmadhārayapakṣe dvayānyapadārthve vā prameyam /
GSP28mimslovu:188: na ca svatantraikadeśadarśanāt svatantraikadeśāntare jñānamanumānaṃ, siddhatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:190: atrābhidhīyate- ayamatrārtho jñātasya sambandhasya jñātasambandhasya vā dvayasya kvacidekadeśadarśanāt tatraivaikadeśāntare buddhiranumānamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:206: kintu agnyādau sati dhūmāderbhāvādasati cābhāvāt tadāyattasvabhāvo dhūmādiriti vidite tadavinābhāva' siddhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:222: kāraṇarasā hi kārye rasamārambhantekāraṇarūpāṇi ca kārye rūpam /
GSP28mimslovu:226: tathāvidhasyaiva kāraṇatvāt pravṛttiśaktinā ca kāraṇena rūpaṃ janyata iti rūpasiddhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:227: tadidamanupapannam yat tāvat kāryaṃ kāraṇena vinā na bhavatīti tatastajjñānamuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:229: kathaṃ hi kāraṇena vinā kāryameva na bhavati ityetadevāvaseyam /
GSP28mimslovu:230: tadvinā bhavato nityaṃ sattvasattvaṃ vā syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:238: yadyevamanyo 'yaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāt svabhāvaniyama' yadanapekṣaṃ tannityaṃ sadasadvā bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:244: nanu nādo rūpasya kāryaṃ nātmeti kathaṃ tadagame hetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:247: tarhi kāryatadātmanorevāvinābhāva' kāraṇe 'pi (bhāvād ? bhavet ) bhavatviti cet /
GSP28mimslovu:253: api tarhi rūpavadrūpakāraṇasahakāriṇā rasakāraṇena raso janyate /
GSP28mimslovu:262: prāgeva tu tannirṇaye vṛthā rūpataddhetvo' sahakāritvakalpanā /
GSP28mimslovu:266: api tarhi rūparasayo' sāhityaniyamāt sahasaiva rasād rūpamanumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:267: api ca kāryakāraṇabhūtayoreva bahulamanumānavyavahāro dṛśyate ityanādṛtyaṃ kāryatvamavyabhacāre /
GSP28mimslovu:269: kiṃ hi vṛkṣātmani śiṃśapātve vidite meyamavaśiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:275: evameva vaiśiṣikādisamayasiddhā api kāryakāraṇabhāvādaya' sambandhaprakārā' prayuktā veditavyā' /
GSP28mimslovu:281: īkṣate khalvayaṃ visphāritākṣa' sahasā mahānase dhūmamagninā sahitam /
GSP28mimslovu:296: api ca nirūpitarūpā api bhāvā deśādibhedeṣvanyathābhavanto 'nūbhūyanta iti na svabhāvaniyamaṃ pratyāśrayitumucitaṃ prāmāṇikānām /
GSP28mimslovu:301: vyāpyasya gamakatvaṃ ca vyāpakaṃ gamyamiṣyate // Msv_5,4.4 //
GSP28mimslovu:302: yo yasya deśakālābhyāṃ samonyūno 'pi vā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:305: na hyanyathā bhavatyeṣā vyāpyavyāpakatā tayo' // Msv_5,4.6 //
GSP28mimslovu:313: yadi jñātasambandhasyānumānaṃ sa tarhi sambandho sambanadhe dvyāśraya ityubhayānu māne liṅgaṃ syādata āha-vyāpyeti ||4||
GSP28mimslovu:318: uttarastu yathā dhūmādi', sa hi prāyeṇāgnideśakālavartī bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:323: sa hi tasya deśakālau tāvad vyāpnotyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:326: tena kāraṇena vyāpya eva gṛhīte vyāpakasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati yadasau taṃ vināpi na bhavatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:328: yena taṃ vināpi bhavastaṃ na gamayet /
GSP28mimslovu:329: agnistvavaṃvidha iti nāsau dhūmasya gamako bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:335: vyāpyatvād gamikā gāvo vyāpikā na viṣāṇitā // Msv_5,4.8 //
GSP28mimslovu:336: sa hi sambandhajñānamātramaṅgatayā darśayati, na vyāpyatāmiti kuto viśeṣalābha' /
GSP28mimslovu:338: loke ca vyāpyaikadeśadarśina eva vyāpakajñānamanumānamiti siddham /
GSP28mimslovu:339: nahyanyatheti cāpakṛṣya pūrveṇa yojayitvā teneti tadupajīvanena vyākhyeyamiti ||6||
GSP28mimslovu:344: ato vyāpakaṃ gamyaṃ vyāpyaṃ gamakamityavyāpakamata āha-vyāpakatveti /
GSP28mimslovu:348: tena hi rūpeṇa gṛhīto 'sau vyāpād deśakālādhikye 'pi na virūdhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:350: astu nāmavastutatastattu rūpaṃ na gṛhītamiti kathaṃ gamakatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:351: avagate tu tādrūpye tenaivagamakatvaṃ na vyāpakatayā /
GSP28mimslovu:360: tatrāpi vyāpyataiva syādaṅgaṃ na vyāpitā mite' // Msv_5,4.9 //
GSP28mimslovu:362: deśe yāvati kāle vā vyāpatā prāṅanirūpitā // Msv_5,4.10 //
GSP28mimslovu:363: evamasaṅkare gamyakagamakavivekād yatrāpi vyāptisaṅkaro bhavati tatrāpi vyāpyatvameva gamakatve kāraṇamiti niṣkṛṣyata ityāha- teneti ||9||
GSP28mimslovu:365: kasya punariyaṃ saṃyogina' samavāyina' sambandhisambandhino vā /
GSP28mimslovu:374: na cāsau bhūmau pratiṣṭhitenāgnināgaganagatasya dhūmāgrasya sambhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:375: naca bhūmiṣṭhāṃ śaṅkucchāyāṃ divi vartamāna' ṛkṣodayo 'veti /
GSP28mimslovu:376: vyāptiśca kasyacit kenacid bhavantī deśato vā syāt kālato vā /
GSP28mimslovu:377: pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvi' saviturudayasyādyatanārkasyaivodayāt aṣṭau yāmānatikramyānumānaṃ na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:387: yo hi yasmin sati bhavati, asati ca na bhavati, tena niyamyata ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:390: yāvati hi deśe kāle vā vartamānasya yasya vāpyatā nirūpitapūrvā,
GSP28mimslovu:391: yāvaddeśakālabhāvinā vyāpakena tasya vyāpakāṃśasya tāvatyeva deśādau vartamānasya sa vyāpyāṃśastādṛgeva,
GSP28mimslovu:392: gaganādivartidharmyantare dṛṣṭāntadhadharmyapekṣayā sādhyadharmiṇi dṛṣṭa' san pratipādako bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:394: tasya tāvati tādṛk sa dṛṣṭo dharmyantare puna' /
GSP28mimslovu:400: deśe yāvatītyanatidūramadhirūḍhasya dhūmāderdūrataravartino 'pi nadīpūrasya vyāptiṃ darśayati /
GSP28mimslovu:404: nanvasyāṃ vyāptau na kiñcit pramāṇamastītyuktamata āha-bhūyodarśaneti /
GSP28mimslovu:409: no khalvasya sahasāgnadhūmāvagniśaraṇe vilokayamānasyāgninā vyāpto dhūma iti matirāvirasti /
GSP28mimslovu:411: na cānekarśanārabdho darśanasamudāya' kaścidasti, tasya darśanātirekeṇābhāvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:417: na tāvat pūrvaṃ vyāpteravadhāraṇe samartham apratisandhānāt /
GSP28mimslovu:420: yañcedaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ sācinyam, idamapi na caturaśram /
GSP28mimslovu:421: saṃskārā' khalu yadvasturūpopalambhasambhāvitātmāno bhavanti, tatraiva smṛtimātramādadhati /
GSP28mimslovu:423: pratyakṣe ca vyāptipramāṇe kathamataphalebhya' puṃviśeṣeṣu vaidikakarmānumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:424: na ca tattatkarmaniyamastasya tasya paśvāde' phalasyāparokṣamīkṣyate atīndriyatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:425: yañcedamadhvarevitate vaidikādaṅgāt pradhānāñcāpūrvānumānam, tadapi na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:434: na ca sahitāvadhāritayorasatyāṃ vyāptau kiñcidanupapannaṃ nāma||
GSP28mimslovu:439: bhūyāṃsi darśanānyevāsatyāṃ vyāptau nopapadyanta iti cet,
GSP28mimslovu:440: kiṃ hi teṣāṃ vyāptimantareṇa na sambhavati svarūpaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:442: svagocaraprakāśanamapi svata eva viṣasyāpi svapramāṇaparicchannasya na kiñcidanapapannaṃ paśyāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:445: na ca bhāvasvarūpā vyāptirabhāvena pramīyata iti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:452: itarayā vyāvartate khalvayaṃ śaśaviṣāṇābhāvādapīti śaśaviṣāṇenāpi niyamyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:455: vyāvṛttirhi niyama', sācāstīti kiṃ śaśaviṣāṣasya sattvāsattvābhyām /
GSP28mimslovu:457: vyāpyate ca śaśaviṣāṇena tadabhāvānnivṛtto dhūmaityanagniriva tadabhāvo 'pi vipakṣa eva /
GSP28mimslovu:465: manastu sakalātītādiviṣayaparicchedasādhāraṇaṃ pratibaddhasāmarthyaṃ kvaciditi tadabalabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa vyāptirgrahīṣyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:467: no khalvapi bahirviṣayabodhe mana' svatantramiti varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:469: svatantre hi bahiriṣyamāṇe manasi sarva' sarvadarśī syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:474: tathāpi pūrvapūrvāṃnubhavajanitasaṃskārasanāthaṃ bahirapi vartiṣyate cakṣurādyanugṛhītamiva rūpādau /
GSP28mimslovu:478: smṛtimātrahetavo hi pūrvānubhavaprabhāvitā' saṃskārānatsahante manaso bahiravagrahe 'nugrahamādhātum /
GSP28mimslovu:481: sa ced grahaṇe kvacinmanasa' sahāyī bhavatīti kiṃ na smṛtiviṣayāntarāṇyapi grāhyatīti yat kiñcidetat /
GSP28mimslovu:485: na hīdānīmatra vā tayo' sambandha iti bhavati mati' /
GSP28mimslovu:486: api tarhi sannihitavartamānayorevedantayā pratibhāsamānayordeśakālau sambandhaśca tayorviśeṣaṇamimau sambaddhāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:489: tadevamanavacchinnarūpa' svābhāvika eva saṃbandha' siddho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:494: vahnirhi dhūmena saṃyukta' saṃvedito 'pi kadācidvidhūmo dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:496: na tu svābhāviko 'gnerdhūmena saṃbandha iti niścīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:502: prayatnenāpi cānviṣṭo na dṛṣṭa upādhirnāstīti niścīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:505: sa vaktavya' kimidānīṃ sāhityamātramanumānāṅgaṃ tanniyamo vā /
GSP28mimslovu:506: yadi sāhityamātraṃ tattarhi prathamadarśana eva samadhigatamiti punardhūmadarśino 'viditavyāpterapyanumānaṃ syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:507: atha tanniyama' tasyaivedaṃ pramāṇamanusriyate kuta' sidhyatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:508: na hi prathamadarśino 'yamanena niyata iti matirāvirbhavantī dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:509: anavacchinnadeśakālatayāvagata' saṃbandha' svābhāviko bhavati, tato niyama iti cet /
GSP28mimslovu:510: sa tarhi tathāvidha' prathamamevāvagata iti bhūyodarśanaṃ nāpekṣeta /
GSP28mimslovu:514: yadyanavacchinnasyāpi deśata' kālato vā kadācit kasyacit kasyacid viyogo dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:519: na cātra pratiniyama' iyadabhirdarśanairavyabhicāra' sidhyati iti /
GSP28mimslovu:520: nanu dhūmasyāpyagnisabandhe na kaścidupādhirupalabhyate agneriva dhūmasaṃbandhe /
GSP28mimslovu:521: ata' kathamasau satyapi dhūme na bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:525: dṛṣṭaṃ hi kvacid deśe kharjūrāṇāṃ piṇḍakharjūraphalatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:528: tadvat dhūmo 'pi jātu jāyetāntareṇāpi hutāśanaṃ kvaciditi śaṅkamānā na tasya niyamamagninādhyavasyanti śatāṃśenāpi /
GSP28mimslovu:529: vipakṣād vyāvṛtti'śaṅkamānā anumānodayaṃ pratibandhātīti katarañcedaṃ pramāṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:539: kiṃ khalu vyāptigocaraṃ jñānaṃ na jāyata eva, sandigdhaṃ vā jāyate, viparyeti vā /
GSP28mimslovu:544: dṛśyate hi bahulaṃ dhūmamagnāvupalamāno 'yamanena niyata ityavadhāraṇapura' saraṃ tato 'gnimanumāya tadanurūpaṃ vyavaharamāṇa' /
GSP28mimslovu:550: tad yathāyogyaṃ kasyacit kasyāñcit vyāptasaṃvittau vyavasthāpayāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:559: prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāye carame darśane cetasi cakāsti dhūmasya vahniniyatasvabhāvatvaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:564: na hyetat sarvamāpātānna pratibhātamiti parastādapi bhāsamānamanyathā bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:566: nanūktaṃ na smṛteranyatra saṃskārā vyāpriyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:567: kena vā saṃskārāṇāṃ smṛteranyatra vyāpāra upeyate /
GSP28mimslovu:568: smārayanta eva tu te pūrvapūrvāvagatamagnisambandhaṃ dhūmasya vyāptisaṃvidaṃ janayitumabhipravṛttacasyendriyasya sahāyībhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:571: na ca yat sahasā na pratibhāti tatpaścādapi pratibhāsamānaṃ pratyakṣatāṃ jahāti /
GSP28mimslovu:573: nanu na tāvadāpātajaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyāptau pramāṇamiti bhaṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:574: tatapūrvakaṃ ca savikalpakamiti kathaṃ tasyāpi prāmāṇyam /
GSP28mimslovu:575: asti vā brāhmaṇādipratyakṣe nirvikalpakāvasthāyāṃ vṛddhādāviv narāntaraviviktākārapratibhāsa' /
GSP28mimslovu:578: yathā tu tatra piṇḍamātradarśina' smṛtayonisambandhasya brāhmaṇo 'yamiti pratyakṣaṃ jāyate,
GSP28mimslovu:579: evamihāpi bahuśo 'gnidhūmadarśino 'ntime darśane nirvikalpavṛttadhūmasvalakṣaṇasyāgninā niyato 'yamiti dhūsvabhāvagocaraṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP28mimslovu:583: tacceha vyaktidarśana eva pūrvasaṃskārodabodhāt siddhamiti nāvaśyamanayo' samānaviṣayatā /
GSP28mimslovu:588: ata' parastādeva sahakārivaśāt nirvikalpakopadarśitavyaktiviṣayaṃ ghṛtamidamiti savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣamīvirasti /
GSP28mimslovu:592: asya hi bahulaṃ dhūmamagnāvupalabhamānasyānagnau ca vyatirekamante bhavati vimarśa'- api syād vyāpto 'yamaneneti /
GSP28mimslovu:593_1: ca tṛmadārugomayendhanādisamavadhānaviśeṣaṃ pratyanādṛto 'gnimevānudhāvatyanagnau ca na bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:597: yattu deśāntarādau vyabhicāra iti, tanna tāvad dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ nāpi śrutamiti nāśaṅkāmadhirohati /
GSP28mimslovu:598: evamapi tu śaṅkamānasya sarvapramāṇeṣvanāśvāsa' kvacid vyabhicāradarśanāt /
GSP28mimslovu:601: na hi yad yena niyatamavagatamabādhitaṃ ca tadanyathā bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:602: avāntarajātibhedāttu śaktisadasadbhāvakṛtā kāryavyavastheti na kvacid vyabhicāra' /
GSP28mimslovu:610: idamev cāgnau darśanamanagnau cādarśanamanupapadyamānamagninā niyamaṃ pratipādayati /
GSP28mimslovu:613: na hi yadekatra bhavati tenānyatra na bhavitavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:619: tatra satāpyanyatrāpi na bhavitavyameveti kimatra pramāṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:620: ato darśanādarśanasahakṛtendriyasyaiva vastusvabhāvāvadhāraṇamaparokṣaṃ jāyata ityevaṃ samarthanīyam /
GSP28mimslovu:624: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadā yatra dhūmastadā tatrāgniriti /
GSP28mimslovu:626: anāgatādisambandhastu katham, atiprasaṅgo hi tathā (sati) syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:629: rūpameva tu tādṛśaṃ dhūmādīnāṃ yadevamunnīyate, sthiramiva rūpaṃ kuḍyādīnām /
GSP28mimslovu:631: sannihitāvāntarasambandho na pratyakṣa iti tadrūpamapratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:632: apratyakṣe hi tasmin nedaṃ rajatamiti sūrvānubhūtarajatabādho na syād, bhinnaviṣayatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:633: svakāle hi pūrvavijñānena rajataṃ viṣayīkṛtaṃ na bhaviṣyadvādhakajñānakṣaṇa iti kathaṃ tatrāprasaktaṃ bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:634: kālāntarasambdho 'pi tena rūpeṇa pūrvajñānāvadhāritaṃ bhaviṣyajjñānakālamapi vyāptotīti bhavati samānaviṣayatāmāsādya bādha' /
GSP28mimslovu:635: nanu yad vastuno rūpaṃ tatparānapekṣamavagamyate, agnerivoṣṇatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:636: na ca dhūmasyāgṛhītapratisambandhinā tadrūpamavagamyata iti kathaṃ vasturūpatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:642: ato yadetadagninā dhūmasya niyatvaṃ bhāvātmakamidaṃ tatpratyakṣeṇāvagamyata iti kimanupapannam /
GSP28mimslovu:644: vipakṣavyāvṛttyā tu vidhirūpa eva niyama' parīkṣakairvyākhyāya parebhya' pratipādyate /
GSP28mimslovu:646: nanu niyamyatvamapi karmakārakatvaṃ tacca śaktirūpaṃ kathaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP28mimslovu:654: āgamikeṣu cārtheṣu tasya tasya phalasya tena tena vedavedyen karmaṇā samanvayāt,
GSP28mimslovu:655: karmāntarānvayasya cānavagamād anenaiva karmaṇedaṃ phalaṃ vyāptamiti śāstrādadagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:660: tacca rūpamubhayasyāpi pratyakṣasamadhigamyameveti tadeva tatra vyāptipramāṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:662: bhavatu tāvadanyad vyākhyāsyāma iti samadhigataṃ tāvad vyāpte' svarūpaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca /
GSP28mimslovu:668: satyaṃ na viśeṣayorvyāpti', sāmānyātmanoreva dhūmākṛtiragnayākṛtyā niyateti /
GSP28mimslovu:670: idaṃ tu prāyikam, sthāyinostu viśeṣayorapi kvacid
GSP28mimslovu:673: yatra hi kṛttikodayaṃ dṛṣṭvā rohiṇyāsatti' kathyate- anantaramudeṣyati rohiṇīti,
GSP28mimslovu:677: pratyabhijñāyate hi saiveyaṃ kṛttikā, saiveyaṃ rohiṇīti /
GSP28mimslovu:681: asti khalvasau hiṃsātvasyādharmatvena bāhyahiṃsāsvityata' kratāvapi hiṃsātvādadharmatvamanumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:684: vyāpteśca dṛśyamānāyā' kaścid dharma' prayojaka' // Msv_5,4.13 //
GSP28mimslovu:688: ye tu tānapi visrabdhaṃ sādhyasiddhai prayuñjate // Msv_5,4.15 //
GSP28mimslovu:690: ayamabhiprāya'--- satyāmāpātād bhavati bhrama', yathā kila hiṃsātvamātrānubandhyadharmatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:699: evaṃ ca yadyapi bāhyahiṃsāsu hiṃsātvādharmatvayo' sāhityamavagataṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:703: ato ya evāsmin satyevāsya bhavituṃ śaktirasti ityanena rūpeṇa nirūpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:711: prayojake hi hetāvevañjātīyakā doṣā nāspadaṃ labhante /
GSP28mimslovu:715: yathā viśvāso bhavati tathā prayuñjata ityartha' ||15||
GSP28mimslovu:733: bādhakāraṇadoṣādhīnaṃ hi sarvatra mithyābuddhīnāṃ mithyātvam, na ca jñānatvenotpattittvena vā
GSP28mimslovu:738: na hi sarvavijñānāni mithyetyevaṃvidhaṃ vivādaṃ lokikā' sahante /
GSP28mimslovu:745: santi khalu svargakāmo yajetetyevaṃ vihitāni somādīni karmāṇi /
GSP28mimslovu:753: catvāro 'pi hi varṇā' svargaṃ kāmayantara iti svargakāmapadenābhidhīyante /
GSP28mimslovu:754: svargakāmaścātrādhikāritayā jñāyata iti prāpte uktam-- apaśūdrāṇāmadhikāra iti /
GSP28mimslovu:762: na cāniyamenaiva te śūdrasyāpi bhaviṣyata' iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP28mimslovu:763: ko hi pratilabdhavidyāgnisambandhastraivarṇikādhikārasampāditāsu kāmaśrutiṣu niyatakālayovasthamupanayanamādhānaṃ vā jaghanyavarṇasyopakalpayitumutsahate /
GSP28mimslovu:766: tad yadi kaścadanumānakuśala' prayuṅkte śūdrakṛto yāga' svargahetu' manuṣyakṛtatvāt traivarṇikācaritayāgavaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:774: iha tu śūdrakṛtasya yāgāde' svargahetutā na sākṣādāgamena pratikṣipyate /
GSP28mimslovu:777: prayatnānantarajñānasadṛśā' pratyayānavasthānādayo 'bhimatā' tai' śabdagocaraistasya vināśitā na prayujyate /
GSP28mimslovu:779: na ca kṛtakatvameva prayatnānantaradarśanena sādhayituṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:784: śabdānityatvasiddhyarthaṃ ko vaded yo na tārkika' /
GSP28mimslovu:785: tasmād ya eva yasyārtho dṛṣṭa' sādhanaśaktita' // Msv_5,4.22 //
GSP28mimslovu:786: sa eva gamakastasya na prasaṅgānvito 'pi ya' /
GSP28mimslovu:795: etaddhi jātimattvādi vastusanmātranibandhanameva nityānityasādhāraṇam, nānenānityatā sādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:798: indriyaviṣayā jātimantaśca, na bhrāntisaṃviditā' śaśaviṣāṇādaya iveti ||21||
GSP28mimslovu:800: ayamartha'--- ya eva niṣiddhatvādirartho yasyādharmatvade' sādhanaśaktiyuktatvenāvagata' /
GSP28mimslovu:801: asmin satyamunā bhavitavyamitīdṛśyā śaktyāvadhāryata iti yāvat /
GSP28mimslovu:802: niyamyaśaktireva hi sādhanaśaktirityākhyāyate, niyatāvagato hi niyāmakaṃ śankoti (gamayituṃ)
GSP28mimslovu:804: niyamya eva gamako na prasaṅgānvito hiṃsātvādi' /
GSP28mimslovu:805: niṣiddhatvenānvetumabhipravṛttenādharmatvena prasaṅgāddhi hiṃsātvamapyanvitamiti prasaṅgānvitaṃ hiṃsātvaṃ nādharmatvasya gamakaṃ bhavatīti ||22||
GSP28mimslovu:815: sa eva cobhayātmāyaṃ gamyo gamaka eva vā // Msv_5,4.24 //
GSP28mimslovu:821: yadyapi svaśabdena naikadeśyupāttastathāpyekadeśaśabdābhyāmevārthādākṣipyata iti na nyūnatvadoṣa iti ||23||
GSP28mimslovu:825: na hyagnyaikadeśo dhūma iti kasyacit pratipattirasti /
GSP28mimslovu:828: ata ekadeśatvānupapattyaiva tadāśraya' kaścidekadeśyavagamyata iti siddhamiti ||23||
GSP28mimslovu:831: ata' kvacidev dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā kvacidekadeśyantare 'numānaṃ na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:832: aikādhikaraṇyaṃ tvekadeśayorna sidhyati, anupādānādityata āha--sa eveti /
GSP28mimslovu:835: tasya hi tau nāma vakṣyamāṇātmānau sta', yaddvirūpatvamarhati /
GSP28mimslovu:841: pramātṛpakṣe 'pi pabrathamoccaritenaikadeśaśabdena svāśraya ekadeśinyākṣipte dvitīyāpekṣākṣaṇe 'pi sa eva buddhau viparivartamānastadāśrayatvenāvagamyate nānya' /
GSP28mimslovu:843: yathā devadattasyaikakatra kare kaṅkaṇamaṅgulīyakaṃ karāntara iti na bhinna' karāśrahayo 'vagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:848: ātta' pṛthagabhinno vā prayoktṝṇāṃ vivakṣayā // Msv_5,4.25 //
GSP28mimslovu:855: sa tu dhūmavadādinā rūpeṇa pratyakṣasiddho 'gnimadādinā cāsiddha iti dvyātmakatvādubhayopapattiriti /
GSP28mimslovu:860: ata' punarapi nyūnatvamityata āha--- ātta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:867: ekadeśī gamyo gamako bhedābhedābhyāmupātto iti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:868: kiyati punaranumānasya vyāpāra iti bhavati saṃśaya' /
GSP28mimslovu:873: tadihāpi yadi tadvadeva viśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyi pramāṇamiṣyate, tata' siddhasādhyatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:883: na dharmamātraṃ siddhatvāt tathā dharmī tathobhayam /
GSP28mimslovu:884: vyastaṃ vāpi samastaṃ vā svātantryeṇānumīyate // Msv_5,4.28 //
GSP28mimslovu:886: dvayaṃ ca na syādiṣṭaṃ sat pakṣeṣveṣu yathākramam // Msv_5,4.29 //
GSP28mimslovu:896: asatyapi sāmānye kenacidekenopādhinānantānāmapi bhāvānāṃ sambandho gṛhyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:899: kasmāt punarviśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyyeva pramāṇaṃ neṣyate, ata āha--- nahīti ||27||
GSP28mimslovu:902: evameva dharmimātrānumāne svatantrobhayānumāne vā siddhasādhyatā darśayitavyetyāha--- tatheti ||28||
GSP28mimslovu:911: na cānityatvākhyasya dharmasya svatantrapakṣīkṛtasya kṛtakatvaṃ dharma iti kathamapakṣadharmo liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:912: evaṃ dhvanimātre 'pi svatantre kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatra dhvaniriti niyama' sambhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:913: tathobhayasya dhvanyanitayatvātmakasyobhayena pakṣadharmatvānugamātmakena na sambandha ityanāgataṃ sambandhaśabdaṃ pūrvāparābhyāṃ sambandhya tantreṇa vyākhyā kartavyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:914: samadhigataṃ tāvad dharmadharmyubhayeṣāṃ vyastasamastānāṃ na sādhyatvamiti ||30||
GSP28mimslovu:915: atha kasmād dharmadharmisambandha eva sādhyo na bhavatītyata āha--sambandhaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:918: khalu parīkṣaka' sādhanavākye samnabdhavācinā kenacinnāmnā ṣaṣṭhyā vā sambandha upādīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:919: na hyevaṃ prayujyate, agniparvatayorasti sambandha' dhūmavattvāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:924: na paraṃ pratijñāyāṃ nopādīyate, udāharaṇe 'pi na tenānugamo liṅgasya nirdiśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:925: nahi bhavati darśanaṃ, yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgnisambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:926: bhavati tu yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimāniti deśa eva nidarśanaṃ, tadetadāha---na cāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:928: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- na sādhanavākye sambandha' sādhyatayopādīyate nāpi dṛṣṭāntatayā dirdiśyate na cāyathāpratibhāsaṃ parīkṣakāṇāṃ vaktumucitamiti ||31||
GSP28mimslovu:934: api cāyaṃ sambandha' sādhyamāna' sanmātratayā vā sādhyate, kenacid vā dharmeṇa viśiṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:936: na ca parvatādivatsiddhasādhyarūpamākāradvayaṃ sambandho vahati, yenānumānasya viṣayo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:938: kananvasati sambandhe viśiṣṭa eva sādhayituṃ na śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:940: yadasambandhyamāna evāgninā parvatastadviśiṣṭo bhavatītyata āha---- tasmāditi vyāntena /
GSP28mimslovu:944: viśiṣṭasādhyatvānyathānupapattyaiva tvarthagṛhītā matubarthasya sambandhasya sādhyatā na puna' svatantrasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:947: tadvadihāpi parvato 'gnimāniti sādhyamāner'thagṛhīto 'gnisambandha', na puna' sa eva sādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:948: yathā daṇḍyādiśabdato viśiṣṭārthapratītau satyāṃ sambandho nāntarīyako bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:953: sa cāsyāsminnastīti sambandhe smaryate, ata' sambandha evātra pratyayārtha' /
GSP28mimslovu:955: 'prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūta' prādhānyena' iti smṛte' /
GSP28mimslovu:958: ata' sambandhavacanā eva daṇḍyādiśabdā iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:959_0: api ca 'nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhirutpadyata' iti viśiṣṭābhidhitsāyāmavaśyambhāvi
GSP28mimslovu:959_1: prathamataraṃ viśeṣaṇābhidhānamāpatati tata eva viśiṣṭāvagāhasiddherna tadyāvacchabdasyābhidhānaśaktirupakalpayituṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:968: tathā sati tanniṣkarṣe daṇḍitvaṃ daṇḍiteti tvataloranuśāsanamupapadyate /
GSP28mimslovu:969: yathā gośabdābhidheyaṃ sāmānyaṃ gotvamiti tvapratyayena niṣkṛṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:970: ata' sambandha eva daṇḍyādiśabdānāmabhidheya iti sāmprataṃ kathamucyate nāntarīyaka' sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:971: atrābhidhīyate--- na tāvat smṛtyanusāreṇa sambandhavācyatvamadhyavasātuṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:974: yathā citraguriti citrābhirgobhirviśiṣṭo devadattādireva vṛttau pradhānatayāvagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:975: vigrahe tu citrā gāvo yasyeti gavāmeva
GSP28mimslovu:980: syeti vigrahe sambandha' pradhānatayā ṣaṣṭhyā nirdiṣṭa',
GSP28mimslovu:981: tathāpi gomadāditaddhitavṛttau tadvāneva pradhānaṃ bhavati, tathā pratīte' /
GSP28mimslovu:982: gomacchabdo hi puruṣapradhāno bhāsate na sambandhapradhāna' /
GSP28mimslovu:985: tāvatā ca tadartha' pradhānatayā vācyatvena nirdiṣṭa iti bhrāntirupajāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:986: ato na tāvat smṛtyanusāreṇa sambandhasya vācyatā /
GSP28mimslovu:994: nirbhāgaśabdeṣu hi gavādiṣu viśiṣṭapratītāvapi viśeṣaṇamātramabhidhīyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:1005: nanvasati sambandhe daṇḍoviśeṣṭumeva naraṃ na śaknoti /
GSP28mimslovu:1008: na hi pṛthivyāmanavasthitā gāvo na tadvantaṃ viśiṣantīti pṛthivyapyabhidhīyata iti yuktamabhidhātum /
GSP28mimslovu:1009: yata eva tvasati sambandhe viśiṣṭāvagatiranapapannā, ata eva sambandho 'pyarthādantarbhāvyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1013: api tarhi abhidheyaniṣkarṣe hi 'yasya guṇasya hi bhāvādi'ti tvabhidheyāniṣkarṣārthameva smaraṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:1015: ata' prāk pratīte ekanimittasambandhiviśiṣṭe 'parasmin sambandhinyabhihiter'thagṛhīta' sambandho nābhidheyapakṣe nikṣipyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1025: sarvathā hi dharmamātre dharmaṇi vā svatantre pramīyamāṇe siddhasādhyatādidoṣo bhavati kana viśiṣṭapramāyām /
GSP28mimslovu:1026: viśiṣṭatā tu kadācit kasyacid yathābhiprāyaṃ bhavatu nāma, na kiñcid duṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1027: sarvathā tāvat dharmiṇa eva parvatāderagnyādidharmastaddharmeṇaiva dhūmādināvagantavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:1033: tatrāsambhavata' paścāt kalpyo 'sau dharmiṇā saha // Msv_5,4.37 //
GSP28mimslovu:1037: ayamabhiprāya'--- laukikāni hi pramāṇāni lakṣaṇakārairapi yathālokamevānugantavyāni /
GSP28mimslovu:1041: tathā svayamanumānena pratipannimarthaṃ tenaiva paraṃ pratipādayanto laukikā dharmaṇā viśiṣṭameva hetuṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante,
GSP28mimslovu:1044: viśeṣaṇatayā hi parvataviśiṣṭo 'gniriti dharmiṇyupātte dhūmavattvāditi hetudharmeṇa tasya sambandho na sphuṭaṃ prakāśate /
GSP28mimslovu:1049: yat svayamapi dharmaviśiṣṭameva dharmiṇaṃ budhyate na viparītamiti ||
GSP28mimslovu:1051: yadi tarhi dharmiṇo hetudharmeṇa sambandho na sphuṭa' kena tarhi prasajyata ityata āha--pradhānatvaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:1052: dhvaniviśiṣṭamanityatvaṃ kṛtakatvādityucyamāne 'nityatvākhyena dharmeṇaiva sādhyatayā pradhānabhūtena kṛtakatvādihetu' sambadhyeta na dhvaninā guṇabhūtena /
GSP28mimslovu:1058: bhedopāttasya dharmasya guṇabhāvo na duṣyati // Msv_5,4.38 //
GSP28mimslovu:1063: satyaṃ pradhānatayā dharmeṇa heto' sambandho vākyādavagamyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1064: liṅgabalīyastvena tu vākyaṃ bādhitvā dharmiṇaiva sambandha' kalpayiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1065: hetudharmasya hi dharmiṇaiva sambandhayogyatā na dharmeṇa,
GSP28mimslovu:1066: ato dharmasambandhābhāvād dharmiṇaiva sambandho bhaviṣyatītyata āha--- tatreti /
GSP28mimslovu:1072: na caivaṃ prayoktāra' prayuñjānā dṛśyanta ityabhiprāyeṇāha---dhvaneriti /
GSP28mimslovu:1073_0: yastu vadati dharmiṇyapi viśeṣṭe sādhye 'nvayopadarśanavelāyāṃ yatra yatra kṛtakatvamityukte
GSP28mimslovu:1073_1: dhvanireva pradhānatayā sambadhyeta nānityatvaṃ guṇabhūtatvādititaṃ pratyāha---anvayasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1075: yatra yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatrānityatvamiti na tatra pradhānasambandhāśaṅkā /
GSP28mimslovu:1076: ata' pratijñāvasthāyāṃ dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sādhyamāne yoguṇabhāva āsīt nāsau dṛṣṭāntavākye duṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1079: yastu vadati ṣaṣṭhyantena dhvaninānityatvaṃ viśeṣyate dhvaneranityatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1080: evaṃ ca kṛtakatvādityasyāvipariṇatavibhaktikena dhvaninaiva sambandha' sphuṭo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1086: ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśe hi sambandha eva sādhyo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1092: yo 'gni' so 'sti kvaciddeśe yo dṛṣṭo yatra tatra vā /
GSP28mimslovu:1093: agni' pūrvānubhūto vā deśamātreṇa saṅgata' // Msv_5,4.40 //
GSP28mimslovu:1094: yo 'gni' so 'nena yukto vā yo dṛṣṭo 'nena so 'thavā /
GSP28mimslovu:1095: yo 'yaṃ sa deśamātreṇa yukta' pūrveṇa vāpyayam // Msv_5,4.41 //
GSP28mimslovu:1097: pūrvayo' siddhasādhyatvaṃ pareṣu syād viruddhatā // Msv_5,4.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:1099: nāpi pūrvasya nāpyeṣa vahni' sarvairviśeṣyate // Msv_5,4.43 //
GSP28mimslovu:1111: siddho hi kvacidagni', dṛṣṭapūrvo 'pi pūrvadeśādhikaraṇa' siddha eva kiṃ tat pra(sā)dhānena /
GSP28mimslovu:1112: pareṣu tu pañcasu pakṣeṣu pramāṇāntaravirodha ityāha--- iha tviti /
GSP28mimslovu:1115: yattāvat yo 'gni' so 'nena yukta ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:1116: nahyanena deśena sarvāgnayo vyāpyante deśasyāvaibhavāt sarvāgnīnāṃ cātrāsannidhānāt,
GSP28mimslovu:1119: deśai' pūrveṇa vāpyasya na deśena viśeṣyatā /
GSP28mimslovu:1122: agne' pūrvataraṃ cātra deśa evāvadhāryate // Msv_5,4.45 //
GSP28mimslovu:1125: yo dṛṣṭo 'nena so 'thaveti yaduktaṃ dūṣayati---nāpi pūrvasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1128: na hyeṣa pura'sthito vahni' sarvairdeśairviśeṣyate sarvatra tasyābhāvāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:1130: pūrveṇa deśenāsyāgnerviśeṣyatā nāstyeva, pūrvadeśasyātrābhāvāt, asya ca tatra /
GSP28mimslovu:1131: pūrvānubhūtasya tvagnerdeśamātreṇa sambandha' pura'sthitavahne' sarvadeśasambandhanirākaraṇenaiva tulyanyāyatayā nirākṛta iti na pṛthagupanyasya dūṣita iti ||43||
GSP28mimslovu:1132: evaṃ saptasu pakṣeṣu nirākṛteṣvaṣṭama' pakṣo 'vaśiṣyate etaddeśaviśiṣṭo vā yo 'yamagniriti tannirākaroti--- etaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:1133: ayaṃ pura'sthito 'gniranena deśena viśiṣṭa' sādhyata iti sa vaktavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:1134: svadeśakālavartyeva smaraṇena viṣayīkṛta' kathamasāvanena deśena viśeṣṭuṃ śakya' /
GSP28mimslovu:1136: anavacchinnasmṛtāvapi ca dharmo dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇamiti nedaṃ yuktisādhyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1138: deśa eva tu pūrvāvagato viśeṣyatāmarhatītyabhiprāyeṇāha--- agneriti ||44-45||
GSP28mimslovu:1139: yadi cāgnirviśeṣyo bhavet tatastasyaivāyamādyo jñānakālo bhavet, prasiddhasyāprasiddhena viśeṣaṇāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1143: agnerjñānakāle hi sa eva deśo buddha',nāgni', ata' kasya
GSP28mimslovu:1146: tasmāt dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇa' syāt prameyatā // Msv_5,4.47 //
GSP28mimslovu:1148: nanu śabdavadeva syāt liṅgagamyaṃ viśeṣaṇam // Msv_5,4.48 //
GSP28mimslovu:1152: pramitaṃ hi vastvapramitena dharmeṇa pramitsitaṃ bhavati kakīdṛgdharmo 'yamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1153: tathā cadeśa iti sa eva pramitsyate, pramīyate ca, na punaragniriti /
GSP28mimslovu:1154: nanu deśo 'pi pratyakṣāvagata eveti kakathamasāvanumānasyaviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyata āha--- deśasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1156: anumānena tu pāvakādiviśiṣṭatā tasyānumīyata iti na gṛhītagrāhitvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1157: ato dharmyeva dharmaviśiṣṭa' prameya' na dharmo dharmiviśiṣṭa ityāha---tasmāditi ||46-47||
GSP28mimslovu:1168: śabdo hi viśeṣaṇamātra eva vartata ityākṛtyadhikaraṇe vakṣyata iti ||48||
GSP28mimslovu:1173: tad yāvataiva pratibaddhamavagataṃ dhūmavattvaṃ pratibaddhamavagatamityagnimattvamevānumāpayatīti na kaścit doṣa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1181: prameyadhī' pramāṇaṃ hi bhāṣyakārastu manyate // Msv_5,4.52 //
GSP28mimslovu:1182: na ceti viśeṣyo 'pi parvātadisvarūpeṇāvadhārita' so 'pi nānumeya ityāhaviśeṣya iti ||49||
GSP28mimslovu:1189: tatra viśiṣātmanā pakṣīkṛtasya sāmānyatmanā hetutvamiti na pakṣaikadeśateti /
GSP28mimslovu:1190: samadhigataṃ tāvadanumānasya viśiṣṭo viṣaya iti, svarūpameva kimasyeti na jñāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1191: tad yadi dhūmatajjñānādīnāmanumānatvamiṣyate, tata' pramāṇaphalayorviṣayabheda' sa cāyukta' /
GSP28mimslovu:1192: ata eva bhikṣuṇā ekameva jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalarūpamiti pratyakṣamuktvā tadevānumāne 'pyatidiṣṭaṃ pūrvavat phalamasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1200: yathā hīndriyādipramāṇapakṣe yatra phalaṃ niṣpadyate tadviṣayavyāpārāt samānaviṣayatvamupapāditam /
GSP28mimslovu:1202: ato dhūmastajjñānaṃ vā sambandhastatsmaraṇaṃ vā pramāṇamastu,
GSP28mimslovu:1211: bhāṣyakāro hi buddhireva pramāṇamiti darśayati yat kāraṇamasannikṛṣṭer'the buddhiriti vadati /
GSP28mimslovu:1215: astu vā sajātīyameva phalaṃ hānādibuddhi' phalaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1220: tad yadā dhūmādīnāmeva prakṛṣṭasādhanatvamavagamyate, tadā tadeva pramāṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:1221: bhāṣyakāreṇāpi buddhirvā janma vetyādinā pratyakṣaniyamaṃ darśayatā sarvatraivāniyamastulyayā darśita eva /
GSP28mimslovu:1223: tañcedamanumānaṃ dvedhā bauddhā vibhajante svārthaṃ parārthañceti /
GSP28mimslovu:1229_1: tenaivānumānena pratipādanaṃ vāñchatā yathā pūrvamasmābhi' pratipādita' pakṣo viśiṣṭo
GSP28mimslovu:1231: svayamanumānena gṛhītamarthaṃ paraṃ pratipādayituṃ sādhanavākyameva prayujyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1232: parastu tato vākyāt trirūpaṃ liṅgamanusandhāya svayameva sādhyaṃ vastu budhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1234: vakturapi svayamarthaṃ pratipannavata' svārthānumānameva, kataradatra parārthānumānamiti na vidma' /
GSP28mimslovu:1239: yadvadati darśanasya parārthatvāditi, na tu tadanumānam, atrirūpaliṅgajanitatvādanarthadṛk ca /
GSP28mimslovu:1240: trirūpālliṅgator'thādṛganumānamiti va' siddhānta', ata' kathaṃ vacanamanumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:1242: tata' pratyakṣapratipannamapyarthaṃ bodayad vaca' parārthamiti pratyakṣamapi parārthamāpadyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1243: yadi tu svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt pratyakṣasya tasya cāśabdagocaratvānna pratyakṣaṃ parārthāmityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1245: evaṃ hi pratyakṣagṛhītārthaviparītābhidhāyināṃ tadvirodhodbhāvanavacanaṃ na yujyate ||
GSP28mimslovu:1246: yo hi pratyakṣavirūddhamarthaṃ pratijānīte nāgnirūpaṣṇa iti,
GSP28mimslovu:1247: sa vacanena taṃ pratyakṣaviṣayamarthaṃ pratipādya nirākriyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1250: evaṃ ca pratyakṣaviṣayavacanaparārthatayā ka' pratyakṣaparārthatāṃ vārayatīti dvaividhyānupapatti' /
GSP28mimslovu:1251: ato yathodita' pakṣa eva vācya ityuktavān /
GSP28mimslovu:1252: idaṃ tu vaktavyam---- ko 'yaṃ pakṣo nāma, taducyate, pratijñārtha' pakṣa' /
GSP28mimslovu:1257: ata' sādhya' pakṣa ityācakṣmaha iti vācya' pakṣa ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:1262: vadanti ca kimanenānarthakena, antareṇāpi pakṣavacanamapekṣitaṃ sidhyatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:1268: hetvadhīne tu nirṇaye tacchktireva nirūpayitumucitā, kiṃ pratijñāvacanen /
GSP28mimslovu:1270: ato yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ śabdaśca kṛtaka ityudāharaṇopanayamātrādeva sādhyasiddheranarthikā pratijñā /
GSP28mimslovu:1272: tacca dṛṣṭāntadvayenopanayena ca kathyata iti kṛtamativistareṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:1276: yo hi manyate--- yadā khalvayaṃ śabdo nitya iti pratijānīte tadetaro 'nityavādī vyutthito bhavati tato jalpa' pravartata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1278: yo hi manyate---yadā khalvayaṃ śabdo nitya iti pratijānite tadetaro 'nityavādī vyutthito bhavati tato jalpa' pravartata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1284: ato hetuśaktimeva pratipādya tattvaṃ bodhyata iti yuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:1289: tatraitat syāt--- jalpe khalu vivādamājihīrṣu' pratijñāṃ praṇayatīti, tacca naivam /
GSP28mimslovu:1291: asatyapi hi pakṣavacane lakṣyata eva yathā dhvanimanityamanuminotīti,
GSP28mimslovu:1292: yat kāraṇaṃ yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭa ityuktvā kṛtakatvaṃ dhvanerupanayati śabdaśca kṛtaka iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1294: vitaṇḍā tu yathā tathā vāde darśite pravartata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:1295: na hi vaitaṇḍikasya kiñcit paranigrahādanyad sādhyamasti /
GSP28mimslovu:1296: yadasau pratijñāvacanena kvacidarthe sādhyamāne svaviparītasiddhiṃ manvāno jātodvego vivadet /
GSP28mimslovu:1299: svayaṃ ca kutaściddhetuviśeṣāt kiñcit kenacid dharmeṇa viśiṣṭamavagatamiti parasmā api tathaiva kathyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:1300: asatyāṃ tu pratijñāyāmanāśrayahetvādaya ākāśapatitā iva bhaveyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:1301: nanu nāyaṃ pakṣavacanapura'saramajñāsītsādhyamiti kathaṃ parasmai tathā kathayati /
GSP28mimslovu:1303: yadyapi śabdo 'nitya iti svapratipattau noccāritaṃ tathāpi savikalpakatvādasyā buddherastyevātra pramāturviśiṣṭo vikalpa',
GSP28mimslovu:1304: uccāraṇaṃ tu parārthamiti tanmātraṃ svapratipattau nāsīt /
GSP28mimslovu:1305: parastu nānuccāritena śabdena pratipādayituṃ śakyata ityuccārya pratipādyata iti śabdoccāraṇamātramadhikam /
GSP28mimslovu:1308: jalpavitaṇḍe hi vijigīṣamāṇayordvayo' pravartata iti paraṃ bhrāmayituṃ pratijñāvacanaṃ na prayujyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1309: avivāde tu śiṣyo na vyāmohanīya iti viśadatarameva pratijñā
GSP28mimslovu:1314: na hi na śabdadāridrayaṃ, yadenaṃ tattvaṃ bubhutsamānamupasannamaviśadavacanena parikleśayāma /
GSP28mimslovu:1316: uktamidamasati hi pratijñāvacane 'nāśrayā hetvādayo na pravarteranniti /
GSP28mimslovu:1319: nirdiṣṭe hi sādhye kuta ityapekṣāyāṃ hetu' sambadhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1324: punaśca śabda' kṛtaka iti śabdasya kṛtakatayā sambandho 'nūdita' /
GSP28mimslovu:1327: kṛtakaṃ tāvadanityaṃ śabdo 'pi kṛtaka iti svarūpanuvādamātramubhayoriti śaṅkā jāyeta,
GSP28mimslovu:1330: tadatra sarve kṛtakā' śabdātmāna iti sādhusampāditamāpadyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1331: ata' pradhānavākyāvayavapratijñā yadapahanuyate tannāstikānāmeva sarvāpalāpavādināṃ śobhate netareṣām /
GSP28mimslovu:1336: iti sūkto vādivacanaprakāro dharmiṇamuddiśya sādhyadharmo vidhīyata iti ||53-54||
GSP28mimslovu:1337: nanvevaṃ sādhyaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi vidhīyamāne kevalasādhyānvayāvagamād dharmāntaravyudāso bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1338: tataścānitya' śabda ityukte nitya evetyavadhāraṇādambaraguṇatvādayo 'pi taddharmā na bhaveyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:1339: evaṃ ca hetorapi pratikṣepāt sādhyasiddhirapi durlabhaiva /
GSP28mimslovu:1342: satyam, ata eva tannivṛttyarthamavadhāraṇe kriyamāṇe itaranivṛttirapi bhavedata āha--- niyama iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1343: sādhyadharmavivakṣāpekṣayaiva niyama' kalpyate, na punaravirodhino 'pi dharmāntarāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1344: ato 'gnimāniti sādhyamāne 'gnyabhāvamātrameva nirākṛtaṃ bhavati, na puna' dharmāntaram /
GSP28mimslovu:1345: yathā śukla' paṭa ityukte tadvirodhinastadabhāvasyaiva nivṛttirbhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:1355: smaraṇaṃ hi sannikṛṣṭāvamarśollikhitameva prāyaśo bhavati,sa iti hi tat pravartate /
GSP28mimslovu:1363: smṛtihetustu prācīnāmubhavaprabhāvitā bhāvanā samastīti smṛtireva pramuṣitatadavamarśā setyāśritam /
GSP28mimslovu:1364: idaṃ tu pratyutpannaliṅgādikāraṇabalādutpadyamānaṃ laiṅgikajñānamanubhavākārapravṛtaṃ na tadbhāvādutārayituṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1391: pramitasya pramāṇe hi nāpekṣā jāyate puna' // Msv_5,4.56 //
GSP28mimslovu:1396: asyārtha'--- dvedhā hi sannikṛṣṭaṃ bhavati tadrūpapramitaṃ viparītanirūpitaṃ vā /
GSP28mimslovu:1400: sa ca sakṛtpramāṇavyāpārādeva siddha iti na pramāṇāntarāpekṣeti ||55,56||
GSP28mimslovu:1401: kiṃ puna' pramitasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣā na jāyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1403: varṇitamidaṃ ---dvedhā hi pramitaṃ bhavati tādrūpyeṇa vaiparītyeneti /
GSP28mimslovu:1404: tatra tāvat tādrūpyaparicchede na paraṃ pramāṇaṃ phalavat /
GSP28mimslovu:1412: dharmī ca giriranubhavasiddha', tathāpi viśiṣṭamanumānena viṣayīkrayata iti varṇitamasakṛt /
GSP28mimslovu:1420: pūrvaṃ hi dhūmavattvopalakṣitena rūpeṇāgnimattayā deśo nirjñāta' /
GSP28mimslovu:1422: avaśyaṃ caivamabhyupagantavyam, anyathā kathamagnimāniti viditvā vyavahārāya ghaṭate /
GSP28mimslovu:1426: mūle tasya hyanutpanne pūrveṇa viṣayo hṛta' /
GSP28mimslovu:1429: agrāhyatā tu śabdāde' pratyakṣeṇa viridhyate // Msv_5,4.59 //
GSP28mimslovu:1442: ye tu smṛtyāśaṅkānirākaraṇama' saya prayojanamāhu', teṣāṃ bādhitaviṣayamapyanumānamāpadyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1448_0: tadyāvaduttaraṃ tattadvyāpāravyagratayā vilambate tāvacchīghrabhāvinā pūrveṇa viṣayāpahārād
GSP28mimslovu:1448_1: viprakṛṣṭasādhanasyotpattireva nirudhyata ityanantarameva vakṣyata iti kathaṃ punaranumānaṃ bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1449: tadapi hi pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa bādhituṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1452: yadi bādhādevetarāśrayaṃ tarhyastu vā jyeṣṭhapramāṇena pratyakṣeṇānumānabādha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1453: natu tato 'pi jaghanyairaparairbādhyate, tat kasya heto' ata āha---pratyakṣāderiti syādantena /
GSP28mimslovu:1456: tad yatra kasyacidarthasya kenacidātmanāvadhāraṇaṃ bhavati tatra tenotpannasyotpatsyamānasya vā jñānasya bādho 'bhidhīyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1459: tatra hi pūrvopamardanenaivottaramātmānaṃ labhata iti tat tasya bādhakam /
GSP28mimslovu:1460: uttaraṃ ca deśādibhede 'pyabādhitaṃ svabhāvataśca pramāṇaṃ pūrvamābhāsīkaroti /
GSP28mimslovu:1465: tadevamātmanā jñānena pūrvamābhāsīkṛtamiti tatrābhāsa eva bādhyata iti nātiprasaṅga' /
GSP28mimslovu:1466_0: aprāptabādhe tu yāvat kliṣṭasādhanamanumānaṃ svagocare sāmānyaśāstraṃ vā kvacid viśeṣaviṣaye
GSP28mimslovu:1466_1: pravartitumārabhate tāvat pratyakṣeṇānumānena vā siddhasarvāṅgakenāgamena vā viśeṣaviṣayeṇa
GSP28mimslovu:1468: na hi balavatā śīghrabhāvinā pramāṇena niruddhamukhamutpattumarhati /
GSP28mimslovu:1469: tadevamaprāptabādhe paramanutpannameva prāptisambhāvanayā tu bādhyata ityucyate śrutyeva liṅgamiti na kvacit pramāṇabādha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1470: yattu jaghanyena mukhyabādho na yukta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1473: yadeva tu śīghrabhāvi pūrvopamardena vātmānaṃ labhate tadeva bādhakamabhidadhmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:1474: itarañca bādhyamata eva tenaiva tasya bādhaṃ brūma' /
GSP28mimslovu:1475: prāptabādha iva pratyakṣasya tenaivānumānena ca siddhāṅgakena sādhyāṅgakasya viśeṣaśāstreṇa sāmānyaśāstrasya /
GSP28mimslovu:1481: nanu ca balavatāpi nāvaśyaṃ durbalaṃ bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1483: ato viṣayavyavasthāyā vikalpena samuccayena vobhayamupapādayiṣyate vinātyantikabodhāśrayaṇena (?)
GSP28mimslovu:1506: ata eva hyaśrāvaṇatāpakṣo 'pi na pratyakṣeṇa virudhyata iti vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1516: tadanena prakāreṇa śabdābhāvapakṣasyaiva pratyakṣavirodha upadiṣṭa iti na kiñcidanupapannamiti ||58,59||
GSP28mimslovu:1518: teṣāmeva śabdādīnāmaśrāvaṇatvādyanumānaviruddhaṃ yo hyaśrāṇamanityaṃ vā śabdaṃ pakṣamicchati tasyāsau śīghrabhāvinā viparyayānumānena bādhyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1521: śabdo hi pratyakṣa' na tacchrāvaṇatā grāhyagrāhakasambandho hi śabdasya śrāvaṇasya ca tvatalbhyāmucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1524: api ca atīndriyaṃ śrotraṃ,kathaṃ tatsambandha' śabdasya pratyakṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1525: na hyaindriyānaindriyādhāra' sambandha' pratyakṣo bhavati vāyuvanaspatyoriva /
GSP28mimslovu:1530: tathāhi śrotropaghātamātreṇa cakṣurādimato badhirasya śabdabuddhirna dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1531: śrotre ca dṛḍhe cakṣurādiṣvasambhave 'pi śabdagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP28mimslovu:1536: ato mānasapratyakṣa evāyamiti kaścit bhrāmyati sa vaktavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:1544: paśyāmo hi vayaṃ kumbhakāravyāpārānantaraṃ kumbhasambhavamudīkṣamāṇā' kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ cakṣuṣaiva /
GSP28mimslovu:1545: idaṃ hi kumbhasya tatkāryatvaṃ yā tadanantarasambhūti' /
GSP28mimslovu:1546: sa ca kumbhastatsambhavaścobhayaṃ cākṣuṣameveti kimatra manasā /
GSP28mimslovu:1550: evaṃ ca prayoga'--- śravaṇapramāṇaprakāśya' śabda' tasmin
GSP28mimslovu:1552: yadevaṃ tattataprakāśyaṃ santamasa iva ghaṭa' pradīpaprakāśya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1556: tāvacchīghrajanamanā śrāvaṇatvānumānena vyāptisaṃvidaṃ pratibandhatā tasyotpattireva nirudhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1558: yat kṛtakatvādihetukaṃ tadapyasiddhivyabhicārādidoṣānna śīgharmupajāyata iti siddhāvayavai' śīghrajanmabhirnityatvānumānairbādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1559: yathā deśakālādibhinnā gośabdabuddhaya' samānaviṣayā' gaurityatpadyamānatvāt sampratyutpannagośabdabuddhivad hyastanoccārito vā gośabdo 'dyāpyasti gośabdatvād,
GSP28mimslovu:1562: pratijñāvirodhādayo hi śabdavirodhatayā prasiddhā iti te tathābhidhīyante /
GSP28mimslovu:1564: yatra hi kvacidarthe pratiṣṭhitena śabdena pratijñāntaraṃ bādhyate, tatra śabdavirodho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1565: na ca svavāgvirodhe śabdasya kvacidarthe pratiṣṭhāsti vyāhatābhidhānāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1571: dharmyuktyāhaṃ yato jāta' sā vandhyā jananī mama // Msv_5,4.63 //
GSP28mimslovu:1574: lokaṃ prasiddhistu na śabdo na pramāṇāntaram /
GSP28mimslovu:1575: api tu pratyakṣādyantargataiveti tadviruddhapakṣapradarśanenaiva pradarśiteti na śabdavirodhe 'ntarabhāvayitumucitā /
GSP28mimslovu:1577: na hi candraśabdaśaśāṅkayo' sambandhaṃ śabdo vadati yenātadvācyapakṣasya śabdavirodho bhavati sambandhavācyatve hītaretarāśrayaṃ bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1584: tatra pratijñāvirodha evaikastridhā bhidyata ityāha--- yāvaditi sārdhena /
GSP28mimslovu:1593: sarvamṛṣātve hi pratijñāvacanamapi mṛṣeti netaranmṛṣā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1594: tadamṛṣātve hi pratijñāvacanamapi mṛṣeti dharmasaṃsargāsambhavaparāmarśāt pakṣabādha iti dharmoktivirodhābhidhānam /
GSP28mimslovu:1598: dharma evāyamukta ātmānaṃ bādhata iti yāvat /
GSP28mimslovu:1599: vandhyā me jananīti pakṣo dharmyuktyā bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1609: na ca gauṇo jananīśabda ityapi vaktavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1611: evaṃ viśeṣite pakṣe dharmyuktivirodha ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1613: na tu śrutismṛtyatirekīṇi jalpākavacanāni gauṇatvādibhi' samīkartuṃ śakyante /
GSP28mimslovu:1616: teṣu kathañcitsamādhīyamāneṣu na kiñcid dūṣaṇaṃ nāma bhavediti ||62,63||
GSP28mimslovu:1618: anitya' śabda iti bauddhenokte kathaṃ kṣaṇikādagṛhītasambandhādarthapratyaya ityanuyuktena tenaiva yadā punarucyate nityastarhīti tadā tasya pūrvābhyupagamavirodha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1620: tathāpyevaṃvidhā pūrvāparaviruddhā pratijñaivātmānaṃ na labhata iti na nyāyāvatāramapekṣate /
GSP28mimslovu:1625: tādṛśa' pūrvāparaviruddha' pakṣaṃ vināśayatīti teṣāmabhiprāya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1627: atrāpi mahājanaviparītārtha' śabdasaṃsarga' svarasādeva bhajyate na pramāṇaṃ yāvadapekṣata iti śabdabādha udāhṛta iti ||64||
GSP28mimslovu:1629: yena hi nagare gavākāro dṛṣṭa' samprati cāraṇye gavayākāra',
GSP28mimslovu:1630: taṃ prati gaurgavayasadṛśo na bhavatīti pakṣa upamānena virudhyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1649: yadyapi pratyakṣapūrvikodāhṛtaiva tathāpi pakṣadoṣodbhāvanacchalenendriyāpalāpapakṣasyāpyayaṃ doṣa iti vivakṣatā punastadvirodho 'bhihita' /
GSP28mimslovu:1650: atraivādiśabdenopamānapūrvikayā virodho darśayitavya'--- yathā gavayopamitāyā gostajajñānagrāhyaśaktyapahnava iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1652: arthābhidhānānyathānupapattyā hi vācakaśaktimarthāpattyā pramāya punastadanupapattyārthapattyantareṇa śabdanityatvamavagamyata iti ||67||
GSP28mimslovu:1654: kiṃ punararthāpatti' prapañcenodāhriyate, tadvirodhapratipādana hi yayākayācidekayāpi sidhyatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:1655: tathā ca pramāṇāntaravirodheṣu prapañco na darśita' /
GSP28mimslovu:1659: ṣoḍhā bhinnereva ṣaḍabhiratra virodho vārtikakārasya vivakṣita', tatpradarśanārthameva
GSP28mimslovu:1664: svedyamānasya vādino 'nuṣṇo vahniriti pratijñā anubhavasthenaiva pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1665: anāsannagnistu saiva pratijñā smṛtisthena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1666: yadā khalvayaṃ vādakāle 'nuṣṇo vahniriti pratijānāti tadainamitara' smārayati kiṃ na smarasi pūrvānubhūtamagneruṣṇatvaṃ yadevamāttheti,
GSP28mimslovu:1667: sa tat smṛtvā tata' pratyakṣānnivartata iti bhavati smṛtapratyakṣabādha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1670: śrutapratyakṣabādhastu yatra kenacidarthe kasmiścidapahanute sākṣibhirdṛṣṭo 'yamartha iti sākṣipratyakṣeṇa bādho 'bhidhīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1675: darśanaṃ tu tai' svaśabdena pratyāyyata iti śabdāvagatapratyakṣavirodha evāyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1677: yathā dātrādipratyabhijñāyāṃ yādṛśī svātmaniceṣṭā dṛṣṭā tāṃ paratrāpi dṛṣṭavopaminoti mamevāsyāpi dātrādipratyabhijñā pratyakṣamutpannā,
GSP28mimslovu:1679: iha ca ceṣṭayā tadanurūpaṃ paragocaramanumāya svajñānasādṛśyaṃ tatropamīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1684: yadā hi bahuṣu gacchatsu toyārthiṣu taṭākamekastadāharaṇāya prasthito vilambate tadā tadvilambanānyathānupapattyā tadīyaṃ toyapratyakṣamarthāpattyā pramīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1686: abhāvena tu bhāvarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāvagamyata iti tadanavagataprataykṣavirodho nehodāhriyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1690: yatra tu 'devasya tveti nirvapati' iti pratītaviniyogānmantraśeṣe 'numite tadviparīta' pakṣo gṛhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1692: nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇāmapacāre tatsadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣūpamiteṣu 'vrīhibhiryajete'ti codanā nīvāraviṣayatvenānumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1694: na hi tasyā' svarūpeṇa vrīhayo viṣayabhūtā', tadavayavāstu cūrṇībhūtā vrīhiśāstrārtha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1695: te ca nīvāreṣvapi santīti vrīhyavayavasāmānyopamitanīvāragāminī vrīhicodanānumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1698: yatra dūrād vṛkṣābhāvaṃ viditvā tacchāyābhāvo 'numīyate tatrābhāvapūrvakānumānena chāyāsadbhāvapakṣo bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1704: āgamikaśabdabādhastu yatra śākhāntaragataśrutiviṣayavivāde smṛtinibnadhanakārāṇāṃ vacanena śrutisadbhāvo niścīyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1706: upamitaśabdavirodhastu manvādismṛtibhyor'yāpattyā vaidikaṃ kimapi mūlamastīti kalpite smārtavākyasadṛśa eva mūla upamiter'thavādamūlatvapakṣa upamitaśabdena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1707: viśvajidaphalatvapakṣastu śrutārthapattisiddhavadhāraṇe tasya vyāpāra' tatrābhāvāvadhāritavidhikātsnarye jyotiṣṭāmeprākṛtetikartavyatāprāptikṣo bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1710_0: anumānapūrva kopamānabādhastu yadā hyādityasya deśāntaraprāptyā gatimanumāyatanmadhye
GSP28mimslovu:1710_1: vānte vā sūryagati' tādṛśī vatsarānteṣviti tatra gitavaisādṛśyapakṣo 'numānapūrvakopamānena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1711: pūtīkā na somasadṛśā iti tu pakṣa' śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1719_0: śabdenaiva tu somāṃśujātatvaṃ pūtīkānāṃ pratipādayatā kāryakāraṇayoraucityena sārūpyaṃpratipāditamiti
GSP28mimslovu:1719_1: śabdāvagatakāryakāramaprabhavatvāt pūtīkānāṃ somasādṛśyopamānasya tadviparyaya' śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1720: jyotiṣṭomikā hi dharmā' satrāhīneṣu na bhavantīti pakṣa upamānopamānena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1721: jyotiṣṭāmopamānena hi te dvādaśāhaṃ gacchanti dvādaśāhopamānena ca satrāhīnāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:1722: yadā tvātmendriyasādṛśyaviśiṣṭāni parendriyāṇyupamīyante tatra tanniṣedhor'thāpattyupamānena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1723: vedakāranāstitā śaśaśṛṅgādyabhāvasadṛśī na bhavatīti pakṣo 'bhāvapūrvākopamānena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1729: yadā tvamuṃ rāśiṃ sūryo gaco na veti cintyamāne gaṇitakuśalena gaṇitānumānābhāvānna gata ityavagate bhrānto gata iti vadati /
GSP28mimslovu:1733_0: tathā śabde śrotradeśamanāgacchati śrotre ca śabdeśaṃ dhvanāyāgamanamātreṇaiva śabdaśvaṇopapatteryor'thāpatyā
GSP28mimslovu:1733_1: śabda' śabdāntaramāramate tata' krameṇāntya' śrotreṇa gṛhyate ityanyathānupapattyā
GSP28mimslovu:1734: abhāvābhāvastyevaṃ darśayitavya'--- yadā hi kartrabhāvena vedānāṃ doṣābhāvo 'vagato bhavati tadā doṣavatpakṣasyābhāvābhāvena bādha iti ||69||
GSP28mimslovu:1736: dharmadharmyubhayasvarūpasvaviśeṣabādhamata' paraṃ vakṣyāma iti saṃkṣipya sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ śrotṛbuddhisamādhānārthaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:1741: adharmo vihito du'khaṃ koratyalpamitīha tu // Msv_5,4.72 //
GSP28mimslovu:1748: dharmadharmiṇorhi svarūpaṃ yena viśeṣeṇa vyāptaṃ tamākṣipati /
GSP28mimslovu:1751: tatra dharmasvarūpabādho varṇita eveti tamakṛtvaiva tadviviśeṣaṇabādhamudāharati---tṛṇādīti /
GSP28mimslovu:1752: yo hi tṛṇādivikāradarśanādagnimaddhimaṃ sādhayati tasyābhāvena tāvaddharmasvarūpabādho bhavatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:1754: na ca vācyamanuṣṇo 'pi vahni' prabhāsu dṛṣṭa iti kathamarthākṣipto viśeṣa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1763: dharmiṇastu dvaprakāro 'pi bādho 'nukta eveti ubhayathā tadbādhodāharaṇamāha---adharmaiti sārdhena /
GSP28mimslovu:1765: tad yadā vihito 'dharmo daikṣapaśuhiṃsadārayid du'khaṃ karotītyanūdyatadalpamiti sādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1766: tadāpi vihitatvenādharmataiva bādhyate tadviśeṣo 'pi du'khanimittatvaṃ yadarthākṣiptaṃ tadapi tenaiva bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1767: na hi vihitaṃ nāma kimapi du'khasya nidānaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1779: na cātra śrutyupātta eva svaviśeṣa iti codanīyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1783: yadā hi sarvajñānāni mithyeti sādhyate tadā dharmadharmigrāhiṇorapi jñānayormithyātvāt tadviśeṣaṇagrāhiṇośca mithyātvād bhavatyubhayasyaivobhayabādha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1784: ayaṃ ca dharmoktyobhayabādha iti śabdabādha eva niveśanīya iti samadhigataṃ tāvadubhayo' svarūpabādha iti ||74||
GSP28mimslovu:1787: bādhyete iti vipariṇamya sambandho darśayitavya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1791: taddhi liṅgaṃ na punardarśanamato vyākhyeyamekadeśadarśanādityata āha---- darśanāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:1797: parārthaprayoge tu ṇijantadarśanapadamekadeśaṃ darśayitvā yā buddhirjāyate sānumānamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1799: anena ca yatraikadeśe vādiprativādinorekasyobhayorvā saṃśayo 'dhīrviparyayo vā bhavati so 'siddhābhidhāno hetvābhāso vyudasyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1800: na hyasau tādṛśa' parasmai daraśayituṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1813: yadā vaiśiṣiko yājñikaṃ prati śabdo 'nitya' kṛtakatvāt guṇatvādveti hetuṃ prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimslovu:1815: yadā tu svayamevaṃprakāraṃ hetuṃ paraṃ prati vadati tadā tasyāsiddhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:1817: na hi vaiśiṣikā' śabdaṃ dravyamabhyupagacchanti guṇatvābhyupagamāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1820: yadā hi dhūmo bāṣpādibhāvena sandihyate dvābhyāmekena vā kiṃsvidayaṃ rajasāmudgamo bāṣpo vā dhūmo veti tadā dvayorapyantatarasya vā sandigdhāsiddho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1825: evaṃ tāvat svarūpato heturasiddho bhavatītyuktamityāha--- evamiti ||78||
GSP28mimslovu:1827: nanu svarūpāsiddhyāheturduṣyet āśrayāsiddhyā tu kastasya doṣa' ata āha---jñāte 'pīti /
GSP28mimslovu:1834: itarat sādhanaṃ tu syāt vādinā yadi sādhyate // Msv_5,4.82 //
GSP28mimslovu:1838: siddhaṃ hi svarūpeṇa jale śaityaṃ rūparūpirūpapaikārthasamavāyiṣu ca cākṣuṣatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:1839: śabdā(dau) hi pakṣadharmatayā tu tayorasiddhatvamiti taddharmarūpāsiddhavacanam /
GSP28mimslovu:1842: yadā hi boddhaṃ prati sarvatra kāryopalambhādātmana' sarvagatatvaṃ mīmāṃsakā' sādhayanti,
GSP28mimslovu:1845: yastu pramāṇagatimajānāno laukika' kaścidātmani saṃśete tasminneva hetāvucyamāne sadnigdhāśrayo heturityāha--- laukikāderiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1847: ādiśabdena satīrthikānāmapi yeṣāmātmani saṃśaya' ta upādriyante /
GSP28mimslovu:1850: yasya hi pakṣavacana' śabdo na prasiddhastaṃ pratyevañjātīyake hetāvucyamāne 'jñānenāśrayāsiddhiriti ||80||
GSP28mimslovu:1852: evaṃ tarhyamūrtatvādātmā niṣkriya ityevamāderapi hetutvaṃ na syāt digambarāṇāmātmano 'mūrtatvāsiddhe' /
GSP28mimslovu:1854: akartṛkatvānnityo veda iti ca bauddhānāṃ tadasiddherahetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:1865: vadhārito 'siddhobhavati, tasyaiva tathāviṣayasyāsiddhatāvacanaṃ vādino dūṣaṇaṃ bhavati nāsiddha iti
GSP28mimslovu:1875: yadi vādinā prayuṅkte sādhane prativādinā cāsiddhatva udbhāvite vādinā tatsādhanaṃ sādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1877: yadi tuparamārthopapattyābhidhānena prativādinā nirākriyate tatastasya dūṣaṇaṃ sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1879: dvābhyāṃ yo 'sattvato jñāta ityapi pramāṇasiddhyabhiprāyeṇoktam, nābhyupagamamātrāpekṣayā /
GSP28mimslovu:1883: yadvādinā sattvena jñātaṃ bhavati prativādinā ca vaiparityena,
GSP28mimslovu:1890: sādhite tu tasmin dūṣaṇaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavatīti ||82 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:1894: na hi sādhāraṇa' saṃśayahetu' prameyatvaṃ nityatvena jñātasambandhamiti śakyate vaktum,
GSP28mimslovu:1898: atra cāsannikṛṣṭapadāt, prabhṛti prātilobhyena vārtikakṛtā lakṣaṇagranthe viśeṣaṇopadānaphalamuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:1900: sat sādhye tadabhāve ca dvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtta eva ca // Msv_5,4.84 //
GSP28mimslovu:1909: tato jñātasambandhasyeti dṛṣṭāntadoṣā api sādhyahetuvikalatvādayo 'nena nirākriyante /
GSP28mimslovu:1910: tadvaikalye 'pi svayaṃ sambandho jñātuṃ parasmai pratipādayituṃ śakyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1911: kiyanta' puna' saṃśayahetava', āta āha---traya iti ||83 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:1921: ete ca dharmā' sādhyatadabhāvayo' sādhāraṇā ityartha' ||85||
GSP28mimslovu:1922: keṣu puna' sādhyeṣu teṣāṃ sādhāraṇyamata āha---nityeti nityeṣvantena /
GSP28mimslovu:1935: kiṃsvidayaṃ sthāṇurāhosvit puruṣa ityanavadhāraṇajñānātmaka' saṃśayo jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1937: nityānityayo' sāmānyaṃ viditavatastadviśeṣamasmaraṇāpekṣastayorevānirdhāraṇātmaka' pratyaya' saṃśayāparanāmā jāyata iti prameyatvaṃ saṃśayahetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:1939: tathā yatnottha' śabda' anityatvādityayamapi sādhāraṇa eva /
GSP28mimslovu:1940: ayatnottheṣu keṣucidvidyudādiṣu gatatvādyatnottheṣu ca sarveṣu ghaṭādiṣu vṛtte' /
GSP28mimslovu:1942: tathā yatnottha' śabda' anityatvāditi, yatnottheṣu sarveṣvevānityatā dṛṣṭā /
GSP28mimslovu:1943: tadabhāve 'pi kvacinmeghādau dṛṣṭā, na vyomādau iti,
GSP28mimslovu:1946: amūrtatā hi na sarvanityavyāpinī vyomādiṣu bhāvādaṇuṣu cābhāvādanityamapi na svaṃ vyāpnoti ghaṭakuḍyādiṣvabhāvāt karmādiṣu bhāvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1947: sarvatra cātra dvayavṛttitvameva heto' saṃśaye kāraṇavṛttyaṃśastu sannapi na kāraṇamityatantram /
GSP28mimslovu:1948: ata eva sādhāraṇasya caturdhāvibhāgaṃ vadanti ye teṣāmasāvanupayogyeva sādhanadūṣaṇayorityupekṣayoravṛttyaṃśa' kvacidupayujyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1949: aṇvāpi hi mātrayā vipakṣe vartamāno hetustyājya eva /
GSP28mimslovu:1951: vārtikakāreṇāpi sarvasādhāraṇeṣu dvayavṛttitvameva saṃśayakāraṇamiti darśayitumudāharaṇaprapañco darśita',
GSP28mimslovu:1958: na tāṃ vihāya nityamanityaṃ vā bhāvāntaramāśrayayatītyasādhāraṇa iti gīyata /
GSP28mimslovu:1966: yuktaṃ hi pakṣadvayāvalambī sādhāraṇo dvayoranavasthādhiyamādadhāno yatsaṃśayaheturiti,
GSP28mimslovu:1967: asādhāraṇastu dvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtto naikatrāpi dhiyamupajanayitumalāmiti kathamasya saṃśayahetubhāva',
GSP28mimslovu:1969: hetorhi niścayajanane 'nvayavyatirekāvaṅgamanyatarāpāye 'pi na niścayāya hetu' paryāpto bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1970: tad yathā sādharaṇo 'nvayasanātho 'pi vinākṛto vyatirekeṇa na niścayāya prabhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:1971: evamevāsādharaṇo 'pi niścayasyaikenānvayanāmnāṅgena vilastamakurvan saṃśayahetutāṃ pratipadyata iti ||86 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:1972: nanūktaṃ sādhāraṇo dvayagāmī dvaye buddhiṃ janayan saṃśaye heturiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1973: asādhāraṇastu na kiñcid jñāpayatīti nāsāvekāṅgavikalatāmātreṇa saṃśayaheturiti yuktamata āha---sādhāraṇaiti dvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:1976: viruddhe dyubhayasmin pratipādite tayorekatra samavāyasambhavād vyāghātādeva saṃśayo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1978: asādhāraṇo 'pi dyubhayasmād vyāvṛttestadabhāvaṃ gamayan dvayābhāvāsambhavādeva saṃśayaṃ janayati /
GSP28mimslovu:1979: na hi sambhavati nityamanityaṃ ca vastu na bhavatīti,
GSP28mimslovu:1985: ayaṃ cātrāvayavārtha'---yathā prameyatvādi' sādhāraṇo dṛṣṭa' san buddhidvayanimittaka' /
GSP28mimslovu:1988: sādhyatadabhāvaviṣayaṃ hi buddhidvayaṃ nimittīkṛtya viruddhaikānavāptereva sādhāraṇena saṃśayo janyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1995: so 'pi hi yatra nitye 'nitye vā nāsti tadabhāvaṃ pratipādya tanmukhena dvayasattvavirodhamāpādayan saṃśayakāraṇaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:1997: avyavasthayā hyubhayasmin manasi viparivartamāne saṃśayo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1998: na cāsādhāraṇena kiñcid buddhāvādhīyate, tasya kenacidanvayābhāvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1999: api ca parimiteṣveva bhāveṣu saṃśayo dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:2000: nivṛttimukhena tu saṃśayajanane sarvato nivṛttenāsādhāraṇena sarvatomukha' saṃśayo janyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:2003: naca kvacinnivṛttimātreṇa sarvatrābhāva' śakyate 'vagantum, yanmukhena saṃśayo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2005: agnāvanuvartamāno hi dhūmo dṛṣṭavyatireko 'gniniyatasvabhāvatvenāvagator'thādadṛśyamānebhyo 'vagnibhyo vyatiricyata ityavagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2006: yastu na kenacidanvitastasya kathamanupalabdhiyogyāt sarvato vyatireka' pratīyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:2008: yadi tvasādhāraṇadharmāṇobhāvā nityānityabhāvabhājo dṛṣṭā iti kṣitimapi taddharimikāmupalabhya nityā vā syādanityā veti saṃśayo bhavatītyucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2010: anyo hyasādhāraṇadharma' anyā ca bahusādhāraṇī tadvattā /
GSP28mimslovu:2011: tad yadyasau saṃśayakāraṇaṃ jātā kiṃ jātamasādhāraṇasya /
GSP28mimslovu:2012: hantaivaṃ sādhāraṇa eva saṃśayaheturabhyupagato bhavatīti siddham /
GSP28mimslovu:2022: na hyanavyavasāyo nāma kaścid jñānasya prakāra', yamayaṃ janayet /
GSP28mimslovu:2039: bhavati hi taddarśina' kīdṛgdharmo 'yamito dharmād bhāvo bhavediti
GSP28mimslovu:2041: yadyapi cāsau śuddhadharmidarśanādapi kadācid bhavatyeva tathāpi dharmadvāreṇāpi tāvad bhavatyeveti na taddhetutvamanupapannam /
GSP28mimslovu:2050: śākyāstu saṃśayahetumasādhāraṇaṃ manyante, udāharanti ca śabdānityatve sādhye śrāvaṇatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:2055: idaṃ ca vārttikakṛtaiva pradeśāntare svayamupanyasya yathoktadūṣaṇairdūṣi tameveti ||88||
GSP28mimslovu:2059: amūrtatā hi nityatve sādhye nityānityavyomakarmasādhāraṇī saṃśayaheturāsīdat,
GSP28mimslovu:2060: saiva tu niṣkriyatve sādhye labdhvānvayavyatirekau hetutāṃ
GSP28mimslovu:2070: gandhaviśeṣadarśino hi viditavyāpte' kṣityekadeśasiddhatve bhavatyānumāniko nirṇaya iti ||90 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2073: yatra hi na sākṣātkārijñānaviṣayo vāyu' arūpatvādityeka' sādhayati /
GSP28mimslovu:2088: siddhe ca vastuni vikalpāsambhavāt bādhyabādhakabhāvasyāpi tulyakakṣyatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2092_0: yathā sarvajño 'stīti buddhavacanaṃ samyak taduktatvād kṣaṇabhaṅgādivākyavadityekenokte
GSP28mimslovu:2092_1: 'para' prabravīti buddho 'sarvajña iti madvacanaṃ samyak maduktatvāt yathā jyotiruṣṇamāpo dravā iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2095: ato 'prasiddhāṅgakatvāt pūrva sādhanaṃ balavatā prasiddhāṅgakena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2096: yattu viruddhāvyabhicārī saṃśaye heturiti śākyā vadanti /
GSP28mimslovu:2111: viruddhārthasambandhau saṃśayahetū iti dvivacanāntenaiva nāmnā saṃśayahetubhāvo darśita' /
GSP28mimslovu:2116: imāṃ ca viruddhāvyabhicāritāṃ saṃśayahetuṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇābhyāṃ jātyantarameke varṇayanti /
GSP28mimslovu:2120: atra ca pradeśāntare vārtikakṛtā sādhāraṇya evāsthā darśitā /
GSP28mimslovu:2126: yadi hyekena dvayaṃ prayujyeta tato bhavedapyevaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2127: pratyekamanvitau dṛṣṭau dvābhyāṃ prayuktau nānanvitāviti śakyate vaktum /
GSP28mimslovu:2132: yathā hi na dvayamekena prayuktamiti nāsādhāraṇatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:2135: ekaikasyaikaikena vyāptasyaikaikena prayogāt, aṃśata' sādhāraṇasya ca samudāyasyāprayogāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2136: ata eva cātra sādhāraṇād bhedena pratihetu viruddhayo' saṃśayahetutvamuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:2139: sādhāraṇo hyubhayadṛṣṭastu pratītimādadhāna' saṃśayaheturimau tvekaikaśyenobhayamupasthāpayantau saṃśayahetū iti vārtikakāreṇāpi sādhāraṇapade sthita ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:2143: pratijñā yatra bādhyeta pūrvoktairyasya sādhanai' // Msv_5,4.93 //
GSP28mimslovu:2145: kvacit saṃśayahetū yau pratyekatvena lakṣitau // Msv_5,4.94 //
GSP28mimslovu:2146: kathaṃ punarevañjātīyake viṣaye nirṇaya', ata āha---pratijñetinirṇayāntena /
GSP28mimslovu:2149: yathehaiva tāvat udāharaṇe tvagindriyavyāpāreṇa vāyāvaparokṣamanubhūyamāne tenaivānubhavena parokṣatāpakṣo bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2153: na hi prabalena marutābhihanyamānasya jalaṃ vā śliṣyata' saṃvida viśiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2165: 'rudro hi mahāvrataṃ cacāra sa etacchavaśīrṣamupadadhāre'ti tvarthavādamātraṃ na śavaśirodhāraṇavidhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:2166: atra ca pratyakṣādīnyeva yathāsvamarthaṃ sādhayantīti sādhanapadenocyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2168: teṣvapi sāmānyato darśanena bādhasya śaṅkyamānatvādata āha--- bādhavarjanāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2169: na tāvat teṣu bādho dṛśyate, kadācid bādhasambhāvanā tu na teṣāṃ prāmāṇyamutsārayīti ||93 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2170: atra bhikṣuṇā 'pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto heturityekavacanena vivakṣitaikasaṅkhya eka eva heturiti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:2180: viruddhau hi dvābhyāṃ dvāvarthāvekatropaplāvitāviti tatra saṃśerate /
GSP28mimslovu:2186: tadatraikasyaiva saṃśayahetutvaṃ dvābhyāmeva tu nirṇaya ityaprayojakaṃ saṃśayahetutve dvitvaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2188: yathā khalveka eva sādhārama' sapakṣavipakṣayorvartamāna' saṃśayaheturbhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2189: evaṃ viruddhārthasyāpi hetudvayasyāṃśābhyāmubhayavṛttireva saṃśaye kāraṇamiti na taddvitvena hetutvanirākaraṇaṃ yuktamityāha---kvaciditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2191: tāvadūrdhvatayā sthāṇupuruṣasandeho bhavatīti, kākavattāmātreṇa na saṃśayo dṛṣṭapūrva' /
GSP28mimslovu:2193: yastu kākavattāmātreṇa sthāṇuṃ siṣādhayiṣati tasyāsau kevalā saṃśayahetu',
GSP28mimslovu:2195: api ca avirodhino' pratyekaṃ saṃhatayorapi kvacidarthe sādhye hetubhāvo dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2197: śakyate hi tābhyāmaikaikaśyena samastābhyāṃ cānumānatvaṃ sādhayitum /
GSP28mimslovu:2198: dvitve ca hetvābhāsatvakāraṇe naikasmin sādhye 'nekahetava' prayujyeran /
GSP28mimslovu:2199: prayoktārastvekameva sādhyaṃ kiñcānyaditaśceti nānāsādhanai' sādhayanto dṛśyante /
GSP28mimslovu:2200: tasmād virodhanibandhana evapa saṃśaya', na tu nānātvanibandhana ityabhiprāyeṇāha--- pratyekamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2202: ga atra tu pratyekaṃ gamakāvapi saṃhatau ca gamakāviti pratipāditamiti ||95||
GSP28mimslovu:2213: anye tūbhayavirothayo' pratyekapakṣānatirekāt cāturvidhyaṃ pratipannā ityāha--- caturdhā
GSP28mimslovu:2215: vayaṃ tu iṣṭavighātamātreṇaikameva prakāraṃ saṅgirāmaha ityāha--- ekadhāpi veti /
GSP28mimslovu:2217: api vā śeṣabhājāṃ syāditi pakṣabādha eva viruddhatve kāraṇaṃ kimavāntarabhedopanyāseneti /
GSP28mimslovu:2218: triṣvapi ca prakāreṣu śrutyarthopāttasya pratijñātārthasya bādhāyāṃ viruddhatāmāhurityāha--- śrutyārthoktasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:2223: tadasmin pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetorviruddhatā bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2225: kathaṃ hi pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne heturviruddho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2226: sa hi pratijñārthaṃ pratijñārthena bādhyate yadviruddho bhavet prasiddhatvādasya /
GSP28mimslovu:2227: prasiddhaṃ hi ghaṭasya kṛtakatvaṃ, na tadaprasiddhayā nityatayā bādhituṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:2229: vārtikakṛtā tu paraprasiddhimātreṇa viruddha ityuktāmiti veditavyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2234: na ca viśeṣaṇamanabhidhāya viśiṣṭo 'bhidhātuṃ śakyata iti svarūpameva tāvadādau śabdo
GSP28mimslovu:2243: svarūpaṃ tu na kadācid vyabhicarati sambandhāvadhāraṇātprāgapi tadavagamāt,
GSP28mimslovu:2247: evaṃ prasādhyānte prayogamāhu'--- śabdasvarūpaṃ sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāgarthavad vibhaktisambandhāt,
GSP28mimslovu:2249: yadā ca vibhaktiyoga' tadārthavattvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā sambandhagrahaṇāt paścāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2250: kathaṃ punarevaṃ prayujyamāne dharmaviśeṣabādho bhavatyata āha--- svarūpeṇeti cāśrita iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2253: evaṃ ca bhavatyarthākṣiptasya dharmaviśeṣasya bādha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2254: kathaṃ puna' svarūpeṇeti cāśrite dharmaviśeṣo bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2259: ator'thavattāyā viśeṣaṃ svasvarūpārthavattvaṃ heturayaṃ viruṇaddhīti bhavati dharmaviśeṣabādha iti ||99 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2261: yadā hisamavāyadharmiṇaṃ kṛtvā tasya dravyādivyatireka' sādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2262: ihapratyahetutvaṃ ca heturucyate ihāyaṃ ghaṭa iti,
GSP28mimslovu:2270: nityamātmāstitā kaiścid yadā sautrāntikaṃ prati // Msv_5,4.103 //
GSP28mimslovu:2275: kathaṃ punaratrodāharaṇe dharmisvarūpabādha', ata āha--- atrāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2277: ihapratyayahetutvaṃ hyasamavāyātmana eva dṛṣṭamiti tādrūpyaṃ virundhyāditi dharmisvarūpabādha iti ||101 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2279: samavāyo hi sattāsāmānyavadekarūpa iti kāṇādā manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:2280: so 'pyasya viśeṣa' saṃyogavadbhedāpatterbādhyata iti bhavati dharmiviśeṣaviruddho heturiti ||102 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2282: yadā kaścit sautrāntikaṃ pratyevaṃ sādhayati--- ātmā nitya' niravayatvāt vyomavaditi,
GSP28mimslovu:2284: sautrāntikasya hyavayavābhāvo vyomnyabhāvenaiva sambaddho 'bhimata ityātmano 'pi tadvadabhāvaṃ gamayeta,
GSP28mimslovu:2287: ato 'navayavatvādātmana' svarūpasya taddharmasya ca nityatvasya bādhādubhayabādha iti ||103 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2289: yadā hi parārthāścakṣurādaya' saṅghātatvāt śayanādivaditi sādhyate, tadobhayaviśeṣabādha ityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:2290: kathaṃ punaratrobhayaviśeṣabādha', ata āha--- śayana iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2297: hikhaṭvādau mahābhūtasaṃhataśarīrapārārthyena saṅghātatvāditi heturvyāpto dṛṣṭa iti saṃhatapārārthyameva sādhayet /
GSP28mimslovu:2298: ātmānaṃ ca prati pārārthyaṃ sādhayitumabhimatam, tanna sidhyet /
GSP28mimslovu:2299: so 'yaṃ tāvat pārārthyasya dharmasya yo viśeṣo 'bhimata ātmapārārthyaṃ sa tāvad bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2300: cakṣurāderapi dharmiṇo yo viśeṣa āhaṅkārikatvaṃ nāma so 'pyanenaiva hetunā bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2304: āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇīti kāpilā' saṅgirante, teṣāṃ cāyaṃ prayoga' /
GSP28mimslovu:2305: tadayamartha'--- saṃhatapārārthyabhautikatvābhyāṃ vyāpto heturyasmin śayane tatrātmapārārthyamasiddhamiti dharmaviśeṣabādhanaṃ tāvad bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2306: dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi bhautikavayāptyā sūtrito 'nantarameva vivariṣyata iti na kevalamātmapārārthyaṃ na sidhyati,
GSP28mimslovu:2307: asaṃhatarūpātmapārārthye ceṣṭe vyāptibalenātmano 'pi saṃhatatā prāpnotītyāha--- asaṃhateti /
GSP28mimslovu:2330: sādhya' pakṣa' tatsādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ yo dṛṣṭānta' sa pratipādyata ityartha' ||107 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2337: yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimāniti yāvaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2340: evaṃ copādīyamāna uddeśyo dhūmādirvyāptatayā kathito bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:2343: yadvṛttatadvṛttābhyāṃ yattatpariniṣpannānāṃ yo ya ityādiśabdānāmupādānam, tadayamartho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2344: yadyad yadvṛttena saṃyuktaṃ prathamaṃ prayujyate pradhānaṃ ca taduddeśyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2345: tattadvṛttuyaktaṃ ca paścāt prayujyamānaṃ sa so 'gnimāneveti caivakāreṇa yuktaṃ tadupādeyam /
GSP28mimslovu:2348: vadatyarthaṃ svaśaktyā ca śabdo vaktranapekṣayā // Msv_5,4.110 //
GSP28mimslovu:2351: viparyayeṇa vā hetau na pyāptatvaṃ vivakṣati /
GSP28mimslovu:2352: vivakṣannapi vā śabdaṃ tadyogaṃ na vaded yadi // Msv_5,4.112 //
GSP28mimslovu:2353: ghaṭe kṛtakanāśitve nāśi vyāptaṃ kṛtena vā /
GSP28mimslovu:2354: na tadeṣṭasya hetutvaṃ syādaniṣṭasya caiva tat // Msv_5,4.113 //
GSP28mimslovu:2357: te yathā tathā vā prayuktā yathābhiprāyaṃ vartiṣyanta eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2360: svābhāvikyaiva tu śaktyā kecideva kvacidevārthe vartante,
GSP28mimslovu:2361: ato na vivakṣānusāreṇeṣṭasiddhirbhavatīti vācya eva dṛṣṭāntavacanavinyāsaprakāra iti ||110||
GSP28mimslovu:2362: yadi tarhi svatantrā' śabdā' atathāsthite 'pyarthe śabdānusāriṇīṣṭasiddhirbhavedata āha---sādhyahetutvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2367: arthādīnāṃ kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ vyāptiśaktyanurodhādeva sādhyahetubhāvo bhavati na śabdānurodhāditi ||110 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2368: vaktranapekṣayā svaśaktyaiva śabder'thamācakṣāṇe yattāvadāpadyate tad darśayati---tatrājñānāditi sārdhadvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:2369: yadā hi dṛṣṭānta vaktumanabhijño vaktā sādhyahetvo' sahabhāvamātraṃ vivakṣati /
GSP28mimslovu:2370: yathā--- śabdo 'nitya' kṛtakatvāditi prayoge,yathā ghaṭe kṛtakatvanāśitve sta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2372: satyāmapi vivakṣāyāṃ kutaścid bhramanimittāt na vyāptiyogyaṃ śabdaṃ vadati /
GSP28mimslovu:2374: viparītaṃ vā bhrānta' yatā nāsitā kṛtakatvena vyāpteti,
GSP28mimslovu:2375: tadā tāvanna kevalamiṣṭaṃ na sidhyati aniṣṭameva tu vyāptiviparyayādāpadyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2379: yadā samyak prayukte 'pi vākyer'tho na tathā bhavet // Msv_5,4.114 //
GSP28mimslovu:2387: aniṣṭasyaiva tu nāśitvasya bhavedityevañjātīyakāniṣṭaprayoganivāraṇāya yukto dṛṣṭāntaprayoganiyama iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2390: arthānāṃ śabdatantratve yad bhavati tad darśayati---yadetipādarahitadvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:2391: asyārtha'--- yadā hi vyāptiśaktyanusāreṇaivārthānāṃ sādhyahetutvaṃ tadā yadyapi vaktrā na sahabāvamātraṃ darśitaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2393: arthāstu na tadanurūpavyāpyavyāpakabhāvanāvasthitā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavediti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2394: yathā nityo dhvaniramūrtatvāditi prayoge karmavat paramāṇuvad ghaṭavad vyomavaditi dṛṣṭānteṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ paramārthata' sādhyahetūbhayavyāptiśūnyatayā /
GSP28mimslovu:2395: karma khalvanityamiti tat sādhyabhūtayā nityatayā śūnyaṃ, hetustvamūrtavāditi tatra vidyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2396: paramāṇavastu bhūrtā iti teṣu hetuśūnyatā, sādhyaṃ tu nityatvaṃ teṣu vidyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2397: ghaṭe tu na sādhyaṃ nityatvaṃ nāpyamūrtatvaṃ heturityubhayaśūnyatā /
GSP28mimslovu:2398: vyomni tu dṛṣṭānte vyāptiśūnyatāmuttaratra svayameva vivariṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:2399: atraiva ca vyomavaditi dṛṣṭānte tadasadvādinaṃ sautrāntikaṃ prati prayujyamāne dharmyasiddhyā
GSP28mimslovu:2404: vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyamapekṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2405: sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyā tu yadā vyāptiṃ na lakṣayet // Msv_5,4.118 //
GSP28mimslovu:2406: para' sādharmyadṛṣṭāntāt taṃ vā nāpekṣate yadā /
GSP28mimslovu:2407: vaktā vā sahabāvitvaṃ śuddhaṃ tena vaded yadā // Msv_5,4.119 //
GSP28mimslovu:2409: vyomna' sadbhāvo bhavet, tacca hetusādhyadvayayuktaṃ nityatvādamūrtatvācca /
GSP28mimslovu:2410: tathāpi karmādiṣvamūrteṣu anityeṣvālocyamāneṣu hetorvyāptirnāstīti īdṛśasyāpi dṛṣṭāntasya varjanameva /
GSP28mimslovu:2411: ayamapi na sādhyasiddhye samartho yata iti ||117||
GSP28mimslovu:2415: kiṃ sarvadaiva sādharmyavad vaidharmyavacanaṃ kāryaṃ na veti /
GSP28mimslovu:2416: tatra tāvad vyatirekapradhānavādina' sarvadā vācyamiti ye vadanti tān pratyāha---vyāptyā sādharmya ukta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2417: evaṃ hi manyate--- vyāptiprajñāpanāya hi dṛṣṭāntavacanam,
GSP28mimslovu:2418: sā cet sādharmyavacanena jñāpitā kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena /
GSP28mimslovu:2422: ato yadi vyāptyā sahitaṃ sādharmyamuktam, alaṃ vaidharmyavacaneneti /
GSP28mimslovu:2423: kadā tarhi vaidharmyaṃ vācyamata āha--- sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyeti pādatrayeṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:2424: yadā hi vaktrā samyageva dṛṣṭānta ukte para' śrotā jānāti--- yathā hetusādhyayo' sāhityamātranenoktaṃ na vyāptiriti,
GSP28mimslovu:2425: tadā sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvaṃ jñāpayituṃ 'vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhana'miti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2426: yadā khalvabhyastavaidharmyastamevāpekṣate na sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaṃ tadā ca vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanamityāha--- taṃ vā nāpekṣate yadeti /
GSP28mimslovu:2427: yadā vā vaktā suśikṣitavaidharmya' sādharmyaṃ vaktumajānānastena sādharmyadṛṣṭāntena sahabhāvamātrameva śuddhaṃ vyāptihīnaṃ kathayati,
GSP28mimslovu:2428: tadāpi paryanuyuktena tenaiva vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanaṃ kāryamityāha--- vaktā veti ||119||
GSP28mimslovu:2440: nanvanvayavaipītye sa eva yathāvat pratipādyatāṃ kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena /
GSP28mimslovu:2442: kintu bhrāntairidamasmābhiruktaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvo vivakṣita iti vaidharmyeṇāpi tāvadiṣṭasādhanaṃ bhavetyeveti /
GSP28mimslovu:2443: yattu tatpūrvaṃ sāhityamātramuktaṃ tadvaidharmya evopayujyate tasyaiveṣṭaṃ sādhayato 'nugrahe vartate ityāha--- sāhityamātramiti ||120 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2447: yadā hi dhūmabhāvo 'gnibhāvena vyāpto bhavati tadānagniragnyabhāvastato dhūmāt pracyuta' sannadhūme dhamābhāva eva bhavatītyevaṃ tāvad vyāpto bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2448: yo hi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati sa tanniyatastadvyāpta ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2449: yathā dhūmo 'gnāveva bhavannagninā vyāpta iti siddho 'bhāvayorvyāptiviparyaya iti ||122 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2450: yata eva cābhāvayorīdṛśo vyāpavyāpakabhāva' ata eva bhāvayorabhimatavyāptisiddhirityāha---tathānagnāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:2451: anagnāvagnyabhāve dhūmābhāvena vyāpte dhūmastatra virodhivyāpteralabdhāvakāśo 'gnāveva bhavatītyevaṃ tadvyāpyatā tasya sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:2456: vyāpakau tu yadocyete bhāvābhāvau tadā tata' // Msv_5,4.124 //
GSP28mimslovu:2458: tasmād dhūmena sādhyatvamagne' prārthayate yadā // Msv_5,4.125 //
GSP28mimslovu:2462: yatrāpyarthasya śūnytavaṃ dvābhyāmekena vā bhavet // Msv_5,4.127 //
GSP28mimslovu:2464: yadā hi ya eva bhāvo vyāpakastadabhāva eva vyāpakatayā vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate tadā tato vyāpyād dhūmādernaiva vipakṣasyānagnyāde' pracyuti' kathitā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2465: tatakathanārthaṃ ca va vaidharmyavacanaṃ(sa) prayojanaṃ bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2466: na hi yatra dhūmastatrāgniritivat yatra dhūmābhāvastatrāgnyabhāva iti kathyamāne vyāpyād dhūmādanagnervipakṣasya nivṛttirdarśitā bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2467: ato dhūmenāgniṃ siṣādhayiṣatā vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntenāgnidhūmābhāvayorvyāptiviparyayo vācya ityāha--- tasmāditi vācyo 'ntena /
GSP28mimslovu:2468: yatrāgnirnāsti tatra dhūmo nāstītyevaṃ yadavṛttatadavṛttābhyāmuddeśyopādeyabhāvo darśayitavya ityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:2469: sa cānagniradhūmen vyāpta ucyamāno nānyathā vācya',
GSP28mimslovu:2473: yathaiva sādharmyadṛṣṭānte svaśaktyā śabdor'thaṃ vadati nārthaśaktimanurudhyata iti sāhityamātravacane vyāptiviparyaye vā neṣṭaṃ sidhyatītyuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:2476_0: dihāpyartho na śabdavaśavartīti yatrārtho dṛṣṭāntarūpo dvābhyāṃ hetusādhyābhāvābhyāmekena
GSP28mimslovu:2476_1: vā tayo' śūnyo bhavati tatrāpi na prastutopakāro bhavati anyadvāniṣṭaṃ prasajyata
GSP28mimslovu:2481: sādhyena vyāptisiddhyai hi vyātireko 'tra kathyate // Msv_5,4.128 //
GSP28mimslovu:2483: tena dṛṣṭe 'pi sāhitye na sarvo gamya iṣyate // Msv_5,4.129 //
GSP28mimslovu:2487: nityo dhvaniramūrtatvādityatraiva prayoge yadaivaṃ vaidharmyamucyate yannityaṃ na bhavati tadamūrtamapi na bhavati yathā paramāṇuriti tadā sādhyābhāvaśūnyo dṛṣṭānta' /
GSP28mimslovu:2491: khavaditi tūbhayābhāvaśūnyatā, nityāmūrte tasminnubhayābhāvo duradhigamo yata iti ||127 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2495: nāsau sādhyena vyāpto bhavatītyasatyāṃ vyāptāvanarthakaṃ tādṛśasya vaidharmyasya vacanamityabhiprāyeṇāha--- sādhyeneti ||128 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2496: yataścaivañjātīyako na sādhyena vyāpyate tena kvacidabhāvayo' sāhitye dṛṣṭe 'pi na sarvatra gamyagamakabhāvo bhavatītyāha---teneti /
GSP28mimslovu:2497: yadyapi yannityaṃ na bhavati tadamūrtamapi na bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:2500: tathāpi na sarva(') śabdādi(') nityatayā viśiṣṭo 'nena hetunā gamya iṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2514: tāvatā na hyanaṅgatvaṃ yukti' śābde 'bhidhāsyate // Msv_5,4.132 //
GSP28mimslovu:2515: 'vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyapekṣyate' ityucyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2516: na hi śatāṃśenāpi hetorvipakṣād vyatireke śaṅkyamāne gamakatvamastītyaśeṣavipakṣo 'numāturvyatirekaṃ grahītumapekṣita' /
GSP28mimslovu:2518: darśanaṃ hi sarvavipakṣāṇāṃ duṣkaram, tadabhāvastu saukaryaprāpta eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2522: vipakṣadarśane tu heto' paripanthinyavinābhāvo grahītumaśakyo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2523: taccaikadeśasthasyāpi tāvannāstyeveti paripanthini vṛttimātre darśanaṃ vyāpriyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2524: ato yadaivāgnikāryo dhūma ityavagataṃ tadaiva tadāyattātmalābho nāsati tasmin bhavatīti jñāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2525: na cānvayajñānameva vyatirekabuddhau nibandhanam, asādhāraṇeṣu tadasambhavāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2528: tat kuto 'nvaya' kutastarāṃ ca tannibandhano vyatireka' /
GSP28mimslovu:2529: na ca viśeṣeṣu sāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcidanugataṃ svarūpamasti,
GSP28mimslovu:2532: ato viśeṣā eva kecit kayācid vyāvṛttyopalakṣitā' kañcid viśeṣaṃ vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena gamayantīti tatpradarśanārthaṃ vaidharmyavacanameva nyāyyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2537: na ca kāryatvāvadhāraṇādasati kāraṇe 'bhāva', tasyaivāsati vyatireke duradhigamatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2538: yaddhi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati tattatkāryam /
GSP28mimslovu:2542: asti sāmānyavastveṣu vyāpitā tatra gamyatām // Msv_5,4.133 //
GSP28mimslovu:2545: astu vā darśanamātrād vyatireka', tasya ca saukaryaṃ, naitāvatānumāṃ prati yuktiranaṅgam /
GSP28mimslovu:2552: yathokta eva siddhānta' samyak sādharmyaprayoge na vaidharmyamapekṣaṇīyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2555: ata' sa tāvad vidhimukhena prathamaṃ darśayitavya', avasare tu vaidharmyamapi kadāciducyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2556: anaṅgatvamiti tu paṭhatāmiyaṃ vyākhyā---idaṃ hi liṅgasyānumāyāmaṅgatvam yadanvayavyatirekau,
GSP28mimslovu:2558: ato yathā vyatireko 'ṅgatvam, ka evamanvayāparanāmā yuktirapīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2559: nanu liṅge 'pi śabdātmake pratītyuttarakālabhāvyanvayo 'naṅgamevāta āha--- śābde 'bhidhāsyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2560: śābde hyanumānād bhinne pratītyuttarakālabhāvinī yuktiranaṅgamiti vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2565: ye tu tāvatā nānaṅgatvamanvayasyetyadhyāhṛtyātraivārthe śābde yuktirvakṣyate iti vyācakṣate,
GSP28mimslovu:2571: yattu bhedānāmevānumāne gamyagamakatvaṃ teṣāṃ cānvayo na sambhavatītyuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:2581: na cāsati tasminnānumānāṅgaṃ sambhavatīti teṣāmanvayābhāvo na doṣāyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:2587: tathāhi tasya nipuṇato nirūpyaṇāṇasyā-- sambhavād vibhrama evāyam /
