GSP28mimslovu:2590: pratibandhabalena tu kiñcideva svalakṣaṇaṃ kenāpi vikalpākāreṇa sāmānyātmanā samadhigataṃ yadaparaṃ vikalpākārollikhitameva svalakṣaṇaṃ pratilambhayati tatpramāṇamityākhyāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2598: te ca na bhājanamanvayasyeti yuktamevoktamata āha--- astīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2600: bhavedevaṃ yadi na bhedātiriktaṃ kiñcit sāmānyaṃ vastu bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2604: evaṃ ca yadanumānuprāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ parai' kimapi kāśaṃ kuśamavalambyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2606: anyanmataṃ vyāptyāpi sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ukte vaidharmyamapi vācyamiti,
GSP28mimslovu:2613: vyāvṛtti' sarvata' prāptā sādhyābhāve niyamyate // Msv_5,4.135 //
GSP28mimslovu:2620: tadā heto sādhyenaivāgnināvadhārite sarvato 'gnoranyamātrād vyāvṛtti' prāpnoti,
GSP28mimslovu:2624: ata' sādhyābhāva eva vyāvṛttiṃ niyantuṃ sarvadaiva vaidharmyavacanamarthavat /
GSP28mimslovu:2625: sati hi tasminnagnyabhāve dhūmo na bhavatītyāveditaṃ, bhavatīti ||135||
GSP28mimslovu:2632: ata' sādharmyadṛṣṭānte 'pi vyāpyā dhūmādervyāpakābhāvanivṛtti mātremeva darśayitavyam,
GSP28mimslovu:2641: atra bhāṣyam--- 'tattu dvividhaṃ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca /
GSP28mimslovu:2643: sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca yathā--- devadattasya gatipūrvikāṃ deśāntaraprāptimupalabhyāditye 'pi gatismaraṇam' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2645: atra kecinnītijñaṃmanyā avadhṛtasvalaśraṇameva kvacidanumānena sāmānyato gṛhyata iti manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:2648: kathaṃ punaradṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇena sambandhadarśanam, utpattimata' phalasya darśanāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2649: yadyapyanavadhṛtasvalakṣaṇena vastunā viśeṣata' sambandho 'navagata', sāmānyatastu dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2650: sarvaṃ hi kādācitkaṃ phalaṃ kutaścidāgantukādutpattimato jāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP28mimslovu:2652: ato devadattasya bhūtapūrvottaradeśavibhāgasaṃyogau kadācidupalabhyāgantuka' ko 'pi heturanumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2655: agnyādiṣu tu pratyakṣata' svalakṣa āvadhāraṇāt prāk pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhamanumānamāhu' /
GSP28mimslovu:2656: na ca dravyameva saṃyogavibhāgayo' kāraṇamiti vaktavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:2658: na ca dravyāntarāgama eva śakyeta kalpayituṃ, tasya pūrvadravyapratyabhijñayā bādhitatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2659: na ca sadṛśāparāparotpattivipralabdhā bhedaṃ na budhyanta iti sāmpratam,
GSP28mimslovu:2665: bhāṣyakāro darśayati--- yathā vakṣyati“na hi te pratyakṣe“iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2667: vyaktameva deśāntaraprāptiphalonnīyamānatvameva karmaṇo darśayatīti siddhaṃ kriyādīnāṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaikaviṣayatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:2668: evaṃ ca prameyadvaividhyādanumānadvaividhyopapattiriti ye vadanti tān pratyāha---dvaividhyaṃ nopapannamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2676: pratyakṣameva hi vayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpnuvantaṃ devadattaṃ gacchatīti manyāmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:2679: nanu devadatte deśasaṃyogavibhāgātiriktamaparaṃ karmaṇa' kimapi rūpamaparokṣamīkṣamahe /
GSP28mimslovu:2681: jātervā vyaktito vya(tiriktā) yā' kiṃ rūpamanubhūyate, yadasau pratyakṣaviṣayatayāvasīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2682: rūpameva sā vyakte', kimasyā rūpāntareṇeti cet, karma vā kimarūpam /
GSP28mimslovu:2683: idamapi hi tato na bhidyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2685: ato jātikalpanāvat karmakalpanāmapi pratyakṣapakṣa eva nikṣipanta' pañcadhā savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vibhajāmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:2691: na caiṣa devadattamiva calantaṃ spandamānamādityamapi paśyatīti dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2693: saṃyogavibhāgau tu tasyāpi pratīyete eveti tulya(va?svā)
GSP28mimslovu:2695: api ca vibhāgopakrame saṃyogāvasāne ca karmaṇi tata unnīyamāne gacchatīti vartamānanirbhāsa' pratyayo na bhavet,
GSP28mimslovu:2700: sthāṇau ca śyenaviyukte śyena iva karmānumīyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:2702: yadi mataṃ na vibhāgamātrāt karmānumānam, api tarhi vibhāgapūrvākāt saṃyogāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2703: eva tarhi yadaika' śyenaviyukta' sthāṇuranyena saṃyujyate tatra prasaṅga' /
GSP28mimslovu:2705: yadi tūcyate yo 'yamutpatata' śyenasya deśāntarasaṃyoga' tasya sthāṇusamavetena karmaṇā niṣpattyasambhavānna tatra karmānumānamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2706: kalpyatāṃ tarhi śyene 'pi karma, sthāṇau tu prasaṅgānativṛttireva /
GSP28mimslovu:2708: asti ca sthāṇau kāraṇapribaddhaphaladarśanamiti nānumodaya' śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2710: śyenasamavāyinaiva karmaṇā sthāṇāvapi saṃyogavibhāgopapattau na tadgatakarmānumānamiti cet tanna /
GSP28mimslovu:2712: vyāptaṃ hi liṅgaṃ yatra yatra dṛśyate tatra tatra vyāpakamupasthāpayati /
GSP28mimslovu:2719: na ca sthāṇo' śyeno deśa ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2720: evamapi matsyeṣu prasaṅgānativṛttireva, teṣāṃ hi jalaṃ svadeśa eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2725: na ca tamo nāma kiñcidvastvasti bhavatsiddhānte, bhāso 'bhāvamātrtavāttasya /
GSP28mimslovu:2726: atastatsaṃyogavibhāgahetuko 'pi na kriyāvasāya' śakyate samādhātumiti na pratyakṣe karmaṇi dvaividhvopapatti' /
GSP28mimslovu:2727: yā tu 'na hi te pratyakṣe' ityapratyakṣatoktā,
GSP28mimslovu:2728: tāṃ tatraivānyathā vyākhyāsyāma' “rūpaśabdāvibhāgam” iti ca vadatā sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣameva krametyāsthitam /
GSP28mimslovu:2730: itarathā hyupalabdhimātrapratiṣedhe śaśaśṛṅgādivannityābhāva eva karmaṇo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2734: āśrayasya deśāntaraprāpakatvarūpeṇa na svarūpata' karmāstītyapūrvātmanā karmaṇo 'vasthānaṃ darśayati /
GSP28mimslovu:2735: 'ihāpi devadattasya gatipūrvikāṃ deśāntaraprāptimupadityayorubhayorapi karmaṇo 'numeyatvāt kena viśeṣeṇāditye gatyanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayodāhriyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2737: ato naivaṃvidhaṃ granthato yuktito vā ghaṭata iti sūktamanupannamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2746: pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhasya pratiyogitayopāttaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ tatrāpi gatiprāptyākṛtyo' pratyakṣadṛṣṭa eva sambandha iti na pratiyoginorasaṅkara iti ||138||
GSP28mimslovu:2747: yadi tu dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣatāyāmapi pakṣīkṛtādityagaterapratyakṣatvāt na pratyakṣadṛṣṭa' sambandha ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2752: yadi tvagnidhūmākṛtyo' kvacinmahānasādau apratyakṣopalabandhiriṣyate sā tarhi devadatte 'pi gate' pratyakṣatvādastītyāha---kvaciditi ||139||
GSP28mimslovu:2753: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣato dṛṣṭatā sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayā saṅkīryate ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:2756: yadi hi devadattādidharmyantarāpekṣaivāditye gatyanumānasya sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṣyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2767: yadāgnirbudhyate tasya parvabodhākat puna' puna' // Msv_5,4.142 //
GSP28mimslovu:2773: tajjanyo 'yaṃ dhūmaviśeṣ iti ca prāk pratyakṣeṇa matiṃ kṛtvā punaśca kiyatā vilambanenānyatra kvacid katvā gata' san taddeśasthena tenaiva dhūmaviśeṣeṇa tamevāgniviśeṣaṃ budhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2775: anena ca viśeṣadṛṣṭameva pratyakṣadṛṣṭaśabdenocyata iti vyākhyātam /
GSP28mimslovu:2779: tadadvāreṇa tvanumānasyāpi tādṛśo viśeṣo viṣayo bhavatīti yuktaiva pratyakṣaśabdena viśeṣalakṣaṇā /
GSP28mimslovu:2780: viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya bhavati pratiyogīti dvaividhyopapattiriti bhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:2783: taddeśasthitenaiva hi dhūmena tasminneva deśe sa eva gomayendhanajanyāgniranumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2789: yadi viśeṣadṛṣṭodāharaṇamidaṃ kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣye ākṛtigrahaṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:2790: evaṃ hi viśeṣa eva darśayitavyo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2800: sa evāyamadya yāvadanuvartamāno gomayendhanavikārasya dhūmasyākāro dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2807: ata' prāptyākṛtimātrād gatyākṛtimātrānumānamāditya ekāntata' sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambanthamiti yuktamevādityodāharaṇamiti ||145||
GSP28mimslovu:2815: tasya tu savikalpakasiddhau pratyakṣaviṣayatvamupapādyānta upasaṃhṛtaṃ 'pratyakṣatvamata' siddhaṃ sāmānyasye'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:2816: nanu yastveva na sāmānyaṃ kiñcidasti nāma /
GSP28mimslovu:2833: ata eva bhrāntirevānumānaṃ, sambandhabalena svalakṣaṇarūpamupasthāpayatīti pramāṇityāhu' /
GSP28mimslovu:2835: yā hi svaviṣaye śrotrādibhirindriyairbuddhirjanyate, sā vastvālambanaivapa /
GSP28mimslovu:2836: yena ca yadindriyaṃ sannikṛṣyate sa tasya svārtha' prāpyakāritvādindriyāṇām /
GSP28mimslovu:2838: aviśeṣeṇopādāne tu nābāvānyapramāṇatvasya vastvālambanatayā vyāpti' kathitā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2844: evaṃ vastvālambantve 'numānasya sādhite arthāt sāmānyaṃ vastvityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2849: teṣāmidamuttaram artha' sāmānyamanumānasya viṣayo bāhya eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2851: evamarthād vastutvaṃ prasādhyāhratya prasādhayati---sāmānyasya ca vastutvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2852: sāmānyaṃ vastu abhāvānyaprameyatvādasādhāraṇavastuvaditi vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2860: na cānavagataṃ liṅgaṃ kiñcidasti prakāśakam // Msv_5,4.150 //
GSP28mimslovu:2869: bauddhānāmeva tu sāmānyamanumānaikaviṣayaṃ manvānānāmanavasthā prasajyata ityāha--- sāmānyamiti pañcabhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:2877: ayamabhiprāya'--- na tāvat pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ ca jñānaṃ sambhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2891: pramāṇāntaraṃ ca sadyathā talliṅgaṃvedane pramāṇamiṣyate, evaṃ liṅginyapi prāpnoti /
GSP28mimslovu:2894: astu tarhi liṅgino 'pi tathaivāvagama', ko doṣa', ata āha---evamapīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2897: tadeva hi pramāṇaṃ tadā sarvasya liṅgaliṅgisāmānyasyāvabodhakaṃ bhavediti ||155||
GSP28mimslovu:2904: yathā hyapramāṇameva sambandhasmaraṇaṃ pramāṇakāraṇamiṣyate tathā liṅgajñānamapi bhaviṣyatītyartha' ||157||
GSP28mimslovu:2907: tacca pramāṇameveti tadanusārī nirṇayo yukta iti ||158||
GSP28mimslovu:2910: tadabhāvāt smṛtiścātra na kathañcit pravartate // Msv_5,4.159 //
GSP28mimslovu:2915: na caiṣa prakāro liṅgagatau sambhavatītyāha---na tviti /
GSP28mimslovu:2916: na hyatra prāgapi liṅgāvagame pramāṇaṃ kiñcidupapadyate, yat pramāṇajñānenopasthāpyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2923: evametadapi liṅgajñānaṃ nirvakalpakagṛhītaprāpakatayā tadabhedena smārtamiti yo vadati tasya vandhyāsutre 'pi smaraṇaśaktiranivāritā /
GSP28mimslovu:2925: na ca liṅgasāmānyajñānaṃ nirvakalpakagṛhītasvalakṣaṇālambanamiti kathaṃ smṛti' /
GSP28mimslovu:2926: yadatra prakāśate tanna gṛhītaṃ, yacca gṛhītaṃ sanna prakāśata iti na smṛtitvam /
GSP28mimslovu:2927: agṛhītagocarāyāṃ tu smṛtau vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaprasaṅga iti ||160||
GSP28mimslovu:2931: asādhāraṇa evārthātmā sāmānyajñāne liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati, sa ca pratyakṣa eveti nānavasthā /
GSP28mimslovu:2935: na cāsya tena sāmānyenāvinābhāva' kathañciddeśata' kālato vā dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:2936: asādhāraṇasya bhāvāntareṣvanusyūtyasambhavādekatra dṛṣṭasya ca tatraiva niruddhatvāditi ||161||
GSP28mimslovu:2939: nahyasādhāraṇaṃ vastu pūrvatreha ca vidyate // Msv_5,4.162 //
GSP28mimslovu:2950: liṅgatvaṃ nopapadyata iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2951: nanu tiraścāmasatyeva śabdollekhe 'sādhāraṇarūpadarśināmevānumānaṃ dṛṣṭamato nāvyapadeśyatvādaliṅgatvamata āha---vikalpeti pādatrayeṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:2952: ayamabhiprāya'---- mā nāma tiraścāṃ śabdollekho bhavet,
GSP28mimslovu:2955: na hi so 'yamityānārūḍho buddhau dhūmo 'gnerliṅgaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2957: asmanmate 'pi ye 'sādhāraṇātmāno dhūmādayo viśeṣā vikalpyante te 'pyanvayābāvādaliṅgaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2963: kvacidvā dṛṣṭasambandhe sarva' pratyāyako bhavet // Msv_5,4.165 //
GSP28mimslovu:2965: anumānapravṛttestu prāṅmānaṃ tatra nāsti te // Msv_5,4.166 //
GSP28mimslovu:2967: liṅgijñānaṃ ca tadvat syāt trirūpālliṅgato na tat // Msv_5,4.167 //
GSP28mimslovu:2969: yadi tu kasmiṃścidevāsādhāraṇe sāmānyena jñātasambandhe 'nyadarśināpi sāmānyamanumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2970: evaṃ tarhi sarva eva sarvasya pratyāyako bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2976: na cānumānapravṛtte' prāk tasmin sāmānyātmani bhavata' kiñcit pramāṇamastyasmākamiva pratyakṣam,
GSP28mimslovu:2979: kācideva hi vāsanodbhūtā kiñcilliṅgākāraṃ vikpamāvirbhāvayantī kiñcidevānumāsaṃvyavahāraṃ pravartayati /
GSP28mimslovu:2985: nāsau lihgasāmānyasya śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantāsata' sambhavatīti kathaṃ vāsanāmātrālliṅgajñānasya sambhava iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2986: tannibandhane liṅgajñāna iṣyamāṇe tadvadeva liṅgijñānopapattarenarthakaṃ trirūpāliṅgator'thadṛganumānamityanumānaprāmāṇyāśrayaṇamityāha---liṅgijñānaṃ ceti ||167||
GSP28mimslovu:2989: pramāṇāntaragamyatvāt tatra doṣo na jāyate // Msv_5,4.168 //
GSP28mimslovu:2991: tasya nāto 'dhikaṃ kiñcit prārthanīyaṃ prasajyate // Msv_5,4.169 //
GSP28mimslovu:2993: tatrāpi maulikaṃ liṅgaṃ pratyakṣādeva gamyate // Msv_5,4.170 //
GSP28mimslovu:2995: pratyakṣatvaṃ ca tasyeṣṭamiti dūraṃ na gamyate // Msv_5,4.171 //
GSP28mimslovu:3000: yatra hi vṛṣṭyabhāve meghābhāvo liṅgaṃ nāsāvanumeya', abhāvākhyapramāṇāntaragamyatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3005: pratyakṣā hi deśāntaraprāptirmaulikaṃ mūle bhavaṃ liṅgaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:3008: kṛtakatvaṃ catatra darśanādityevaṃ karmānantarabhāvitayā kṛtakatve sādhyamāne karmaṇo 'pi hetvantarādanumāne 'navasthā bhavedata āha--- liṅgatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3011: tatra ca kārakāviśiṣṭā kriyā tadviśiṣṭaṃ vā kārakamantarabhāvitāṃ viśiṣalliṅgamāpatati /
GSP28mimslovu:3017: pratyakṣatvaṃ ca sāmānye nānyatā hi gatirbhavet // Msv_5,4.173 //
GSP28mimslovu:3019: yadā vastvamtarāpekṣa' sāmānyāṃśa' sa kīrtyate // Msv_5,4.174 //
GSP28mimslovu:3030: evaṃ tāvadanumāsyāsati sāmānyasya vastutve pratyakṣatve ca dausthityamuktam idānīṃ sarvameva pramāṇajātaṃ sāmānyasya
GSP28mimslovu:3033: ato 'vaśyaṃ pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ pratyakṣapūrvakatvameṣṭavyaṃ sāmānyasya ca pratyatvam,
GSP28mimslovu:3035: evaṃ tāvat sāmānyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vastutā copapāditā idānīṃ viśeṣā eva pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyanta iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha---pratyakṣeti /
GSP28mimslovu:3037: cāvayavavastvantarāpekṣa' sāmānyāṃśo 'smābhi' kīrtyata iti kathaṃ pratyakṣa iti ||174||
GSP28mimslovu:3038: yadi tvavayavirūpādaya eva viśeṣā iṣyante, tadapyayuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:3041: te cāpi tāvat sāmānyaṃ yāvat syu' paramāṇava' /
GSP28mimslovu:3042: dvyaṇukasyāpi yadarūpaṃ taddhi sādhāraṇaṃ dvayo' // Msv_5,4.176 //
GSP28mimslovu:3044: na ca pratyakṣatātsaya saṅghāte kevalasya vā // Msv_5,4.177 //
GSP28mimslovu:3047: yadi tu nīlādaya eva viśeṣā iti matam /
GSP28mimslovu:3053: evaṃ ca aparamāṇubhya' prasaṅgo darśayitanya ityāha---te cāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:3055: tebhyastu prāk dvyaṇukarūpamapi dvayo' sādhāraṇamityāha--- dvyaṇukasyāpīti ||176||
GSP28mimslovu:3056: nanvastu paramāṇurūpameva viśeṣa', sa eva na' pratyakṣo bhaviṣyatyata āha---na cāntyeneti /
GSP28mimslovu:3058: na cāntyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāra' kasyacidastīti kiṃ tatpratyakṣatayeti /
GSP28mimslovu:3059: nanūpekṣāphalamapi pramāṇaṃ bhavatyeva, ata āha---na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3060: na na' kaparamāṇūnāṃ rūpaṃ sthūle vartamānānāṃ tantūnāmiva paṭe pratyakṣaṃ vibhaktānāṃ veti na kathañcid viśeṣaviṣayatā pratyakṣasyeti ||177||
GSP28mimslovu:3061: nanu paramāṇava eva bhinnā' sañcitā gṛhyante na kāryadravyamekam /
GSP28mimslovu:3063: sañcitā eva cānanyavṛttitayā viśeṣāsādhāraṇādipadavācyā iti te pratyakṣā bhaviṣyanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3064: mā nāmaikaikata' paramāṇurakṣagocaro bhavedata āha--- bhedeneti /
GSP28mimslovu:3065: eko hi sarvadā sarveṣāṃ ca bāva' prakāśate na paramāṇubhedā' /
GSP28mimslovu:3066: na ca bhedenāgṛhyamāṇo 'bhedo gṛhyata iti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:3070: samudāyo na vāpyasti bhavatāṃ na ca sarvadā /
GSP28mimslovu:3076: vagraho yo 'yamabhinnaprakāśa',kiṃ bhedagrahaṇenāta āha---na ca bhinneti /
GSP28mimslovu:3080: ye hi sāmānyameva sarvajagatsaṃviditamapalapanti kutasteṣāṃ samudāyo nāmārthāntaraṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:3082: api ca sarvadā sarve caikaṃ dravyamavabudhyatnate kathaṃ tadanyathā bhaviṣyatītyāha--- na ca sarvadeti ||179||
GSP28mimslovu:3084: na hi nānājātīyeṣu vṛkṣaghaṭaloṣṭeṣu kasyacit samudāyabuddhirasti /
GSP28mimslovu:3087: nanu nānekāvayavavṛttyanusandhānena vinā tatsāmānyarūpaṃ dravyamabhyupagantuṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:3088: na caindriyakaṃ jñānametā(vi?va) ti samarthamavikalpakatvāt tasya /
GSP28mimslovu:3091_0: tathāpi tadekarūpaṃ tāvannirvikalpakenāpi gṛhyata eveti nāpahnotuṃ śakyata iti vyāsajyavṛttyavayavisāmānyanyāyena
GSP28mimslovu:3092: tadapi sāmānyamityena rūpeṇāgrāhyaṃ vastuta' sāmānyameva gṛhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3095: ato naivaṃ vācyam--- astvavayavisāmānysaya svalakṣaṇāparanāmna indriyairgrahaṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:3103: yo 'pahanute śaśasyāpi so 'bhāvaṃ śṛṅgato vadet // Msv_5,4.184 //
GSP28mimslovu:3107: sarvasya hi sunipuṇaṃ nirūpyamāṇasya rūpāde' sāmānyarūpatvād,
GSP28mimslovu:3109: svattraṃ paramāṇusañcayamātrasya cānupalambhād dravyāpalāpe ca pratyakṣavirodhāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3110: ato 'vayavisāmānyaṃ tatsamavetāni ca gotvādisāmānyāni sarvāṇyeva pratyakṣāṇi na viśeṣā eveti tātparyam /
GSP28mimslovu:3120: na ca sthūlaṃ hitvā paramāṇava evākṣajāyāṃ buddhau bhāsante,
GSP28mimslovu:3123: dyante, bhavantu, na tadvalena mūlabhūtaṃ sthūlamapalapitumutsahāmaha iti ||183||
GSP28mimslovu:3124: pratyakṣaṃ tu sthūlamadṛśyai' paramāṇubhi' nihanuvānasya śaśo 'pi tadviṣāṇadhiyā nihnotavya' prāpta ityāha---samūharūpamiti ||184||
GSP28mimslovu:3128: tasmād yad gṛhyate vastu yena rūpeṇa sarvadā /
GSP28mimslovu:3131: tasmādasādhāraṇam akṣagamyaṃ vadan na sāmānyamapahanuvīta // Msv_5,4.187 //
GSP28mimslovu:3132: sāmānyarūpeṇa na gṛhyate cet kiṃ vāstyasādhāraṇabuddhiratra /
GSP28mimslovu:3135: na hyatra kalpanālāghavena pratyakṣasiddho dharmī paratyāgamarhati /
GSP28mimslovu:3136: siddhe ca tasmistadanuguṇā' paramāṇava iti kena neṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3137: siddhyupāyastu teṣāmanyo nāstīti paramāṇavo nāvaśyamiṣyanta ityuktaṃ bhavati ||185||
GSP28mimslovu:3138: ato yadeva vastu sāmānyaviśeṣayoraparokṣaṃ gṛhyate, tat tathaivāparokṣamapahnotuṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3140: ato yadyasādhāraṇaṃ pratyakṣamityāgraho bhavatāmevamapi na gotvādisāmānyamapratyakṣamiti
GSP28mimslovu:3142: yadi tūcyate pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyamāṇamapi sāmānyaṃ na sāmānyollekhena gṛhyata iti(na)
GSP28mimslovu:3148: yadvastu loka' pratipadyate 'smin dvidhāpi tacchakyata eva vaktum // Msv_5,4.188 //
GSP28mimslovu:3158: evaṃ tarhi dvyākārameva saṃmugdhaṃ vastu loka' pratipadyata iti parīkṣakairubhayathāpi tat śakyata eva vaktumiti siddhaṃ dvyākāremeva vastu pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3159: siddhaṃ ca sāmānyata' sambandhadarśanamityabhiprāyeṇāha--- yadvastu loka' pratipadyate 'smin dvidhāpi tat śakyata eva vaktumiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3164: atra pratyakṣānumānayoraparīkṣytava ukte śāstrasyāpyaparīkṣyatāpratipādanārthaṃ bhāṣyam---“śāstraṃ śabdavijñānādasannikṛṣṭer'the vijñānam“iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3165_0: nanu vṛttikāramate na parīkṣivyaṃ nimittamiti pratijñāyapratyakṣādīni hi prasiddhāni
GSP28mimslovu:3165_1: pramāṇāni tadantargataṃ ca śāstramityukte' pratyakṣavyabhicāreṇa parīkṣāmāśaṅkya
GSP28mimslovu:3165_2: tadavyabhicāra ukte 'nantarameva śāstrasyāparīkṣā pratipādyata iti yuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:3170: tathā hi nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti lokāyatikā manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:3174: tato mahāviṣayatayā prakṛtvena puruṣārthopayikatvena ca śāstram /
GSP28mimslovu:3175: tadanantaraṃ ca yatra kvacana vācye bahūnāṃ prasiddhamityupamānamuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:3179: abhāvapramāṇasya tu bhāvapramāṇābhāva evātmeti taduttara' prastāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:3180: ki punastantrāntareṣvevamimāni pramāṇāni prasiddhānīti prasiddhiprābalyaṃ kathitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:3181: vyutthitāśca tena tena sākṣiṇā pratipāditā bhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3182: atra ca śabdavijñānādityucyate, tat kathaṃ vigṛhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3183: kiṃ śabdād vijñānaṃ śabdasya vā vijñānamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3190: na ca savikalpake prasaṅga', na hi tacchabdapramāṇādutpadyate, api tu śabdasahāyādindriyāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3191: yathaiva hi gandhasahakṛtamidandriyaṃ tailād vilīnaṃ ghṛtaṃ vivinakti /
GSP28mimslovu:3200: na śakyaṃ kevalaṃ vaktumito 'pyasya na vācyatā // Msv_5,5.2 //
GSP28mimslovu:3202: aviśiṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasya na tat śāstrasya lakṣaṇam // Msv_5,5.3 //
GSP28mimslovu:3207: kiṃ nāma tarhi śābdam, vākyārthajñānamiti vadāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:3210: avāntaravyāpāratvātpadārthapratipādanasya śabdānām, pāka iva kāṣṭhānāṃ jvalanasya /
GSP28mimslovu:3215: idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kimidaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇavasare viśeṣalakṣamaṃ praṇīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3217: tad yadi vaktavyam, evamapi sāmānyalakṣaṇamuktvā( vakṣyate?lakṣyeta) /
GSP28mimslovu:3218: yat punaratitvaritenaiva sāmānyalakṣaṇavasare viśeṣo lakṣyate tadasāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:3219: na hīha pratyakṣādīnāṃ cākṣuṣatvādayo viśeṣā lakṣyante /
GSP28mimslovu:3220: tata' pratyakṣādiṣu sāmānyato vaktumārabdheṣu madhye śabdamātrasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam, na śāstrasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:3223: nirjñātasāmānyalakṣaṇo hi tadviśeṣaṃ bodhayituṃ śakyo netara' /
GSP28mimslovu:3227: śabdavijñānādityādi lakṣaṇamapi lakṣyaviśeṣe na saṅgacchata ityāha---yaccoktamiti ||3||
GSP28mimslovu:3234: pravṛttirvā nivṛttirvā tacchāstraṃ na padādyata' // Msv_5,5.6 //
GSP28mimslovu:3235: ityupadeśakaṃ hi nityaṃ vedavākyamanityaṃ tharmaśāstrādikaṃ śāstramucyate na śabdamākṣamiti ||4||
GSP28mimslovu:3241: asti hi tatrāpi“vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāma“iti vidhyuddeśa' /
GSP28mimslovu:3244: nanvarthavādā na tāvat sākṣāt kriyāṃ pratipādayanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3246: trayo 'pi hi tadaṃśā' sādhyaṃ sādhanamitikartavyatā ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3254: taccārthavādā' śaknuvanti kartumiti tat kurvatāmeṣāmasti pravṛttinivṛttyorupayoga' /
GSP28mimslovu:3255: ata' samastāyāṃ tryaṃśapūrṇāyāmeva bhāvanāyāṃ mahāvākyādevasārthavādakāt puruṣa' pravartate nivartate vā na vidhyuddeśamātrāditi sārthavādakameva vākyaṃ śāstramiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3259: ata eva vidhinācina' pratyayamātrasyapadamātrasya vā yajetetyevamādikasya vidhiśrutāvapi kana śāstratvam /
GSP28mimslovu:3261: kathamiva tatra padapratyayayo' śaktirbhaviṣyatīti duradhigamamityāha--- na padādyata iti ||6||
GSP28mimslovu:3271: ato yadeva tadupayogi tadeva vācyamityatikramyāpi sāmānyaprakramaṃ viśeṣamevaṃ lakṣitavān /
GSP28mimslovu:3276: yadi svatantropayogitvanirapekṣāṇi na jalpati, tata' kimata āha---tatreti /
GSP28mimslovu:3277: yadā hyayaṃ jalpāka iva nānupayuktaṃ bhāṣata iti sthitam,
GSP28mimslovu:3278: tatra yadi lokavākyasthitaṃ śabdalakṣaṇaṃ kathayet tadasya vedaṃ vyācikhyāsārenupayuktaṃ syāditi ||8||
GSP28mimslovu:3280: kimiti tarhi pratyakṣādi lakṣyate na hi teṣāṃ vedopayogo dṛśyate ata āha---pratyakṣādīti /
GSP28mimslovu:3282: na hi tadantareṇa pura'--- parthamameva svādhyāyagrahaṇakāle varṇamātrādyavadhārayituṃ śakyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3284: ata' purastāt parastācca varṇamātrādita' kṛte pratyakṣādyupayogaṃ matvā tallakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP28mimslovu:3295: tasmāt tampayudāhratya sāmānyaṃ lakṣayet sukham // Msv_5,5.11 //
GSP28mimslovu:3299: na caivañjātīyaka' kaścidupayogo gāmānayetyādivākyasthasya śābdalakṣamasyāstīti tadupekṣyaiva śāstragatameva lakṣaṇaṃ praṇītamityāha---yatviti ||10||
GSP28mimslovu:3300: yatpunaralakṣite sāmānye na viśeṣo lakṣayituṃ śakyata ityuktaṃ tatpariharati---viśeṣaśceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3301: sāmānyalakṣaṇe hi viśeṣo na sidhyati, vyabhicārāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3302: viśeṣastu sāmānyāvyabhicārīti tasmin lakṣite tadantargataṃ sāmānyaṃ sukhameva lakṣitaṃ bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:3303: yadā hi vidhāyakavijñānādasannikṛṣṭer'the vijñānaṃ śāstramityuktaṃ tadārtād vidhāyakaviśeṣarahitācchabdamātrajñānācchābdamiti śakyamavagantumiti na pṛthagucyata iti ||11||
GSP28mimslovu:3306: nāvaśyamupāttameva viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati, kintu adhikāralabhyamapi, yathāgneyādiṣu vakṣyate, ta(dva)
GSP28mimslovu:3310: ayaṃ cādhikārato viśeṣalābho jaimineraṣyanumataścodanāśabdamaviśeṣitaṃ dvitīye sūtre prayuñjānasyetyāha---yathā ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3311: evaṃ hi manyate--- yadyapi codanāśabda' pravartakavākyamātravacana',
GSP28mimslovu:3320_0: yadyapi vṛttikāramatopanyāsāvasare'pratyakṣādīni hi prasiddhāni pramāṇāni tadantargataṃ
GSP28mimslovu:3320_1: śāstram' iti bhāṣyakāreṇoktaṃ tatrāpi viśeṣaśāstrāparīkṣāpratijñānaṃ prakṛtopayogitvābhiprāyeṇaiveti
GSP28mimslovu:3323: kimidānīmaṅgāni mīmāṃsā karmānuśāsanāni ca na sāstrāṇi,
GSP28mimslovu:3329: mīmāṃsādiṣu vedavat tato 'pi vā sātiśayaṃ śāstraśabdopacāramupalabhāmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:3330: api cāyaṃ śāstraśabdo rūḍho vā syād yaugiko vā,
GSP28mimslovu:3340: nanu vidhāyakaṃ śāstramiti śāstralakṣamam,na ca tāni kañcid vidadhati /
GSP28mimslovu:3346: na punastadupadeśakaṃ śāstrameveti laukikī prasiddhiriha bhāṣyakāreṇānūditā,
GSP28mimslovu:3353: vivakṣādi ca dhūmādau nāstītyetena bhinnatā // Msv_5,5.16 //
GSP28mimslovu:3354: gocaraṃ puruṣaśreyovidhāyakaṃ loke śāstramiti prasiddhaṃ tacchāstram /
GSP28mimslovu:3358: pūrvapramāṇe cottaraṃ vākyārthajñānaṃ phalaṃ tatprāmāṇye ca hānādibuddhiriti viveka iti ||14||
GSP28mimslovu:3368: evaṃ hi tairuktam--- śābde hi pūravasaṃskārayukto 'ntyo varṇo,
GSP28mimslovu:3373: teṣāmeva krama' padānāṃ vā vākyatvajātireva vāvayavī vā nirdhūtanikhilavarṇādivibhāga' sphoṭo vā padānyava vā saṃhatyārthamabhidadhati /
GSP28mimslovu:3376: sarvamidaṃ dhūmādau na dṛṣṭamiti tadvaidharmyāda(na) numānatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3381: iyaṃ vaidharmyasamā nāma jāti', vikalpāsamā vā /
GSP28mimslovu:3384: vādinā hi pruyakte prayoge prasaṅgo jāyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3391: tatra yadā prativādino vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:3393: prativādino vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ bhavati--- yathā kriyāvad dravyamavibhu daṣṭam,
GSP28mimslovu:3399: yadā pritavādinā sādhya(vār)masyāpi vikalpa āpādyate, asau vikalpasamā nāma jātirucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3404: evamihāpi pareṇābedasādhane ukte dhumādivaidharmyamātreṇa pratyavasthāne vaidharmyasamā nāma jātirāpādyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3409: anvayavyatirekajameva kiñcid vākyavikalpādimad dṛṣṭaṃ yathā śābdam,
GSP28mimslovu:3415: evaṃ hi sādhanamidam--- śābdamanumānād bhinnaṃ tadvaidharmyātaṃ pratyakṣavaditi,ata āha---dhūmeti /
GSP28mimslovu:3418: kiñcid viśeṣaṇamātreṇa tu vaidharmyamaviśiṣṭamarthātmakānānumānānāmiti teṣāmapyanumānād bhedo bhavet na cāsāvāsti,
GSP28mimslovu:3428: vailakṣaṇyamātreṇa tu bhedaṃ vadato vailakṣaṇyavacanasya jātataivāpadyetetyāha---trailakṣaṇyeti ||18||
GSP28mimslovu:3429: yadapi cadamaparaṃ śābdānumānayorvailakṣaṇyamuktam--- dhūmādayo hi sāvābhāvikenaiva pratibandhena pratibandhakabuddhimanumāne
GSP28mimslovu:3434: ayamabhiprāya'--- atrāpi yadi kiñcidvaidharmyamātreṇa bheda ucyate, ato jātireva /
GSP28mimslovu:3439: ato liṅgamapi parārthaprayoge yameva prati prayujyate tameva pratipādayatīti sāmanam /
GSP28mimslovu:3446: anumānaṃ hi yatheṣṭaviniyogānanuvidhāyipratipādanam, na cedaṃ tathā, ato bhinnamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3456: tenaiva vyabhicāra iti nānumānād vyāvṛttirheto' sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:3466: kathaṃ punaridamanumām, na hi hastādisanniveśā' saṅkhyāviśeṣādibhirarthairvyāptā' /
GSP28mimslovu:3472: na hi yādṛśe sanniveśe vyāptiravagatā tādṛśasya vyabhicāro dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3479: yadṛcchāśabdāstu hastasaṃjñāditulyāste saṅketānusāreṇārthaṃ bodhayanto 'numānameveti kiṃ tadbhedapratipādaneneti ||20||
GSP28mimslovu:3480: idamaparaṃ bhedakāraṇaṃ, śabdāddhi puruṣāpekṣor'thaniścaya', na ca tathā śabda ityato bhidyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3484: yādṛśo hi saṅketo yadarthapratipādane puruṣai' kṛta', tameva parapuraṣāpekṣayā budhyante /
GSP28mimslovu:3487: padāni hi svamahimnaivārthaṃ pratipādayanti na puruṣāpekṣayā /
GSP28mimslovu:3500: ayamabhiprāya'--- arthapratipādane tāvadanapekṣameva padaṃ vaidikāni ca vākyāni /
GSP28mimslovu:3501: sambandhānubhavaśca yatheha puruṣāpekṣastathānyatrāpyanumāne 'sau vilakṣaṇo dṛsyata eveti /
GSP28mimslovu:3511: api ca paroktābhedahetunirāso 'pi tairna kṛta ityāha--- uktā ceti ||22 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:3527: tadayamanvayo bhavati--- yadyapyāptavādavisaṃvādaviśeṣāṇāṃ bhedānna sambandho 'vagantuṃ śakyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3533: ato bhidyate ityata āha--- na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3534: gavādayastāvat viditasambandhā evārthaṃ pratipādayantīti teṣāṃ durvāramanumānatvam,
GSP28mimslovu:3537: śaknoti hi vaktumitaro 'pi teṣāmanumānatvaṃ sambandhāvadhīnabodhakatvād dhūmādivaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3538: api cāpūrvaśabdā api nāśvādiśabdebyo viśiṣyante, padatvenābhedādityāha--- na ceti ||24||
GSP28mimslovu:3540: yata' khalvetāni padāni, na ca padamajñātasambandhaṃ prakāśakamasti /
GSP28mimslovu:3545: svargaśca niratiśayānandasvabhāvo vaidikavākyaśeṣebhyo 'vagamyata iti tathāvagatayo' sambandhagrahaṇopapattiriti /
GSP28mimslovu:3546: ato yat parairuktaṃ śabdo nānumānaṃ sambandhānapekṣatvādakṣavaditi taddhetorasiddhyā dūṣitamityāha--- sambandheti ||25||
GSP28mimslovu:3560: ekānto nirṇaya', so 'sya kāryaṃ, tannāstītyanekānta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3562: yādṛśaṃ hi darpaṇe bimbamupalabhyate tādṛśameva mukhādi budhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3563: ato 'styatrāpi gamyagamakayo' sādṛśyamiti pratibimbeṣu vartamāno heturanaikāntiko bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:3565: ādarśatejasā hi pratihatena nāyanena tejasā prakāśitaṃ pratyakṣameva mukhamavagamyata iti śabdādhikaraṇe vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3567: ayamabhiprāya'--- yadā hyayaṃ paratyakṣeṣvaṅgulyādiṣvādarśavartinā pratibimbena tādṛktve viditavyāptirbhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:3578: yadapīdamuktam--- śābde hi sakṛduktameva vākyaṃ sahasā nānārthān pratibhāsayati viruddhānaviruddhāṃśca,
GSP28mimslovu:3583: prayogaśca bhavati--- śabdo 'numānād bhinna' ekadā nānārthapratibhāsādakṣavaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3592: prakāśayati, yathā dhūmādi,na ca tathā śabda',ato bhidyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3597: heturhi dhūmo 'gnitvamuṣṇatvaṃ dāhakatvamindhanavikāratvaṃ ca ekadaiva pratipādayati /
GSP28mimslovu:3601: nanu na viruddho 'naikamartha pratipādayati, vyāptibalena hi liṅgaṃ pratipādakaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:3609: bhūyasāṃ caikārthānāṃ vākyānāṃ nānena hetunā bheda' sidhyatītyāha---yatraceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3610: na kevalaṃ viruddhamanekaṃ śabdo na pratipādayati, kintu aviruddhamapi /
GSP28mimslovu:3622: atra prayukta ityevaṃ budhyante hi cirāt kvacit // Msv_5,5.34 //
GSP28mimslovu:3629: bhavati hi dūrād dhūmo 'yamāhosvid dhūlisantāna iti saṃśayānasyāgnivātāvartayoranavasthito vitarka iti ||32||
GSP28mimslovu:3630: tathā śabde dṛṣṭāntānabhidhānamapi dhūmādau vyabhicārānna bhedaheturityāha---dṛṣṭānteti /
GSP28mimslovu:3632: nanvaprasiddhe tāvadasti dṛṣṭāntāpekṣā, śabde tu tadapi nāstītyata āha---anabhyastaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3635: tatra yāvadayaṃ śabdo 'muṣminnarthe vṛddhairācarita iti cireṇa praṇidhāya na budhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3637: tadevaṃ tāvad bhedavādibhirna bhedahetava' samyaguktā iti darśitam ||34||
GSP28mimslovu:3638: bauddhoktābhedahetunirāso 'pi tairna kṛta ityāha--- paroktā iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3641: asyārtha'--- yathā dhūmādagnyanumānamanvayavyatirekajam, ekasya ca dhūmasya pratyakṣadarśanāt,
GSP28mimslovu:3647: sambandhapūrvakaṃ ca bhavati, evaṃ śabdādapi jñānaṃ jāyamānamevaṃ jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3657: na ca katavācyamanvayavyatirekajatvāt sambandhapūrvakatvaṃ na bhidyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3659: pūrvaṃ hi sambandhaviśeṣajatvaṃ heturukta' idānīṃ tvavivakṣitaviśeṣaṃ sambandhasāmānyapūrvakatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3665: ayamabhiprāya'--- yadayadaparicchinne pavartate tat tato bhidyate, anumānamiva pratyakṣāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3676: evaṃ hi manyate--- vidyamānopalambhanaṃ pratyakṣamiti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:3677: idaṃ tu śābdaṃ trikālārthaviṣayamata' kathaṃ pratyakṣe 'ntarbhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:3679: prayogaśca bhavati--- śābdaṃ pratyakṣād bhinnaṃ tadaparicchinnaviṣayatvād anumānavaditi ||38||
GSP28mimslovu:3682: pratyaya' kinnimittor'the vaktṛbuddhe' kuto vasau // Msv_5,5.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:3687: vedavākyānyeva tu mānāntarāviṣayārthāni bhidyante ityavyāpako heturiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3694: ata eva śāstrameva vedavākyaṃ bhinnatayā pakṣīkṛtaṃ 'śāstramarthe pravartata'iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3699: kimasti tebhyor'thapratyayo na vā, na tāvannāsti, sarvalokavyavahārocchedaprasaṅgāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3701: na ca śabdādanyannimittamasyopapadyata iti jātamasandagdhamabādhitaṃ ca jñānāntareṇa pramāṇameva puṃvacanajanitaṃ jñānamiti nāsyānāgamatvābyupagamo yukta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3703: ayamabhiprāya'--- visaṃvādabhūyiṣṭāni hi puṃvacanāni, tannaitāni śrutamātrāṇyevārthaṃ niścāyayanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3704: na cāniścitor'tho jñāto bhavati, niścayasyaiva jñānatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3705: ata' praṅ(?) niścayotpatterjñānābhāva evanti kiṃ nimittaprayatnena /
GSP28mimslovu:3708: tadā tadvākyādeva jñānakāryāt kāraṇabhūtaṃ jñāyamanumāya jñānasyārthāvyabhicāreṇārtho niścīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3713: na cāsyā' kiñcidavagame kāraṇastīti vakṣyāma iti ||39||
GSP28mimslovu:3715: na śabdārthasya sā liṅgaṃ na śabdo 'syā' kathañcana /
GSP28mimslovu:3716: viśeṣo gamyate tābhyāṃ na caitasyānumeyatā // Msv_5,5.40 //
GSP28mimslovu:3720: nanūktaṃ kāryāt śabdādanumāsyate, ata āha--- na śabda iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3721: yatā nobhayamubhayatra liṅgaṃ, tathā darśayati--- viśeṣa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3723: iha ca vākyasāmānyaṃ jñānasāmānyena vyāptamavagatamiti tatastat sidhyed,
GSP28mimslovu:3728: nanu yatrāpto vākyaṃ prayuṅkte tadeva jñātvā prayuṅkta iti vijñānaviśeṣeṇaiva sambandho 'vagata' /
GSP28mimslovu:3732: na hyanyathā yatra prayuṅkta iti śakyate pratinirdeṣṭum /
GSP28mimslovu:3733: na cārthoparāgamantareṇa jñānasya viśeṣa' sambhavati yo 'numīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3736: na cāniścitaṃ jñānaṃ, saṃśayātmano vijñānavidhāyā darśitatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3738: yā tu kvacid vyabhicārādaprāmāṇyāśaṅkā sā āptatvādinā nirākriyata ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:3740: ya evamavadhārito bhavati--- nāyamananvitārthāni padāni prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimslovu:3743: kimidānīṃ viditapadapadārthasaṅgati' śrotā puṃvākyādarthaṃ na budhyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:3745: jātā tu buddhirasandigdhāviparyastā ca na vaidavākyajanitāyā dhiyo viśiṣyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:3746: śaṅkāmātraṃ tu kathañcid vede 'pi vākyatvādinā bhavatīti na tāvatā tadaprāmāṇyam /
GSP28mimslovu:3752: liṅgaṃ hi śabda evāsya dhūmo 'gneriva kalpate // Msv_5,5.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:3760: vedastāvad bhinnaviṣayatayā pramāṇāntarameveti, tadapi manorathamātramevetyāha---na cāpītī /
GSP28mimslovu:3766: nanvarthātmanā tāvadalliṅgenānanumitapūrvamarthaṃ vedo bodhayatīti pramāṇāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3768: yadi tu tadeva nāstītyucyate, tat tarhi vacanīyam, kimavāntarabhedopanyāseneti ||43||
GSP28mimslovu:3769: anye tu prakṣīṇaśaktayo 'bhedamevāśrityaikadeśina' pratyavasthitā', tad darśayati---evaṃ sthitaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3770: ayaṃ hi teṣāmabhiprāya'--- codanāprāmāṇyaṃ hi pratijñātaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:3788: yadi paścānmānasāmānyādanumānatvaṃ tadastu, na ca tadabhyupagame doṣa ityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:3789: lakṣaṇaikatvena tvabheda iṣṭe 'numānalakṣaṇābhāvāt pramāṇāntarānabyupagamāccāprāmāṇyameva vedavacasāmāpadyata ityāha--- lakṣaṇeneti ||46||
GSP28mimslovu:3791: puṃvākyānāmanena prakāreṇānumānatvāt prāmāṇyaṃ siddhyati na vedavacasāmiti bhāva' ||47||
GSP28mimslovu:3797: nanu pramāṇāntarakasaṅgatārthāni vedaikadeśabhūtāni kṣepiṣṭhādivākyāni dṛṣṭvā itarāṇyapyagnihotrādivākyāni vedatvāt satyārthānyanumāsyante /
GSP28mimslovu:3803: samā loke ca vede ca siddhā vedapramāṇatā // Msv_5,5.51 //
GSP28mimslovu:3805: nāptasya sambhavo vede loke nāsmāt pramāṇatā // Msv_5,5.52 //
GSP28mimslovu:3806: purastād varṇitaṃ hyetat tasmāt śabdena yā mati' /
GSP28mimslovu:3807: tasyā' svata' pramāṇatvaṃ na cet syāddoṣadarśanam // Msv_5,5.53 //
GSP28mimslovu:3811: ādityaśabdo hi sārupyād gauṇo yūpe vartata iti tatsiddhisūtre vakṣyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3814: api ca prāk svamahimnā vedaprāmāṇyabalenāprāmāṇyānumānāni pratyuktāni /
GSP28mimslovu:3816: ato lakṣaṇabhedenaiva śabdasya pramāṇāntaratve iṣyamāṇe vedā' pramāṇaṃ bhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3820: loke 'pi nāptatvaṃ prāmāṇye kāraṇamityāha--- loka iti ||52||
GSP28mimslovu:3823: prāmāṇyaṃ tu sarvasaṃvidāṃ sahajameveti svata'prāmāṇyevāde varṇitamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3828: pade tāvatkṛto yatna' parairityatra varṇyate // Msv_5,5.54 //
GSP28mimslovu:3832: na tāvadanumānaṃ hi yāvat tadviṣayaṃ na tat // Msv_5,5.56 //
GSP28mimslovu:3835: evañjātīyakasya śabdasya cānumānena prāmāṇyameva samaṃ, na lakṣaṇamityāha---anumāneneti ||53 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:3838: tathāpi parai' padānyudāhṛtya vicāra' kṛta iti tadbhedameva pratipādayāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:3848: nanvanumāne vyāptibalena dharmasāmānyamanumīyata ityata āha--- na tāvaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3849: yāvat tadanumānaṃ tadviṣayaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣayaṃ na bhavati tāvadanumānameva na bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:3852: nanu padamapi viśiṣṭagocaraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā--- ko rājā yātīti pṛṣṭe para' pratibravīti , pāñcālarāja iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3853: tadā kevalādeva pāñcālarājapadāt kriyāviśiṣṭa' puruṣo 'vagamyate, ata āha---sāmānyāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3857: yatrāpi te pratīyante tatra vyakterviśeṣaṇam // Msv_5,5.58 //
GSP28mimslovu:3859: vākyārthe 'pi padaṃ yatra gomadādi prayujyate // Msv_5,5.59 //
GSP28mimslovu:3861: tāvāneva hi tatrāptho ya' pūrvamavadhārita' // Msv_5,5.60 //
GSP28mimslovu:3862: kiñcit śābde sāmānyādatiriktamavagamyate sa vākyasyaiva viṣaya' /
GSP28mimslovu:3868: kārakaṃ hi kriyayā viditavyāptikam, vyāptisāmarthyādeva kriyāpadamanumāpayati /
GSP28mimslovu:3872: yatra hi saṅkhyādayo 'vagamyante tatra kathamata āha--- yatrāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:3875: dvitvādayastvekatvānna sambhavantīti tadākṣiptāyā vyaktereva viśeṣaṇaṃ saṅkhyādaya iti ||58||
GSP28mimslovu:3877: tādarthyena tu kriyāṃ bhāvanāṃ saṅkhyādayo viśiṣanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3879: yathā paśorekatve 'ruṇādiṣu ca vakṣyata ityāha--- padantareti /
GSP28mimslovu:3882: yattarhi vākyārthavṛttiviśiṣṭaviṣayaṃ gomadādipadaṃ tadanumānaṃ bhaviṣyatyata āha--- vākyārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3884: siddho hi dharmī kenacid dharmeṇāsiddhena viśiṣṭa' sādhyamāna' pakṣo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:3885: iha tu padoñcāraṇāt prāṅ na kiñcit pratipannam /
GSP28mimslovu:3886: uccarite tu pade viśiṣṭa' pratipanna eveti kiṃ sādhyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3892: atha śabdor'thavattvena pakṣa' kasmānna kalpyate // Msv_5,5.62 //
GSP28mimslovu:3894: pakṣe dhūmaviśeṣe ca sāmānyaṃ heturiṣyate // Msv_5,5.63 //
GSP28mimslovu:3897: gṛhītasambandhastu pratipadyamāno vyutpattikālāvagatānana kiñcidadhikaṃ pratyetīti kathamanumānaṃ bhavatīti ||60||
GSP28mimslovu:3898: api cātra bhinnayoreva prakṛtipratyayātmano' padabhāgayorbhinnāvevārthopratipannau viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabāvamanubhavata iti siddhaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:3900: idaṃ tu pācakādiśabdeṣu yuktaṃ vaktum, tatra hi (dhātunā) pāka' pratyayena cakartṛmātramupāttam /
GSP28mimslovu:3902: gomadādau tu tadasyāstīti viśiṣṭa evārthe taddhita' smaryata iti kuto vaiṣamyam,
GSP28mimslovu:3905: kiñcānumāne svatantragṛhīta eva parvatādirviśeṣya' svatantrasmṛtenāgnyādinā viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭo 'vagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3910: atrāpi śabdasyaiva pranthamāvagatasyārthaviśiṣṭatvena sādhyatvānna kramavyatikramo bhaviṣyatīti ||62||
GSP28mimslovu:3912: pratijñārtha' pakṣa' sa ca dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī, viśiṣṭāpekṣayā dharmyekadeśa ucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3914: śabdo hi dharmitayopātta' sa eva heturiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3915: nanu yadā dūrād dhūsyādhāraviśeṣo na lakṣyate tadā dhūmo 'gnimattayā sādhyate, hetuśca bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:3922: kathaṃ vāsya viśiṣṭatvaṃ na tāvad deśakālata' // Msv_5,5.65 //
GSP28mimslovu:3925: dṛśyamāna' pakṣa' pūrvāvagata' sapakṣa' tadanugataṃ ca sāmānyaṃ heturiti pakṣasapakṣahetuvibhāgopapattiriti ||63||
GSP28mimslovu:3926: nanvihāpi śabdaviśeṣaṃ pakṣīkṛtya śabdatvaṃ hetuṃ vakṣyāma', ata āha--- śabdatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3927: arthaviśeṣo hyanumitsita', na cāsya śabdatvaṃ gamakamanaikāntikatvāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3928: nanvavāntarasāmānyaṃ tarhi gośabdatvaṃ heturbhaviṣyatyata āha--- gośabdatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3929: ato 'traikaiva vyaktirarthena viśeṣyāhetutayā cābhidhātavyeti duṣpariharaṃ pratijñārthaikadeśatvamityābhiprāyeṇāha--- vyaktiriti ||64||
GSP28mimslovu:3930: nanu vyañjakabhedabhinnaikaiva vyakti' pakṣīkariṣyate ityāha--- bhavediti /
GSP28mimslovu:3932: naupādhiko bhedo vastu bhinatti, tatpratyayānapāyāditi bhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:3933: api ca viśiṣṭatā sambandhe sati bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:3934: tadiha kīdṛśor'thaśabdayośabdayo' sambandha ityāha--- kathaṃ veti /
GSP28mimslovu:3935: na tāvat śabdadeśer'tho dṛśyate,mukhe hi śabda' bhūmāvartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:3936: nāpi śabdakāle, kalau kṛtayugārthasyābhāvādityāha--- na tāvaditi ||65||
GSP28mimslovu:3938: asti hi sā śabdakāla iti tadetadāśaṅkate--- tatpratītiriti /
GSP28mimslovu:3940: pratītyā viśiṣṭe 'numīyamāne sā tāvat pūrvasiddhā grahītavyā /
GSP28mimslovu:3942: nanu sampratyupalabhyamānaṃ dutādiviśeṣaṃ pakṣīkṛtya tasya pratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭatā sādhyate sapakṣaṃ ca vyutpattikālā
GSP28mimslovu:3945: sāmānyasyaiva śaktve pakṣo hetustathaiva ca // Msv_5,5.67 //
GSP28mimslovu:3947: kathaṃ ca pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasyeha nirupyate // Msv_5,5.68 //
GSP28mimslovu:3949: rājā bhartā manuṣyasya tena rājña' sa ucyate // Msv_5,5.69 //
GSP28mimslovu:3952: na pratijñārthaikadeśatā bhaviṣyatyata āha --- na pratyāyaneti ayamabhiprāya' na drutādiviśeṣāṇāṃ deśādinibandhanor'thena sambandho vidyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3955: yathā pakṣīkṛtasya mahato dhūmasyaikadeśe 'dhastādagnirastīti tadviśiṣṭo dhūma' sādhyo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:3958: yattu teṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ gośabda' sapratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭa' tatra ca pakṣe sa eva pakṣo hetuścetyuktamevetyāha sāmānyasyeti ||67||
GSP28mimslovu:3960: evaṃ tāvat śabdo na pakṣa ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:3966: kasyāñcit kriyāyāṃ kartṛtayā sambaddhaṃ kiñcit kasyacit sambandhī bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:3972: vṛkṣastiṣṭhati śākhāsu tā vā tatreti tasya tā' /
GSP28mimslovu:3973: deśe 'gnimati dhūmasya kartṛtvaṃ bhavanaṃ prati // Msv_5,5.70 //
GSP28mimslovu:3984: evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi kriyāgarbha evetyāha--- deśa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3985: agnimaddeśe bhavane kartā bhavan dhūmo 'gnimato deśasya saṃyogī bhavatīti||
GSP28mimslovu:3987: kiṇvaṃ hi surāyā bījaṃ surātmake pariṇāme kartṛbhavatsurāyā' kāraṇamityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3989: senākāryaṃ pratipakṣajayamaṃśena kurvan hastī senāyā' sambandhitayocyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3991: na cānirūpitākāra' sambandho 'stīti śakyate vaktumityāha--- na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3992: na ca sambandhamantareṇa pakṣasya dharma iti vigrahagatā ṣaṣṭhī pakṣadharma iti ca tatpuruṣasamāso vā ghaṭata ityāha---na cāstīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4000: na taddeśādisadbhāvo nābhimukhyādi tasya vā // Msv_5,5.74 //
GSP28mimslovu:4002: tena tadviṣaya' śabda iti dharmatvakalpanā // Msv_5,5.75 //
GSP28mimslovu:4010: na kenāpi prakāreṇa viṣayaviṣayibhāvo ghaṭata ityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:4011: yathā na ghaṭate tadetadāha--- na taditi ||74||
GSP28mimslovu:4018: tatastavyatirekeṇa pakṣadharmatāyā evapānupapatteritaretarāśrayatvamato neyamapi kalpanā ghaṭata ityāha---gamakatvāditi ||77||
GSP28mimslovu:4020: anavagatavācyavācakasambandhā' svarūpātirekeṇa na śabdaṃ kasyacid dharmatayā jānanti /
GSP28mimslovu:4029: na ca dharmī gṛhīto 'tra yena taddharmatā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:4031: yaścātra kathyate dharmī prameyo 'sya sa eva na' /
GSP28mimslovu:4033: svarūpamātravijñānaṃ tu na dhūmādau pakṣadharmatāyāṃ hetu', api tu dharmisambandha' /
GSP28mimslovu:4035: nanvatrāpyarthena dharmiṇā pratamaṃ vyutpattikāle sambandho 'vagata eva, āha--- na cāpīti ||79||
GSP28mimslovu:4041: trīṇi hetorlakṣaṇāni pakṣadharmatā sapakṣe sattā vipakṣād vyāvṛtti' /
GSP28mimslovu:4047: arthādanyastāvad dharmī na pramīyata iti bhāva' ||82||
GSP28mimslovu:4048: yastvasāvartho dharmitayā kalpanīya', yaddharmatayāvagata' śabda' pakṣa
GSP28mimslovu:4050: prāk sa cet pakṣadharmatvād gṛhīta' kiṃ tata' param /
GSP28mimslovu:4052: anvayo na ca śabdas prameyena nirūpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4055: na tvevaṃ yatra śabdo 'sti tatrārtho 'stīti niścaya' // Msv_5,5.86 //
GSP28mimslovu:4062: dharmo bhavati, parastādapi sa tāvāneva pramātavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:4064: tato gṛhīte tasmin kiṃ parabhāvinā pakṣadharmādijñānena ato nānumānatetyāha---yaścetidvayena ||83,84||
GSP28mimslovu:4071: nanu vaibhavācchabdasya nityatvāccārthasya śabdārthayo' śakyate 'nvayo darśayitumityāha--- bhavediti /
GSP28mimslovu:4079: śatakṛtva' prayukte 'pi na ca dṛṣṭārthadhī' kvacit // Msv_5,5.91 //
GSP28mimslovu:4096: yadi jñātasambandhasyānvaya', anya eva tarhi sambandha' śabdārthayorabhyupagamyata iti ||92||
GSP28mimslovu:4100: anvayastu pūrvāvagatapratītisāmarthyānusāreṇaiva jāyamāno nārthagrahītau kāraṇamityāha--- jñāta iti ||94||
GSP28mimslovu:4111: yuktā na tu padajñānāt padārtho 'tra pramāyate // Msv_5,5.99 //
GSP28mimslovu:4115: na hyanavagater'the tajjñānena vinā śabdajñānaṃ bhavatīti vyatireka' śakyate 'vagantum /
GSP28mimslovu:4118: śaktini (ṣkarṣe) yorvyāpāro vācyavācakarūpa' śabdārthayo' sambandha iti ||97||
GSP28mimslovu:4119: evaṃ ca trailakṣaṇyaparityāgenānanumānatvaṃ prasādhya prayogeṇa darśayati---tasmāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:4125: idaṃ ca padasyānumānād bhedapratipādanaṃ prauḍhipradarśanārthamasmābhi' kṛtam /
GSP28mimslovu:4129: pratyakṣe ca parokṣe ca jñāte 'jñāte 'pi vā purā // Msv_5,5.100 //
GSP28mimslovu:4133: sambandho na ca tasyārtho yor'tha' sa tvakṣagocara' // Msv_5,5.102 //
GSP28mimslovu:4138: yathā na pramāṇaṃ tathā darśayati--- padamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4140: eṣvartheṣu prayuktasya yathā na prāmāṇyaṃ tathāha--- tatreti ||101||
GSP28mimslovu:4142: sambandhajñānameva vā tadā jāyata ityāha--- sambandheti /
GSP28mimslovu:4143: na ca sambandha eva padasya prameya iti vācyam,
GSP28mimslovu:4147: anubhūte tu parokṣe smṛtirityāha--- parokṣa iti ||103||
GSP28mimslovu:4148: nanu smṛtimeva janayat pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatyata āha--- pramita iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4149: pramitaviṣayā hi smṛti', sannikṛṣṭārthagocaraṃ ca pramāṇamiti sthitiriti /
GSP28mimslovu:4150: kathaṃ puna' pramitaviṣayaṃ na pramāṇamata āha--- paricchedeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4152: na ca smṛtyā kiñcit paricchidyate, pūrvavijñānamātropasthāpakatvāditi ||104||
GSP28mimslovu:4155: pratyabhijñānavat kasmāt smṛte 'pi na kalpyate // Msv_5,5.105 //
GSP28mimslovu:4157: smṛtyā tadanusāreṇa tadā sattve 'sya naiva dhī' // Msv_5,5.106 //
GSP28mimslovu:4159: yadādhikyaṃ bhavet kiñcit tatpadasya na gocara' // Msv_5,5.107 //
GSP28mimslovu:4164: tathāpi tadānīṃ sattāṃ bodhayantī pratyabhijñānavat smṛti' pramāṇaṃ kimiti na bhavatīti ||105||
GSP28mimslovu:4167: na tu pratyabhijñānavat tadanīṃ vastu' sattāṃ niścāyayati,
GSP28mimslovu:4170: idaṃ tu pratyutpannakāraṇakaṃ padāt padārthajñānaṃ grahaṇameva,
GSP28mimslovu:4175: ato na padaṃ smārakebhya' sadṛśādṛṣṭādibhyo viśiṣyata ityapramāṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4177: ata' kathamucyate nādhikyamavagatamyata ityata āha--- yadādhikyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4179: idaṃ cāsmābhi' sauhṛdamātreṇa śiṣyebhya' kathyate na padaṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4180: na tu tatpramāṇatve vākyārtho nāgamārtho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4181: tena hi pramāṇenāpi bhavatāvaśyaṃ padārthe bhavitavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:4189: sarveṣāṃ ca paroktānāṃ vākyād buddhāvasiddhatā // Msv_5,5.110 //
GSP28mimslovu:4194: evañca darśayitavyaṃ vākyārthabuddharanumānād bhinnā sambandhanubhavādṛte jāyamānatvād akṣabuddhivaditi ||109||
GSP28mimslovu:4198: te tāvad bahavo vākyārthabuddhāvasiddhā ityāha--- sarveṣāmiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4209: na ca padāt padārthajñāne vyāpti' kāraṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:4212: yata evaivaṃ vākyārthabuddha' sahārthairadṛṣṭeṣvapi vākyeṣu padārthamātravido jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4213: ato 'syā' sphaṭataramanumānād bhedaṃ paśyanta' saugatāstato 'vatīryāgamasyāmānavyatirekāt vibhyata' padābedavicāraṇāyāmeva kliṣṭā' /
GSP28mimslovu:4227: etāvatāpīha śabdānumānayoraikyamiti vākya pravartata sopahāsamāha --- vākyeṣviti ||111||
GSP28mimslovu:4233: asyāyaṃ tātparyārtha'--- upāmānamapi na parīkṣaṇīyam, evaṃ lakṣamakatvenāvyabhicārāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:4234: avayavārthastvekatra dṛśyamānaṃ sādṛśyaṃ pratiyogyantare dṛśyamānapratiyogisādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayāsannikṛṣṭer'the yāṃ buddhimutpādayati 'etatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'sā'viti,
GSP28mimslovu:4237: na ca vācyaṃ viṣayaviśeṣānupādānāt kathaṃ sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaviṣayā buddhiravagamyata iti,
GSP28mimslovu:4260: ato yathā naiyāyikoktamupamānaṃ pramāṇamāśrīyate, evaṃ taduktamevopamānalakṣaṇamāśrayitumucitam /
GSP28mimslovu:4262: asyārtha'--- prasiddhena gavādinā sādharmyāt sādhyasyāprasiddhasya gavayāde' kañcidanabhijñaṃ prati sādhanaṃ prajñāpanaṃ yādṛśo gaustādṛśo gavaya ici vākyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:4264: tadetatparihāreṇa lakṣaṇāntarapraṇayane kāraṇaṃ vācyamityata āha--- kīdṛgiti dvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:4271: evaṃ hi naiyāyikānāṃ śābdalakṣaṇam 'āptopadeśa' śabda' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4272: atrāpi cāptapuruṣapratyenaivāparidṛṣṭe gavayādau sādṛśyena sampratyayo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4274: ata āptasyaivedaṃ vacanamavyabhicārarīti matvā tadabalabhāvī niścayo jāyate,
GSP28mimslovu:4279: dhyānādismṛtitulyatvāt sā pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // Msv_5,6.4 //
GSP28mimslovu:4284: nanu śābare 'pi hyadṛśadarśanāt sadṛśāntare jñānamupamānamiti varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:4286: yathā hi kiñcid dhyāyata' smaraṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:4288: ato na dhyānādijanmanā smṛtyā sahāsyā' kaścid viśeṣa' /
GSP28mimslovu:4292: nanu smṛtisambhinnamapi deśādibhedena jāyamānaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP28mimslovu:4293: evamihāpi gāṃ nagare dṛṣṭavato vane gavayadarśanastadbhānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavatyata āha---deśakālādīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4294: na khalu deśādibheda' sanmātratayā prāmāṇye kāraṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:4297: api tu nagarāvagata' sampratyapi tatstha eva smaryata iti ||5||
GSP28mimslovu:4299: yena kilātideśavākyaṃ śrutaṃ yādṛśo gaustādṛśo gavaya iti,
GSP28mimslovu:4300: tasya śrutādideśavākyasya vanaṃ prāptasya yat svayamasau gosadṛśo gavaya iti sādṛśyānurañjitaṃ gavayajñānamidamupamānamiti ||6||
GSP28mimslovu:4303: nanu sādṛśyayukter'the na smṛtirnaindriyād gati' // Msv_5,6.7 //
GSP28mimslovu:4319: idamatra vikalpanīyam---- atideśavākyādavagatāt kiñcidadhikamavagamyate na vā,
GSP28mimslovu:4326: tarhi pratyakṣādeva labhyata iti na pramāṇāntarāvakāśa iti ||8 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:4327: nanuktamasannihite gavitatsādṛśyasyāpratyakṣātvānna tadviśiṣṭo gavaya' pratyakṣeṇāvagantuṃ śakyata iti sāvakāśaṃ pramāṇāntaramityata āha--- yāvaddhīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4329: tathā ca sādṛśyaviśiṣṭo gavaya iti kathamapratyakṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:4330: pratijāti kṛtsnaparisamāptameva jātivat sādṛśyamityapratyakṣe 'pi gavi tatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayapratyakṣamupapadyata eveti bhāva' ||9||
GSP28mimslovu:4337: na nām, vastu tattāvat sarvathā tai' pratīyate // Msv_5,6.12 //
GSP28mimslovu:4345: gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayadarśanaṃ cedupamānamabhimataṃ tadāśrutatadvākyānāmapi nagare gāṃ dṛṣṭavatāṃ vane gavayaṃ paśyatāmastyeveti mandaṃ viśeṣaṇaphalamiti ||11||
GSP28mimslovu:4353: vivṛtaṃ ca---“yathā gauriva gavaya ityukte gavā samānārthamindriyasannikarṣādupalabhamāno 'sya gavayaśabda' saṃjñeti saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaṃ pratipadyata' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4354: na cāśrutātideśavākyasya śabdamaviduṣa' samākhyāsambandhapratipatti' sambhavatīti phala
GSP28mimslovu:4362: ati deśavākyādeva gosādṛśyena gavayaśabdavācyer'thevadhārite vyaktirūpeṇānavagato 'pi śabdārthasambandho 'vagata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:4364: etāvacca sambandhasya svarūpam, ata' sūktaṃ viśeṣaṇānarthakyamiti ||13||
GSP28mimslovu:4365: nanu jñātasyāpi sambandhasya pratyabhijñāne prāmāṇyamavihatamevāta āha---na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:4372: āha ca--- 'gṛhīte 'pi deśādibhedabhinne puna' pramāpratyabhijñānumānātsāt pratyakṣavadavadhārite 'pī'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:4377: na brūma' parokṣaṃ na pratyabhijñāyata iti,
GSP28mimslovu:4382: ata eva 'na cāsye'ti sambandhasya pratyabhijñānaviṣayatvaṃ nirākaroti /
GSP28mimslovu:4386: śrutaśabdollisvatamidaṃ gavayajñānamato na pratyakṣasya viṣaya isyupamānasya bhaviṣyatītyata āha---śabdeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4390: jātyādivat tadā tena sādṛśyaṃ kiṃ na mīyate // Msv_5,6.16 //
GSP28mimslovu:4393_0: nusāri jñānaṃ śabdaśaktiparāmarśajameveti pratyakṣameveti varṇitamityato naikatrāpi
GSP28mimslovu:4393_1: lakṣaṇe upamānasya prameyamadhikaṃ paśyāma iti vācyamasyāpūrvaṃ prameyamityupasaṃharati--- tasmāditi ||15 ||
GSP28mimslovu:4394: yadi tūcyate--- pratiyogisāpekṣaṃ sādṛśyagrahaṇam ato na pratyakṣam,
GSP28mimslovu:4397: ata' pratyakṣe 'pi dharmiṇi parokṣameva sādṛśyamiti na tadviśiṣṭasya pratyakṣatvamiti sāvakāśamupamānamityata āha---vyavasāyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4400: ato jātyādivatsādṛśyamapi teṣāṃ kiṃ na pratyakṣema pramīyata iti ||16||
GSP28mimslovu:4402: evaṃ tāvat sādṛśyasya vastvantaratvamaṅgīkṛtya tatpratyakṣatayopamānasya viṣayābhāvenāprāmāṇyamuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:4406: ayaṃ ca teṣāmabhiprāya'--- sādṛśyaṃ hi na tāvadāśrayebhyo bhinnamupalambhāt /
GSP28mimslovu:4409: na tāvat kārtsnyena vṛttamanyatrāpi tathaiva vartata iti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:4411: kiñcedaṃ sādṛśyaṃ na tāvad dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmanyatamam, padārthapaṇḍitaisteṣvanupasaṃkhyātatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:4412: na hi navasu dravyeṣu caturviśatyāṃ guṇeṣu pañcasu vā karmasu sādṛśyamantargataṃ paśyāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:4422: bhūya' svapyekatra samāhṛteṣu pratiyogya(nyatarā?) napekṣeṣu sādṛsyabuddherupajananāt /
GSP28mimslovu:4440: kintu tattvāntaramevedaṃ dravyajātiguṇakarmabhyo vyatiriktaṃ guṇabhedo vā /
GSP28mimslovu:4443: evaṃ copapanno bhavati sadṛśasambhāvanameva tatra vidhyartha' śyenaciñcodanārtha' /
GSP28mimslovu:4445: yadi cāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyamiṣyante tatasteṣāmihābhāvāt sādṛśyamapi du' sampādanamiti so 'nārabhyor'tha' pratijñāto bhavet 'śyenacitaṃ cinvīte'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:4448: tattvāntare hi sādṛśye gāmanapekṣyāpi gavayaṃ sadṛśamiti jānīyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:4449: tatra hi tanniravaśeṣameva sādṛśyaṃ parisamāptamiti kimanyadapekṣate /
GSP28mimslovu:4450: kathamanapekṣite gavi tatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'vagamyata iti cet kasatsya gavā sambandha' /
GSP28mimslovu:4451: samavāya iti cet, so 'pi tarhi gavayavad gosadṛśatayā jñātavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:4452: api ca samavetaṃ nāma tatsādṛśyaṃ gavayagatasādṛśyagrahaṇe 'pi kimityapekṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4458: tathedaṃ gavi gavayasādṛśyamiti na tadapekṣāheturupalabhyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4467: iti kiṃ gogatadvedanena, ato gavyavagate 'navagateṣu cāvayavasāmānyeṣu gosādṛśyajñānaṃ jāyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:4468: jātyorhi tatsādṛśyam, avagate ca te iti kimanyadapekṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4470: idaṃ ca na syādarthāntaratve sādṛśyasya sarvatra tāvattvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:4479: ata' kalpanāmātrakalpitaṃ dvicandrālātacakrādivad bhrāntikaraṇaṃ sādṛśyaṃ na prāmāṇikamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4480: prameyābhāvādapi nopamānāṅgamanyad vā sadṛśye pramāṇamityāpekṣa iti ||17||
GSP28mimslovu:4490: asyārtha'--- bhūyobhiravayavasāmānyairyo jātyantarasya yoga' tat sādṛśyam /
GSP28mimslovu:4493: etena yaduktaṃ citrādau kathaṃ sādṛśyamiti tat parihṛtam /
GSP28mimslovu:4501: ato 'sya guṇasya sato gumakarmaṇoranupapanna eva samavāya' /
GSP28mimslovu:4502: atha dravyasamavetameva guṇakarmaṇī api sadṛśatayā bodhayati, ekārthasamavāyāt /
GSP28mimslovu:4505: dravyasamavāye pramāṇābhāvāt, avayavasāmānyāni hi karṇādīni vyaktisamavetāni pratyakṣāṇi /
GSP28mimslovu:4507: na ca gandhādisadṛśaṃ dravyamiti ato 'vayavasāmānyameva sādṛśyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4510: jātyantarasamavāyināṃ jātyantare samavāyāt sādṛśyam, na svarūpamātram, na ca bhūyastvam /
GSP28mimslovu:4521: ata ekaikatrāpi svarūpamātreṇa sāmānyāni gamyanta eva /
GSP28mimslovu:4527: tu tāni sādṛśyam, samavāyātmā ca nāpratisaṃhite jātyantare 'bhivyakto bhavatīti yuktaiva tadapekṣā /
GSP28mimslovu:4529: na hi devadattasya pitṛtvaṃ putrāpekṣā pratīyata iti, tadavastu /
GSP28mimslovu:4544: vināpi tu tāni tatra tatra sadṛśabodho dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:4547: yadeva tu kiñcid guṇādisāmānyaṃ sadṛśadhiyamupajanayati tadeva sādṛśyamato nātraikarūpyameva /
GSP28mimslovu:4549: tad yathā--- jātisādṛśyam 'agnirvai brāhmaṇa' iti, agnisadṛśa ityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:4554: evaṃ hyāha--- 'prajāpatirmukhatastrivṛtaṃ chandasāṃ niramimīta agniṃ devatānāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ manuṣyāṇāmi'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:4556: guṇasāmānyaṃ tu citrādau suprakāśameva loke, vede ca 'ādityo yūpa' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4559: na dharmā eva sādṛśyaṃ bhūyastā vā tadāśrayā /
GSP28mimslovu:4561: dravyasādṛśyaṃ samālaṅkāradhāriṇorloke, vede ca “lohitopṇīṣā ṛtvija' pracarantīti” /
GSP28mimslovu:4563: evaṃ hyāha---“yathā vai śyeno nipatyādatte, evamayaṃ dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ nipatyādatte“iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4564: śaktisādṛśyaṃ tu bhīmo malla iti loke, vede ca somapūtīkayo' /
GSP28mimslovu:4568: uktaṃ ca---“somasya yoṃ'śa' parāpatat sa pūtīko 'bhavad” iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4569: svadharmasādṛśyaṃ kecit triśikhā' kecit pañcaśikhā iti loke triśikhādīnāmanyonyasādṛśyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:4570: vede ca vasiṣṭhātryādīnāṃ narāśaṃso dvitīya' prayāja iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4571: dharmaniyama eva hi tatra sādṛśyam, prakṛtivikṛtikarmaṇośca dharmasāmānyameva sādṛśyamityuktameva /
GSP28mimslovu:4572: ete ca jātyādaya ekaikaśo dviśastriśa' samastaśaśca samānā bhavanta' sādṛśyasya vicitratāmāpādayantīti ||20||
GSP28mimslovu:4573: nanu yatra sādṛśyaṃ samavaiti tatsadṛśabuddhyā gṛhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4574: yadi cāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyaṃ, tāni tarhyavayaveṣu samavayantīti teṣveva sadṛśadhiyaṃ janayeyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:4575: atha teṣāṃ bhūyasastā, sā cāvayavasāmānyeṣviti tānyeva sadṛśāni syu' /
GSP28mimslovu:4576: kathaṃ jātyantare sadṛśabuddhirata āha---na dharmā iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4578: ata eva hetorna dhmākhyāvayavasāmānyāni tadabhūyastā vā sādṛśyaṃ, teṣu sādṛsyabuddhyanutpatte' /
GSP28mimslovu:4579: yadeva hi teṣāṃ bhūyastayā yuktaṃ jātyantaraṃ gavayādi vyaktyantaraṃ vāgneyasauryādi,
GSP28mimslovu:4583: piṇḍitāni tu jātyantarasamavāyopahitāni sādṛśyam, ayaṃ ca bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyetyasyaiva /
GSP28mimslovu:4591: tena sarvaṃ na sāmānyaṃ nityatvena prakalpyate // Msv_5,6.24 //
GSP28mimslovu:4593: jātyantarasyeti yāvacchrutagrāhiṇa' paricodanamidam--- yadi jātyantarasya bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogata' sādṛśyaṃ kataṃ yamayorvyaktisādṛśyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4596: yatraivaṃ sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyate jātau vyaktau vā, tatraiva tadāśrayaṇīyam /
GSP28mimslovu:4601: yadi tāvadalpavṛttisvabhāvaṃ vyaktyoreva yuktam, atha bahuvṛttisvabhāvaṃ tato jātyoreva /
GSP28mimslovu:4604: nanu sāmānyāni sādṛśyaṃ, tāni ca vyaktināśena naśyeyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:4606: etāni tāvannāśīni bhavantu , sāmānyāntarāṇi gotvādīni nityānyeveti na kaścillokavirodha
GSP28mimslovu:4616: tāni vyastāni santyevaṃ pratyakṣe 'pi kvacit kvacit // Msv_5,6.26 //
GSP28mimslovu:4620: tata' paraṃ tu sāmānyaṃ bhavet sādṛśyavarjitam // Msv_5,6.28 //
GSP28mimslovu:4625: bhūyastayā teṣāṃ sāhaśyamatiriktaṃ bhavati, na tvekaikaśo na santīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4627: api tu pratyakṣe 'pi kvacidarthe tānyupalabhyanta evetyāha---tānīti ||26||
GSP28mimslovu:4629: tadavayavānāṃ tu kathaṃ sāhaśyaṃ bhaviṣyatyata āha---anyatheti /
GSP28mimslovu:4630: dvedhā hyanupapannam--- kiñcidanupapannameva yanna kathañcidupapādayituṃ śakyam,
GSP28mimslovu:4633: yattu kalpite ksmiṃścidupapadyate anyathā nopapadyate tadupapattiranyakalpamanayāvasīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4651: sāhitye tu pramāṇaṃ ca tayoranyanna vidyate // Msv_5,7.31 //
GSP28mimslovu:4653: tathā na kalpyate taccet sāhityaṃ na pratīyate // Msv_5,7.32 //
GSP28mimslovu:4658: aprāmāṇyakāraṇāni ca saṃśayaviparyayāvajñānaṃ vā, taccārthāpattāvapi nāstīti kathamapramāṇatā /
GSP28mimslovu:4660: na sambandha' prāmāṇye kāraṇam, api tu bādhaviraha' /
GSP28mimslovu:4661: sa cehāpyaviśiṣṭa iti na kaścid doṣor'thāpattāvasmākaṃ pratibhātīti ||29||
GSP28mimslovu:4662: nanu gṛhābhāvo nāntareṇa bahirbhāvamupapadyate ato nāntarīyaka',
GSP28mimslovu:4667: na ceha nāntareṇa bahirbhāvaṃ gṛhābhāvo bhavatīti prāgavagatam,
GSP28mimslovu:4668: tadaiva hyarthāpattyā bahirbhāvaṃ parikalpyāyamanena vinā na bhavatītyavinābhāvitā kalpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4669: ata' sā svarūpasatyapi na pūrvamavagateti na jñānotpattau kāraṇamiti ||30||
GSP28mimslovu:4681: yadaikasminnayaṃ deśe na tadānyatra vidyate // Msv_5,7.34 //
GSP28mimslovu:4687: evaṃ cākalpymāne 'nyatarasya sambnadhino 'gṛhītatvāt sāhityapratītireva na syāt,
GSP28mimslovu:4688: ata' sāhityārthamarthāpattirarthanīyeti siddhaṃ pramāṇāntaramityabhiprāyeṇāha--- pramāṇaṃ ceti pratīyate 'ntena /
GSP28mimslovu:4692: tathā viditasambandhācca gṛhābhāvād bahirbhāvānumānamityāśaṅkate tāvat--- gṛhadvārīti ||
GSP28mimslovu:4698: eṣo 'pi ca prakāro naikatra bhāvena sarvatrābhāvāvagame sambhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:4701: nanvevaṃ tadāvagataṃ yadāyamekatra bhavati tadā paratra tatsamīpe na bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4711: taddeśāgamanāt sā hi dūrastheṣvasti satsvapi // Msv_5,7.37 //
GSP28mimslovu:4712: gatvā gatvā tu tān deśān yadyartho nopalabhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4715: taddeśāgamanāt spaṣṭo vyatireko na sidhyati // Msv_5,7.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:4717: evamekatra san sarvatra nopalabhyata iti sarvatraiva nāstīti śakyamavagantum /
GSP28mimslovu:4719: darśanaṃ hi kāryaṃ svakāraṇarthendriyasannikarṣādyapekṣamāṇamekatra sato na sarvatra sambhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:4725: kimiti na pratīyate ata āha--- taddeśeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4727: dūrastheṣu tvayogyatvādeva satsvapyanupalabdhi' sambhavatīti nābhāvaniścaya iti ||37||
GSP28mimslovu:4733: na ca sarve vipakṣā gatvopalabdhuṃ śakyante,
GSP28mimslovu:4737: agnyādyabhāve ye vyatirekiṇo dhūmādayasteṣāmagnyādyabhāvadeśāgamanād vyatireko na sidhyatīti ||39||
GSP28mimslovu:4746: vyatirakepradhānavādino hi bauddhasyāsati vipakṣād vyatirekagrahaṇe na heturgamako bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:4752: sa ca vipakṣādarśanamātreṇa dvitraireva darśanai' sidhyatīti ||
GSP28mimslovu:4756: evaṃ tarhīhāpi caitrābhāvasya jagadavartina ekadeśabhāvena sambandha upapadyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:4757: atrāpi hyekatra caitre bhavati katipayeṣu tadabhāvo dṛṣṭa eva,
GSP28mimslovu:4765: avagate hi sāhitye bhavati śaṅkā--- kimayamaupādhika' saṃsargo dhūmasyāgninā saha āhosvit sahaja eveti,
GSP28mimslovu:4780: asyāpi hi dvitricaturaireva darśanairvyabhicāro dṛśyeta, na ca dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4785: sa hi prathamamanvicchato vipakṣadeśānāmanantatvād durlabho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4786: svabhāvaniyame tu jñāte svabhāvasyāvyabhicārāt sulabho vyatireka' /
GSP28mimslovu:4787: na hi svābhāvikamuṣṇatvamantareṇa kvacit kadācidagnirbhavatīti kaścidāśaṅkate /
GSP28mimslovu:4803: tathātu taṃ gṛhītvāsāhityagrahaṇapura' saraṃ yadyanumānamiṣyate tadarthāpattipūrvakam,
GSP28mimslovu:4806: tasyānyathā na siddhi' syādityanyeṣvasya nāstitā // Msv_5,7.46 //
GSP28mimslovu:4810: yastu vadati--- svātmanastāvadekatra sata' sarvatrābhāvena sambandho dṛṣṭa' ato 'nyasyāpyanuminotīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4811: sa vaktavya' svātmana eva sarvatrāsattā kathamavagamyate,
GSP28mimslovu:4816: atha tatra sato dūrasthatvameva na syāt,
GSP28mimslovu:4819: yo hi yatra bhavati tasya sahaivādhāreṇātmopalabdhiyogyo bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:4824: tatra ca viruddhāvyabhicāritoktaiva--- deśāntarāṇi vimatipadāni caitravanti caitravaddeśasamīpavyatiriktadeśatvāccaitravaddeśavaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:4825: yatra ca pratihetunā sandeha' kriyate tatra balavatānyena sarvatrābhāvena samartham /
GSP28mimslovu:4837: na tāvadākāśavaccaitra', ekatra parisamāpto hi parimaṇḍala' so 'vagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4838: na ca yathāvayavī svāvayaveṣu vartate tathā deśāntare vartitumarhati /
GSP28mimslovu:4839: yadi hi tasyānyatra bhāgā' bhaveyu' iha kṛtsno nopalabhyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:4849: dṛṣṭvā sambandhitāṃ caiṣā śaktirgamyeta nānyathā // Msv_5,7.48 //
GSP28mimslovu:4851: arthāpatte' pramāṇatvaṃ trailakṣaṇyād vinā bhavet // Msv_5,7.49 //
GSP28mimslovu:4852: ato 'syana kathañcidekatra sato 'nyatra sattvamupapadyata ityanyatrābhāvamantarbhāvya kṛtsnabodha' samarthyate,
GSP28mimslovu:4855: bhāvānumānenaiva kevalaṃ tu durbale pratighātahetau tadabādhenaivārthāpattirātmānaṃ labhate /
GSP28mimslovu:4860: pratyakṣapūrvikāyā bhedamidānīṃ darśayituṃ tatpratijñānaṃ tāvadāha--- yatra ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:4861: yatrāpi dāhādikāryadarśanādagnyāde' kāraṇasya śaktirastīti kalpyate tatrāpyarthāpattireva prathamā /
GSP28mimslovu:4863: bhāṣyodāhṛtatvāccābhāvapūrvikāyā eva prathamamanumānād bhedo varṇita iti ||46,47||
GSP28mimslovu:4865: evaṃ hi manyante--- dvividhamanumānaṃ dṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayamadṛṣṭasvalakṣamaviṣayaṃ ca saṃyogavibhāgādibhya iva kriyādyanumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:4866: kāryaṃ hi kāraṇena sāmānyato jñātasambandhamiti tatastatpratītiranumānabhevedamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4868: yena hyekadā bījādaṅkuro dṛṣṭa' so 'nyadā tathāvidhādeva punaranupalabhamāna' svabhāvānumānena janayitavyo 'nenāṅkura ityanumimāna evātrā śaṅkate kathamaṅkuro na jāyata iti,
GSP28mimslovu:4869: tata' kalpayati--- asti kaścid bījasamavāyī śaktibhedo yadvaśāt prāk kāryamāsīdadya ca nāstīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4871: api ca sambandhagrahaṇādhīnameva sarvamanumānaṃ na tadagṛhītayo' sambandhino' sambhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4876: pīno divā na bhuṅkte cetyevamādivaca' śrutau // Msv_5,7.51 //
GSP28mimslovu:4880: ata eva ca na tadvato 'pi grahaṇaṃ sambhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:4884: nanvavagataṃ tāvat kāryasāmānyaṃ kāraṇasāmānyena vyāptamiti, atastadanumāsyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4885: satyam, kintu śaktikakalpanayā vinā kāraṇākhyaiva na nivartate /
GSP28mimslovu:4886: aṅkuro hi bījabhāvabhāvī vyabhicaritabhāvāntaraśca bījakāraṇaka ityavagata' satyapi tu bīje 'jāyamānastadapi vyabhicaratīti kāraṇāvagatirevāvasīdati,
GSP28mimslovu:4888: kḷptāyāṃ ca śaktau kāraṇasambandhinyāmarthāpattyā yadi sambandho 'vagamyate tadastu siddhāntavacchaktisiddhāvarthāpatti' pramāṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4891: jayo hi parājayena viditavyāptiriti tamekatra ghātake nakule dṛṣṭvā pratipakṣasya parājayo 'vagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4900: so 'vaidika' prasajyeta yadyeṣā bhidyate tata' // Msv_5,7.53 //
GSP28mimslovu:4904: na hyanekārthatā yuktā vākye vācakatā tathā // Msv_5,7.55 //
GSP28mimslovu:4908: na bhedo yena tadvākyaṃ tasya syāt pratipādakam // Msv_5,7.57 //
GSP28mimslovu:4910: phalāpūrvavidhyantādisiddhau bhūyānasyā vede upayoga', sarvo 'nāgamatvevaidika' syāditi ||53||
GSP28mimslovu:4917: nanu rātryādivākyārtho yadi divāvākyenānabhihita' padārthānvayarūpeṇaiva svārthavad gamayiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4919: na hi divāvākye rātryādipadārthā' santi, kutastatra teṣāmanvaya iti ||56||
GSP28mimslovu:4920: nanu divādipadārthānvayādeva rātryādivākyārtha' pratyeṣyate, ata āha---na divādīti ||57||
GSP28mimslovu:4925: pramāṇaṃ tasya vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣādiṣu yad bhavet // Msv_5,7.59 //
GSP28mimslovu:4927: nānumānaṃ na cedaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ tena saha kvacit // Msv_5,7.60 //
GSP28mimslovu:4936: tasyaiva pratyakṣādiṣu madhye pramāṇaṃ nirdhāraṇīyamityāha--- tasyeti ||59||
GSP28mimslovu:4937: tatra pratyakṣaṃ tāvanna tatsiddhau pramāṇamityāha---na hīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4938: anumānamapi tena sambaddhasya divāvākyasyādarśanānna sambhavatītyāha--- nānumānamiti ||60||
GSP28mimslovu:4939: aviditasambandhe tu divāvākye liṅga iṣyamāṇe 'vyavasthetyāha---yadi tviti ||61||
GSP28mimslovu:4940: yadi tūcyate sambandhamevadivāvākyasya rātrivākyenagṛhītvā tatastadanumāsyata iti,
GSP28mimslovu:4942: na tuśrutārthāpattivedyāni sarvāṇi lokavedavākyāni sarvai' pratipādakavākyai' sambaddhānyavagatāni /
GSP28mimslovu:4954: nāgṛhīte hi taddharmo gṛhīte nānumeyatā // Msv_5,7.67 //
GSP28mimslovu:4956: kenaciddhi sāmānyātmanā jñātasambandhena viśiṣṭaṃ kiñcidanumīyate na vastusattāmātram /
GSP28mimslovu:4957: na ca viśiṣṭa', ajñātasambandhatvāt iha tu tadubhayaṃ viparītamiti ||63||
GSP28mimslovu:4958_0: yataścātra vākyāsvarūpameva prameyamata' parvatādiriva pūrvasiddha' svatantro 'sambaddha'
GSP28mimslovu:4958_1: kenacidagnyādineva svatantreṇa kenacid viśeṣito dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭo nāstītyāha---
GSP28mimslovu:4959: atha śrutameva vākyaṃ dharmitayopādāyāśrutavākyaviśiṣṭatā sādhyate tatastadaprasiddheraprasiddhaviśeṣaṇa' pakṣa ityāha--- atheti ||65||
GSP28mimslovu:4960: api ca śrute vākye 'śrutavākyaviśiṣṭe sādhyamāne na tāvat kiñcilliṅgamupalabhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:4962: tad yadi tadeva punarliṅgamiṣyate tata' pratijñārthaikadeśitvam,
GSP28mimslovu:4964: dharmadharmibhāvo 'pi divāvākyarātrivākyadayo' śabdārthayoriva nirākārya ityāha--- tadvadeveti /
GSP28mimslovu:4965: yathā tatrārthe dharmiṇyapratipanne na padaṃ taddharma ityuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:4971: anumāviṣayotthaṃ tu dharmatvaṃ niṣphalaṃ bhavet // Msv_5,7.69 //
GSP28mimslovu:4975: atha tu pakṣadharmatāpratipattyarthaṃ tat prathamamavagatamityucyate tato 'numeyābhāva ityabhiprāya' /
GSP28mimslovu:4978: api ca tatraiva pade varṇitam--- na kriyākārakasambandhādṛte sambandho bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4982: na cātra viṣayaviṣayibhāvarūpāpi dvayārvākyayo' śabdārthayoriva sambandho bhavati ucyate hi śabdenārtha',
GSP28mimslovu:4983: na tu vākyaṃ vākyāntarasya vācakamityāha--- avācaketi /
GSP28mimslovu:4985: iha tu vākyasyāvācakatvāt tadviṣayatvameva pratyetuṃ na śakyate iti viśeṣa' ||68||
GSP28mimslovu:4986: yadi tūcyate pratīyate tāvad divāvākyād rātrivākyam,
GSP28mimslovu:4999: na tu vākyāntareṇaiṣāṃ vinā kiñcinna sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:5000: na cāpyanya' prakāro 'sti tena vākyena saṅgatau // Msv_5,7.71 //
GSP28mimslovu:5002: prasaṅgāt tatra dūre 'pi nāsambandhāt pramucyate // Msv_5,7.72 //
GSP28mimslovu:5004: anvayavyatirekau ca pratiṣedhyau pade yathā // Msv_5,7.73 //
GSP28mimslovu:5005: yathā vākyārthaṃ gamayanti, evaṃ rātrivākyamapi kiṃ na gamayanti, ata āha--sāmānyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5006: kriyāsāmānyaṃ kārakasāmānyaṃ vā pratipannamalabdhetaretaravyatiṣaṅgamanyathā na sidhyatīti taṃ viśeṣaṃ gamayati,
GSP28mimslovu:5007: yaścāsau viśeṣa' sa eva tu vākyārtha ityucyate iti ||70||
GSP28mimslovu:5008: na caiṣa prakāro rātrivākyapratipādane sambhavatītyāha---na tviti /
GSP28mimslovu:5009: yadyapi divāvākyaṃ na rātrivākyasya vācakam, tathāpi kalpayiṣyāma', tataśca tatpratyeṣyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5012: atra tāvadevaṃ vākyāntarakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇameva nāstīti tadanādṛtya tāvadanavasthāmāpādayati,
GSP28mimslovu:5013: yadapi kalpitaṃ vākyaṃ tadapi na rātrivākaymavagamayituṃ śaktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5014: na ca tadasambaddhameva tasya gamakamiti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5016: evaṃ yadeva kiñcid vākyaṃ kalpayitumiṣyate tadeva nāsambaddhaṃ gamakamityanavasthāpata iti ||72||
GSP28mimslovu:5018: tad varaṃ prathamasyaiva tathāvidhasya gamaktavaṃ kalpatum,
GSP28mimslovu:5022: anvayavyatirekayorapi padavat pratiṣedho darśayitavya ityāha--- anvayeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5028: arthe 'pi caivameva syāt tasmāt pūrveṣvasambhava' // Msv_5,7.75 //
GSP28mimslovu:5030: tadātmalābha eva syād vinā netyetadiṣyate // Msv_5,7.76 //
GSP28mimslovu:5031: etadarthād vinā nāyamityartha' kiṃ na kalpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5034: na ca jñānānvayo 'satyapi rātrivākyajñāne vyutpannasya divāvākyajñānād,
GSP28mimslovu:5036: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamairna rātrivākyaṃ pratīyata ityuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:5037: upamānamapi tatra na pramāṇamiti darśayati---śrutavākyeti tvamantena /
GSP28mimslovu:5038: divāvākyavacca tadarthenāpi na rātrivākyamupamīyata ityāha--- arthasyeti ||74||
GSP28mimslovu:5039: yathā ca rātrivākyasya divāvākyatatadarthābhyāmupamānaṃ nirastamevaṃ rātrivākyārthasyāpi tābhyāṃ nirasanīyamityāha--- upamānatveti syādantena /
GSP28mimslovu:5047: ayamabhiprāya'--- pīntavaṃ hi bhojanapratiṣedho vā paraspareṇa pratihanyate tayoścārthakalpanayaivātmalābha' /
GSP28mimslovu:5051: labdhaprayojane vākye paraṃ nāgamikaṃ ca na' // Msv_5,7.78 //
GSP28mimslovu:5052: bhojane, rātribhojanenaiva pīnatvamupapadyate, na rātrivākyenātor'thakalpanaiva yukteti /
GSP28mimslovu:5053: api ca, yathā parairabhidhīyamāno 'pi padārthānupapattyā gamyamāno vākyārtha āgamārtho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5056: savikalpako hi śrutārthāpattibodha' savikalpajñānāni ca śabdapura' sarāṇi /
GSP28mimslovu:5057: ata' śabdaparyavasitāyāmarthāpattau śabdādeva sidhyannartho nārthāpatterviṣaya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5060: tatastayorapi śabdaparyavasāyitaiva bhavet atastatra smṛtistha eva śabdo 'pratyāyaka', tadihāpi samānam /
GSP28mimslovu:5061: yathā hi karmendriyamarthenaiva sannikṛṣṭamiti tameva prakāśayati liṅgaṃ cārthena sambaddhamiti ta gamayati,
GSP28mimslovu:5071: ata eva nirvāpamantre 'tideśād vikṛtiṃ gate prākṛtadevatāyā abhāvāt tatpadanivṛttau tasya sthāne sūryāyeti padamūhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5073: hṛdayasyāgne 'vadyati atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasa ityatrāpadyatipadānuṣaṅga' /
GSP28mimslovu:5074: na cārtha evānuṣajyate 'anuṣaṅgo vākyasamāpti' sarveṣu pekṣyate śabdollekhenāpi gṛhyamāṇa',
GSP28mimslovu:5077: yadi tu tatrāpi śabdo 'pekṣyate tiraścāmarthavikalpo na syāt,
GSP28mimslovu:5078: sa ca nāsti dṛśyeta hi teṣāmapi hitāhitaprāptiparihārārtha' prayatna' /
GSP28mimslovu:5091: anumānādiṣu tu saṃskārodabodhenāvarjanīyatayāstu nāma śabdasmṛti', na tu śabdāpekṣā /
GSP28mimslovu:5092: ato 'tra vākyasyānupapannasya vākyāntaramevārthavadupapādakaṃ na tvarthamātraṃ śabdamātraṃ vā /
GSP28mimslovu:5093: ata evāgṛhītasambandhasyārthamaviduṣa' śrute 'pyupapādake vākye nānupapannavākyārthajñāne 'nupapatti' śāmyati,
GSP28mimslovu:5096: yāvaddhayakṛtārtha' śabdastāvad bodho 'vagamyate, sa tadartho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5099: tu kriyākārakasaṃsarge labdhaprayojanaṃ vākyamiti tata' paramarthāntaramavagamyamānaṃ nāgamikaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5100: na hi prayojanatvāvagatārthānupapattyā yadavagamyate nāsādyata iti yuktaṃ vākyārthasya pūrvāvagatasyāgamārthātvam /
GSP28mimslovu:5102: śrutāgamārthatve yadi pramādāt tannāśo bhavati tato yajurvedādivihitanāśanimittaṃ prāyaścitam,
GSP28mimslovu:5103: itarathā tvavijñātanāśanimittamiti yadyavijñāto bhūrbhuva' sva' svāheti mahāvyāhṛtī' samāhṛtya prāyaścitaṃ samupadiśati /
GSP28mimslovu:5104: śrutārthāpattivedya eva hi vedo 'vijñāta ityucyate, sa hyṛgādīnāṃ nānyatamatvena
GSP28mimslovu:5107: na tāvad divāvākyarātrivākyayo' sambandho 'sti, sannapi vā na vidita', na
GSP28mimslovu:5111: pratyakṣasya pramāṇatvaṃ kathaṃ vā saṅgatervinā // Msv_5,7.80 //
GSP28mimslovu:5113: na hi pratyakṣavelāyāṃ sarveṇāsau nirūpyate // Msv_5,7.81 //
GSP28mimslovu:5115: na syādeva pramāṇāṅgamasatā tulya eva sa' // Msv_5,7.82 //
GSP28mimslovu:5116: aprāpyakāriṇī yeṣāṃ cakṣu' śrotre ca te yathā /
GSP28mimslovu:5118: tasmādasattve sattve vā sambandhasya yadeva na' /
GSP28mimslovu:5119: jāyetābhaṅguraṃ jñāna tasyaiva syāt pramāṇatā // Msv_5,7.84 //
GSP28mimslovu:5128: nanvindriyārtasannikarṣajameva pratyakṣamato nākāraṇaṃ prāmāṇye sambandha iti codayati---astīticedantena /
GSP28mimslovu:5131: nirūpito hi sambandha' pramāṇotpattau kāraṇamanumāne, na ceha tatheti ||81||
GSP28mimslovu:5136: tenānādṛtyaiva sambaddhamutpannamasandigdhamaviparītaṃ ca deśādibhede 'pi jñānaṃ pramāṇamitayāśrayaṇīyamityāha---tasmāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:5140: bhedābhede visaṃvāda' kṛtastatra ca nirṇaya' // Msv_5,7.85 //
GSP28mimslovu:5141: ṛte yatra ca sambandhād buddhareva na jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5142: tatra kiṃ kriyatāṃ so 'pi prāmāṇye naiva kāraṇam // Msv_5,7.86 //
GSP28mimslovu:5143: smṛtyā śrutiryā parikalpyate 'smin liṅgādibhiryā viniyojikā ca /
GSP28mimslovu:5144: phalādibhiryat paripūraṇaṃ ca sambandhadṛk tatra na kācidasti // Msv_5,7.87 //
GSP28mimslovu:5146: na hi tayā pravartamānānāṃ pravṛtti' pratihanyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5148: anumānād bhedābhedayorasti vivāda', tatra cāsmābhi' kṛto nirṇaya ityāha---na cāpīti ||85||
GSP28mimslovu:5150: tatra hi buddhirevāsati sambandhajñāne na jāyata iti tadutpattau kāraṇamāśrīyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:5153: bhūyān khalu vedabhāga' śrutārthāpattipramāṇaka' sa tāmantareṇa na sidhyeta,
GSP28mimslovu:5158: tenaiva caikāṃ na samāmananti sahasrabhāgaṃ tu samāmaneyu' ||' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5160: bhramavipralipsānubhavapuṃvākyāntareṣu smṛte' svamūlakāraṇamantareṇānupapattyā śrutireva mūlatayā kalpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5161_0: tathā liṅgādibhi' svaviniyojikā śrutirupakalpyate---- yathā tāvat prakaraṇāmnāte
GSP28mimslovu:5161_2: sāmānyata' kratūpakārāvagatau viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ mantraśaktinirīkṣayā yacchaknuyādityupabandhena śakyārtha
GSP28mimslovu:5164: evaṃsvabhāvāpyanumānaśabdaṃ labheta cedasti yathepsitaṃ na' // Msv_5,7.88 //
GSP28mimslovu:5167: yathā barhirmantre 'nena lunīyāditi so 'yaṃ laiṅgiko viniyoga' /
GSP28mimslovu:5168: vākyena tu yathā --- tasminneva mantre dāmītyetat padaṃ lavane śaktamiti tadeva liṅge viniyujyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5176: aśrutaphaletikartavyatākeṣu ca karmasu viśvajitsauryādiṣu pūraṇasamarthā śruti' kalpyate 'viśvajitā yajeta svargakāma'iti,
GSP28mimslovu:5181: na hyatrānupapadyamānasya kalpanīyena sambandha' kenacid dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:5186: yadi tu lakṣaṇato bhinnāpi paścādanumānasāmānyādanumānaśabdena vaktumiṣyate tadastu,
GSP28mimslovu:5195: nahi pramāṇābhāvena pramāṇaṃ lakṣyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5198: sarvāṇyapi hi pramāṇānītaretarābhāvarūpāṇi śakyante pramāṇābhāva iti vaditum /
GSP28mimslovu:5199: na ca sarvapramāṇasādhāraṇaṃ kiñcidekaṃ lakṣaṇamasti, yadabhāvena ṣaṣṭhaṃ lakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5200: api ca--- pramāṇaṃ nāma kasyacitprameyasya vyavasthāpakaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5201: tadanena kiṃ vyavasthāpyata iti na vidma' /
GSP28mimslovu:5208: kasya ca pramāṇasya prameyamidam, yadi pramāṇābhāvasya /
GSP28mimslovu:5212: yadi matam--- asti tāvannāstīti buddhi' sarvalaukikaparīkṣakāṇāmavivādasiddhā,
GSP28mimslovu:5213: na ca buddheranālambanatvaṃ svāṃśālambanatvaṃ veti vijñānavāde varṇitameva /
GSP28mimslovu:5216: tadidaṃ nāstīti vijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ ghaṭādyabhāva' prameyamiti manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:5219: yadi tu nābhāvastattvāntaramiṣyate, kastarhi kṣīre dadhyabhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:5221: ataścaiṣa daghni kṣīrābhāva', ya' kimālambanamiti vaktavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:5225: ka' tarhi tattvāntaramiti siddha' prameyabheda', tadbhedācca pramāṇabheda' /
GSP28mimslovu:5226: na hi tat rūpāṇāṃ bhāvenaiva sannikarṣa', nābhāvena /
GSP28mimslovu:5228: yathā svarūpamātradṛṣṭe gṛhādau deśāntaragamane kasyacidabhāvaṃ pratyanuyuktena tadaiva tadabhāvo 'vasīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5240: asti ca mīmāṃsakānāṃ prasiddhi'--- ṣaṣṭhaṃ kiledaṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5244: granthato hi pramāṇābhāva evāvasīyate na pramāṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:5245: nāstītyapyukte prameyābhāvameva laukikā' pratibudhyante na prameya kiñcit /
GSP28mimslovu:5248: siddhasya hi jñānasya pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ veti vicāraṇā yuktā /
GSP28mimslovu:5252: yadā ghaṭādisahitaṃ tadupalabhyate tadā ghaṭo 'stīti vyavahāra' pravartate /
GSP28mimslovu:5254: na ca vācyaṃ satsvapi sūkṣmeṣu bhāveṣu tanmātrabodho dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:5257: dvedhā hi tanmātrabodha', dṛśye pratiyoginyadṛśye vā /
GSP28mimslovu:5258: tatra yā dṛśye pratiyogini tanmātrabuddhi' saiva ghaṭādernāstitvam /
GSP28mimslovu:5260: ato yeyaṃ sarvavādisiddhā tanmātrabuddhi' saiva nāstīti vyapadiśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5262: ato yatraiva prāk saṃsṛṣṭabuddharāsīt tatraiva vilakṣaṇakāraṇopanipāte tanmātrabuddhireva jāyate na punarghaṭādyabhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:5271: yadi ca sanmātramevādarśanaṃ niścāyayati, tato nivṛtte 'pyadarśane prāk devadatto
GSP28mimslovu:5276: yo yatra na dṛṣṭastasmin punadṛśyamāna evāsatyapyadarśane pracīnābhāvajñānaṃ tadasatyadarśane na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5281: svaprakāśā hi sā phalabhūtā na prakāśāntaramapekṣate /
GSP28mimslovu:5284: na ca nāstīti jñānaṃ pramāṇam, bhramavaditi na vidma' kimatra lakṣyate iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5297: yadi granthānuguṇyenāyamartho vyākhyāsyate tato vispaṣṭa' pradeśāntare bhāṣyavirodha',
GSP28mimslovu:5298: evaṃ hi pramāṇagatā saṃkhyā vyavahāraṃ bhinattīti pratijñāmātreṇa pratipakṣanirākaraṇaṃ bhavatīti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:5305: na pramāṇamātravivakṣayā pramāṇaśabda' api tu kimuktaṃ bhavati, pūrvoktapramāṇapañcakābhāva iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5306: asti ca pañcānāṃ bhāvopadhānamekam, sarvāṇi hi bhāvapramāṇāni, ato bhāvapramāṇā
GSP28mimslovu:5309: sa copariṣṭhād dvedhā vyākariṣyate--- ātmano 'pariṇāmo vā nāstīti vā bhāvajñānamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5314: asati hi tasmin pādavihārādivyavahāra' kaṇṭakādyabhāvāvadhāraṇa pura' sara' so 'pyabhāvasyāsati prameyatve na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5316: satsvapi teṣūpalabhyata iti nāstīti dhiyā gṛhyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:5319: yattūktaṃ tanmātradhīreva ghaṭo nāstīti vyapadiśyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5320: tatra na vidma' kiṃ mātraśabdena vyavacchidyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5323: asti tarhi vyāvṛttirviṣaya', itarathā sadātva eva vyāvartayatīti vyavahāro bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:5327: buddhireva viṣaya' na tato 'nya iti cet /
GSP28mimslovu:5331: na ceha ghaṭo nāstīti buddhi' pratiṣidhyate tattatra nāstītyucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5332: na ceha ghaṭo nāstīti buddhi' pratiṣidhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5333: buddhigocare hi nāstīti śapabde buddherevābhāva' syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5336: api caivaṃ sūkṣmasya vastuna' sadasadbhāvau prati jijñāsā na syāt,
GSP28mimslovu:5338: tarhi vastunyupalabdhe ko 'yamapara' saṃśaya' sūkṣmeṣu keśakāṭādiṣu,
GSP28mimslovu:5342: dṛśye pratiyogini tanmātrabodho 'bhāvo nādṛśya iti cet, kiṃ pu(na)
GSP28mimslovu:5344: yadi tattvāntaramabhāvo bhavet, tadā tadavadhāraṇe dṛśyādarśanamupayujyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5346: tad yadā satsvapyaviguṇeṣvindriyādiṣu jijñāsito 'pyartha' prayatnenānviṣṭo na dṛśyate tadā tadabhāvādadarśanamiti kalpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5349: yaccoktam--- yadabhāvasya kāraṇaṃ tattanmātradhima eva kalpanālāghavādastviti /
GSP28mimslovu:5351: na hi kalpanālāghavaṃ bhavatīti pramāṇāvagatamupekṣituṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:5352: na ca yadabhāvasya kāraṇaṃ tattanmātradhiya iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5355: bhūtalādivasturūpaprakāśo hīndriyādikāraṇaka', nāsau ghaṭāderutsāraṇaṃ praharamaṃ vāpekṣate /
GSP28mimslovu:5366: yo na prakāśata iti kathamabhāvaniścayo jāyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5369: yaccāpi nivṛtte 'pyadarśane prāṅnāstitvaṃ vyapadiśyate samprati dṛśyamānasyāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5371: tatra hi samānopalambhayogyeṣu bahuṣu smaryamāṇeṣu yadeko na smaryate,
GSP28mimslovu:5372: tena smṛtinivṛttyā phalata' pratyakṣanivṛttyā tadabāva' pratīyate smṛtyeva bhāvāntarāṇām /
GSP28mimslovu:5376: ato nāstīti jñānaṃ pramāṇam, abhāvaśca prāgabhāvādibhedabhinna' prameyamiti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:5378: yatra pañca pramāṇāni sambhavatpratipattīni yathāyathaṃ paṭādervastuna' sattāṃ bodhayituṃ na jāyante,
GSP28mimslovu:5380: tadanena pramāṇaśabdo 'dhikārāt pramāṇapañcake prayukta iti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:5381: vasturūpe na jāyata iti ca svatantrābhāvamātrajñānaṃ na pramāṇamiti darśayati /
GSP28mimslovu:5382: laukikapramāṇalakṣaṇakathanācca yatraiva pramāṇānāṃ śaktisambhavastatraiva teṣāmanutpāda' pramāṇamabhāvo 'bhāvāvadhāraṇe /
GSP28mimslovu:5383: tādṛśenaiva hi laukikā nāstīti budhyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5384: bhāṣyasyāpyayamartha'--abhāvo 'pi na laukikā nāstīti budhyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5386: pramāṇābhāvo hyasannikṛṣṭer'the 'bhāvākhye nāstītyanena rūpeṇa prakāśamāne yāṃ buddhimutpādayati sābhāvapramā(ṇa'?) /
