GSP28mimslovu:5389: kṣīre dadhyādi yannāsti prāgabhāva' sa ucyate // Msv_5,8.2 //
GSP28mimslovu:5394: kṣīre dadhi bhavedevaṃ dadhni kṣīraṃ ghaṭe paṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:5395: śaśe śṛṅgaṃ pṛthivyādau caitanyaṃ mūrtarātmani // Msv_5,8.5 //
GSP28mimslovu:5405: yo 'yaṃ kāryakāraṇādinā parasparavivekaścaturdhā darśita' sa vastvaṅkara ityākhyāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5410: asati tvabhāvaprāmāṇye sarva' sarveṇa saṅkīryata ityāha--- kṣīra iti dvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:5412: yathā kṣīre dadhi evaṃ dadhni kṣīramityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:5414: abhāvapramāṇānāśrayame hi (?) na śaśādiṣu śṛṅgādīnāmātyantiko 'bhāva' sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:5418: apsu gandho rasaścagnau vāyau rūpeṇa tau saha /
GSP28mimslovu:5419: vyomni saṃsparśitā te ca na decasya pramāṇatā // Msv_5,8.6 //
GSP28mimslovu:5423: kāryādīnāmabhāva' ko yo bhāva' kāraṇādinā // Msv_5,8.8 //
GSP28mimslovu:5429: kṣīramānayeti niyukto yat kṣīramevānayati na dadhi,
GSP28mimslovu:5435: na tu ghaṭābhāvo nāmāpara' kaścit buddhau bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5436: ghaṭo nāstītyapi ghaṭo na pramīyata ityartha', na tu ghaṭābāva' pramīyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5437: ata' sarvopākhyāvirahalakṣaṇa evābhāvo na kiñcit tattvāntaramata āha---na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:5441: ghaṭo nāstītyapi nāyamartha' ghaṭo na pramīyate iti, sannapi hi ghaṭo na pramīyata ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5442: ata eva ghaṭo 'sti na veti pṛṣṭo 'nirṇītābāvo nāstīti vyapadiśati, kintu anupalabdhimātram /
GSP28mimslovu:5444: yaścāyaṃ caturdhā bhedo varṇita' so 'pi sarvopākhyāvirahalakṣaṇe 'bhāve na sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:5445: prayogaśca bhavati--- vastu abhāvi'(?), caturdhā bhedād, dravyādivaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:5449: ato na vyāvṛttamupalabhāmaha iti kathaṃ tattvāntaramavasthāpamayāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:5450: tadvyavahārastu nāstīti vikalpaśabdaprayogātmā bhāvāśra eva kathañcidupapādanīya',
GSP28mimslovu:5454: api ca, aviṣayo nāstīti vikalpa' kathaṃ saṃvedyata iti vaktavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:5455: śabdasaṃspṛṣṭaṃ hi rūpaṃ vikalpasya viṣaya', na ceha tadasti /
GSP28mimslovu:5457: ata evātmani nirvakalpatvāt kalpanā svasaṃvitti pratyakṣāmāha /
GSP28mimslovu:5460: yadi mataṃ--- jātyādivadabhāvavikalpā api samāropitaviṣayā eva, nānenābhāvavikalpo duṣyatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5462: samāropitaṃ hi yatkiñcijjātayīkaṃ tatprativikalpamanyadanyacca, kathamekaśabdālambanaṃ bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:5465: vikalpāstukṣaṇikā' svaviṣaye niyatā nānyonyasya viṣayamabhiniviśanta iti kathaṃ pratisāndadhīran /
GSP28mimslovu:5468: ata eva kiṃ punastattvamityapekṣite satastu sadbhāvo 'satasatvasadbhāva iti dvedhaiva tattvavidbhistattvamāśritam /
GSP28mimslovu:5469: api ca--- asatyabhāve kasya hetorāhatasya ghaṭasyānupalambha', vinaṣṭatvāditi cet /
GSP28mimslovu:5472: na hyapracyutaprācyārthakriyārūpasyānupalambhe ghaṭasya kiñcitkāraṇamadhunā paśyāmo yadyasya vināśo nāma kimapi tattvāntaraṃ nāśrīyata iti siddhaṃ tattvāntaramiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5473: etaccānupākhyeyatvamabhāvasya nirākartumuktam--- na tvabāvo vastu, lokavirodhāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5475: sattā hi vastutvam, na cāsāvabhāve vastutvavāda' na mukhyatayā /
GSP28mimslovu:5482: tasmād gavādivad vastu prameyatvācca gamyate // Msv_5,8.9 //
GSP28mimslovu:5491: ka' punaranayo' sambandha', saṃyoga' samavāyo vā, na tāvatsaṃyoga', dravyadharmatvāt tasya /
GSP28mimslovu:5497: yattvanāhatamanapasāraṃ ca bhāvāntaramabhāvarūpeṇāvagamyate tat kathamasad bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:5498: ata' svahetoreva jāyamāno nityo vā sarvo 'saṅkīrṇasvabhāva eva jāyata iti siddhamasya jātyādivad bhāvadharmatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:5501: abhāva iti sāmānyātmanā prāgabhāvādibedena ca vyāvṛttyātmanā gṛhyamāṇo 'bhāva' sāmānyaviśeṣātmaka',
GSP28mimslovu:5506: ekaśabdavācyaṃ sāmānyarūpaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ gavādi, nānāśabdavācyaṃ ca viśeṣarūpaṃ śābaleyādi /
GSP28mimslovu:5508: asati tu viveke ekaśabdanibandhanabhrama evāyam--- abhāva' sāmānyaviśevātmeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5510: sati hi bādhake bhrāntirupacāro vā kalpyate, na ceha tatheti bhāva iti ||10||
GSP28mimslovu:5515: vastuni jñāyate kaiścidrūpaṃ kiñcit kadācana // Msv_5,8.12 //
GSP28mimslovu:5518: evaṃ tāvat 'vāstītyasyārthasyāsannikṛṣṭasya' iti yadutaktaṃ bhāṣye tad vivṛtam /
GSP28mimslovu:5520: anutpattireva keti cedata āha--- sātmana iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5522: tad yadā ātmā bhūtalādau na ghaṭādijñānātmanā piraṇamati sā tasya pratyakṣādyanutpatti' svarūpāvasthānaṃ pramāṇābhāva ityākhyāyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5524: nāstītyeva vā bhāvajñānaṃ pratyakṣādyanutpattirityucyate, atastadeva pramāṇam, (nā?hā)
GSP28mimslovu:5527: tarhi sakṛdeva tathā pratibhātagiti kiṃ pramāṇāntareṇāta āha--- svarūpeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5529: tadasminneva dvirūpe kiñcideva kadācit pratīyate na tu sarvātmakameva gṛhītavyamiti niyama iti ||12||
GSP28mimslovu:5530: kiṃ puna' kāraṇaṃ dvyātmakasyaikameva rūpaṃ gṛhyate nāparaṃ kiñcidata āha---yasya yatreti /
GSP28mimslovu:5531: udbhūtaṃ hi gṛhyate nānudabhūtam, agneriva rātrau rūpaṃ na sparśa', jidhṛkṣitaṃ vā prāyeṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:5532: ato yadeva sadasatorudbhūtaṃ bhavati tenaiva buddhivyapadeśau bhavata' /
GSP28mimslovu:5533: cetyate 'nubhava iti kimidam, na hyanubhavaścetyate, sa eva cetanā, viṣayastu cetyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5540: ayameveti yo hyeṣa bhāve bhavati nirṇaya' /
GSP28mimslovu:5555: na hyapratisaṃhite bhāvāntarābāve saṅkīrṇasvabhāvo na niścetuṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5557: kiñcicchabdena bhāvasyābhāvānugamaśūnyamapi jñānamastyeva, na tvevabhāvasyeti darśayati ||15,16||
GSP28mimslovu:5565: na hyapratyakṣa eva viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭa' pratyakṣo bhavati, daṇḍa iva daṇḍī /
GSP28mimslovu:5566: na ca nāstyeva viśiṣṭā dhīriti vaktavyam, anāśrayābhāvasaṃvittyabhāvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5567: api cātmā bhāvasyābhāva', sa kathaṃ svatantro 'nubhūyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5568: na hi rūpādayo bhāvadharmā' svatantrā evāvasīyante /
GSP28mimslovu:5569: svatantrābhāvavādastu svātantryameva, sadasadātmake vastunīti hi darśayati /
GSP28mimslovu:5570: bhāvāṃśo 'bhāvāṃśa iti ca vispaṣṭaṃ tadabhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ grahaṇamityāha /
GSP28mimslovu:5571: kiñcāsya svātantrye pramāṇam, na hyaṃ kadācidapi tathāvasīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5573: na tāvat pūrva' kalpa',tadavagame pramāṇāntarābhāvāt nityāsaṃvittisaṅgāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5576: sa cādhāratantra eveti saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatvalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā satīndriyasannikarṣe aindriyajñānagocara eva /
GSP28mimslovu:5578: tadasyābhāva' pramāṇamindriyaṃ vā, yadyabhāva' sa tarhi bhāvamapi gocarayet /
GSP28mimslovu:5580: ata' satyupalabhyamāne tadaiva yannopalabhyate tannāstīti sata eva prakāśakamasato 'pīti na pramāṇavibhāgaṃ paśyāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:5585: yogyatā hi kāryadarśanasamadhigamyā, sā cendriyāṇāṃ bhāvātmakagrahaṇa evopalabhyate nābhāve 'pi /
GSP28mimslovu:5587: atra tu yogyatāsahitā prāptirindriyārthayo' sambandha ityabhiprāya' /
GSP28mimslovu:5594: na hi smṛtyupasthāpitanāmaviśiṣṭo ḍittho na pratyakṣo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5595: nāma cāpratyakṣaṃ smaryamāṇatvāt, tasyāgṛhīte hi viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭo nāvagamyate nāpratyakṣe /
GSP28mimslovu:5597: daṇḍinyapi śābde tāvad daṇḍapadopanītaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭa eva pratyayārtho na daṇḍo 'pi /
GSP28mimslovu:5598: pratyakṣaṃ tu yogyatayobhayatra pravartatāṃ nāma, na caivamubhayatrākṣāṇāṃ yogyatā /
GSP28mimslovu:5603: dharmayorbheda iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede 'pi na' sthite /
GSP28mimslovu:5614: ayamevābhāvasya pratītiprakāra', yatpramāṇāntaraprāpitāśrayaṃ viśinaṣṭīti na kiñcidanupapamannam /
GSP28mimslovu:5626: yadi bhāvābhāvayorekāntaramabheda eva syāt tato bhāvendriyasannikarṣe tadabhinnasyābhāvasyāpi syāt, na tvevamasti /
GSP28mimslovu:5633: na hyekameva tattvamudbhūtamabhibhūtaṃ ceti pratīyata iti ||20||
GSP28mimslovu:5643: ayaṃ ca grāhakabhedanibandhano bhedo rūpādīnāmiti kaiścidiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5645: evaṃ hi kecid vadanti--- yathā hyekameva mukhaṃ maratakapadmarāgādyupādhibhedād bhinnamiva pratibhāti,
GSP28mimslovu:5646: yathā caika eva puruṣo 'pekṣābhedāt bhinnamiva pratibhāti,
GSP28mimslovu:5653: mukhaṃ hi pramāṇāntarādekarūpamavagataṃ tadupādhibhedād bhidyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5654: na tvekatve rūpādīnāṃ bhedaheturbhāvābhāvayorapi samāna evetyabhiprāyeṇāha---buddhimātreti /
GSP28mimslovu:5659: ato deśādyabhinnānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ samudāyo dharmī, na tattvāntaramata āha--- na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:5660: nātra vana iva bādhikā buddhirastīti bhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:5665: yadi tadvadapekṣātra na syād bhedo 'tra naiva hi /
GSP28mimslovu:5673: na hi rūpādaya' sadādirūpeṇa na bhidyanta iti svarūpāpekṣayāpi teṣāṃ bheda' śakyate vārayitum,
GSP28mimslovu:5674: tayā vā bheda iti na sadādyātmanābheda' pratikṣipyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5675: evamabhāvo 'pi bhāvadharmatayā tato bhinno 'pi svarūpāpekṣayābhinna iṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5678: svarūpāpekṣayā rūpādivad bhedānāśrayaṇe bhāvābhāvayoranyataratra na buddhe' sadasadrūpatā bhavedityāha---yaditi ||25||
GSP28mimslovu:5680: etena, yadāhu'--- na bhāvād bhedakamabhāvasya rūpamupalabhāmaha iti, tannirākṛtam /
GSP28mimslovu:5683: yanna sambadhyate ghaṭādi tannāstīti pratīyata iti ||26||
GSP28mimslovu:5686: na hyasati tadvyāpāre bhāvabuddhivadabhāvabuddhirapi jāyamānā dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5687: yadyapi bhāvādabhāvo bhidyate, tathāpi tasya rūpādivatsaṃyuktasamavāyena vā tadviśeṣaṇatayā vendriya
GSP28mimslovu:5694: yathā nāsmṛte pratiyoginyabhāvo gṛhyata iti tatsmaraṇārthaṃ prācīnajñānajanmana' saṃskārasyodabodhāpyapekṣita',
GSP28mimslovu:5697: api tu yogyatāsahitā prāptiriti pratyakṣe varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:5705: kevalātmamana' sannikarṣādeva bāhyendriyānapekṣaṃ pramāṇābhāvenābhāvajñānaṃ janyata ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5710: yo hi gṛhasvarūpemevāvadhārya kvacidgata' pṛcchyate--- tatra caitro 'sti na veti,
GSP28mimslovu:5712: yadi tvindriyādhīnamabāvajñānaṃ bhavet nā sati tadvyāpāre jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5717: na ca tāvātāṃ smaraṇaṃ samprati viśeṣeṇa smaryata iti, tadayuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5718: na hyabhāvatvaṃ nāma sāmānyanyato 'vagato viśeṣeṇa smaryata iti, yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5720: tastadānīmeva pratiyogismaraṇapura' saramindriyānapekṣamabhāvajñānaṃ jāyata iti manoharamidam /
GSP28mimslovu:5725: bhāvāṃśo nanu liṅgaṃ syāt tadānīṃ nājighṛṇāt // Msv_5,8.29 //
GSP28mimslovu:5727: tasmin pratīyamāne tu nābhāve jāyate mati' // Msv_5,8.30 //
GSP28mimslovu:5730: kvacid bhāve 'pi sadbhāvo jñāto yasya kadācana /
GSP28mimslovu:5739: na ca tadā ghaṭo gṛhyate, na hi tasmin gṛhyamāṇe tadabhāvo grahītuṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5742: astu tarhi pratiṣedhādhārabhāvo liṅgamata āha---na caiṣaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5746: api cānvayādhīnātmalābhamanumānajñānam, na ca bhūtalabhāvasya sarvairabhāvai' sambnadho jñāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5747: tat kathaṃ tataste pratyeṣyanta ityāha--- saheti ||31||
GSP28mimslovu:5748: astu tāvadabhāvānvaya' kvacid bhūtalādau bhāve, sadbhāvo 'pi yasya ghaṭāde' kadācit jñāta' tasyāpi
GSP28mimslovu:5761: na kevalaṃ yadyatra kadācid dṛṣṭaṃ tanmātrasya tatrābhāvo 'vagamyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5762: yasyāpi tu yatrābhāvo na dṛṣṭapūrvastasyāpi tatrābhāvo 'vagamyata ityāha---yatreti ||33||
GSP28mimslovu:5765: na caivamastīti vyatirekeṇa darśayati---gṛhīte 'pi ca bhāvāṃśe naicābhāve 'nyavastuna' /
GSP28mimslovu:5770: tadihābhāvākhye sambandhini grahītavye kiṃ pramāṇamiti vaktavyamityāha--- sambandha iti ||36||
GSP28mimslovu:5778: dvedhā hi hetavo bauddhairvibhajyante--- kāryaṃ svabhāva iti,
GSP28mimslovu:5780: tasyāśca svarūpaṃ jñeyarūpaṃ ca prakāśate iti jñānajñeyasvabhāvā /
GSP28mimslovu:5782: tasyāśca svasādhyena nāstīti vikalpaśabdātmakavyavahāreṇa tadyogyatayā vā tādātmyameva pratibandha' /
GSP28mimslovu:5783: na hyasau nāstīti vyavahāraṃ vyabhicarati śiṃśapeva vṛkṣatām /
GSP28mimslovu:5784: tadevaṃ jñātapratibandhānupalabdhi' yo nāma bhrāmyan viviktadeśopalabdhāvapi ghaṭāya ghaṭate taṃ prati nāstīti vyavahāraṃ tadyogyatāṃ vānumāpayati /
GSP28mimslovu:5785: evaṃ ca ghaṭādyabhāvānupalabdhiprayoga'--- yad dṛśyaṃ hi sadyatra nopalabhyate tattatra nāsti /
GSP28mimslovu:5786: nopalabhyate copalabhyamāne deśe dṛśyo ghaṭa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5788: ya evānupalabdhyānumātumiṣyate ghaṭābhāvo nāstīti vyavahārastadyogyatā vā naikenāpi viśeṣeṇānupalabdhe' sambandho 'vagata',
GSP28mimslovu:5791: tasyāśca nānāvidhānekaghaṭapaṭādiviṣayā nāstīti vyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathaṃ viśeṣeṇa ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahārayet /
GSP28mimslovu:5792: ghaṭānupalabdhirasau, ato ghaṭābhāvaṃ tadvyavahāraṃ vā prasādhayatīti cet /
GSP28mimslovu:5795: tacca sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭamiti kathamekenaiva vyapadiśyate ced ghaṭābhāvo nāma kaścit_ /
GSP28mimslovu:5796: kasmācca satyapi ghaṭe ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahāro na pravartate /
GSP28mimslovu:5800: viviktopalabdhirhi ghaṭānupalabdhi', nāsau ghaṭe satīti cet, ko vivekārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5804: yadasati ghaṭe nāstīti vyavahāro na satīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5805: yaccedaṃ ghaṭābhāvamatilaṅghya nāstīti vyavahārānumānamavasthitaṃ tadapi kena viśeṣeṇeti na vidma' /
GSP28mimslovu:5807: yogyatā tadanatirekiṇī tasmin buddhe buddhaiveti na kiñcidanumeyaṃ paśyāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:5813: vyabhicārādā viśeṣāstu pratīyeran kathaṃ tayā // Msv_5,8.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:5816: sa cānyena grahītavyo nāgṛhīte hi liṅgatā /
GSP28mimslovu:5819: kvāpyasya syāt pramāṇatvaṃ liṅgatvena vinā dhruvam // Msv_5,8.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:5824: viśeṣāstvanaikāntikatayā nānupalabdhyā bodhayituṃ śakyanta ityāha--- vyabhicārāditi ||39||
GSP28mimslovu:5825: api ca--- nānavagatarūpaṃ liṅgamanumāne liṅgaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:5827: evaṃ hi vadanti,yāvān kaścit pratiṣedha' sa sarvo 'palabdhereveti /
GSP28mimslovu:5828: evaṃ ca tatra tatra sadṛśāparāparaliṅgānusāreṇānavasthāpāta ityāha--- na ceti dvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:5831: evaṃ yo 'pyasau liṅgirūpābhāva' so 'pi sambandhagrahaṇārthamavaśyaṃ prathamavagantavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:5834: yadi tu nāstīti buddhireva liṅgamityucyate tanna /
GSP28mimslovu:5835: phalaṃ hi sā, pratyakṣādyanutpādasya kathaṃ talliṅgam, tatsiddhyarthameva hi liṅgamiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5845: yadi sā phalaṃ kiṃ tarhi pramāṇata āha--- tasyaiveti /
GSP28mimslovu:5846: yasyaiva sā phalaṃ tadeva pratyakṣādyanutpatte' phalānantaryātpramāṇamiti ||43||
GSP28mimslovu:5850: na cānutpattirutpatte' prāgabhāvo buddhe' kenacijjanyate, prāgeva trilakṣaṇena hetuneti /
GSP28mimslovu:5856: pramāṇatā hi bhāvātmanā vyāptā pratyakṣādiṣvavagatā, tannivṛttyā nivartyata iti bhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:5859: sa ca prāmāṇye kāraṇaṃ na bhāvasvarūpatā /
GSP28mimslovu:5860: sā tu prāmāṇyaṃ pratyaprayojikaiva kathañcitteṣu saṅgatā, ato nābhāvatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5863: yathā bhāvātmake meye 'bhāva' pramāṇaṃ nānurūpaṃ tathā tadabhāve bhāva ityāha--- bhāvātmaka iti ||46||
GSP28mimslovu:5865: bhāvātmakasya mānatvaṃ na ca rājājñayā sthitam /
GSP28mimslovu:5870: tathā sati ca pūrvokto vyavahāro na sidhyati // Msv_5,8.49 //
GSP28mimslovu:5872: yatrābhāvo 'sti tenāsyā' sambandho naiva vidyate // Msv_5,8.50 //
GSP28mimslovu:5873: yo na sannihitastatra tasya dharmo bhavediyam /
GSP28mimslovu:5874: na ca tasya prameyatvaṃ dharmadharmitvavarjanāt // Msv_5,8.51 //
GSP28mimslovu:5876: yadeva tu paricchedaphalaṃ tadeva tu pramāṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:5879: tathā ca sati bauddhānāmapi liṅga prameyatve na syātām,
GSP28mimslovu:5880: te 'pi hi nāvastuno dṛṣṭe ityāha-- yadīti sārdhena /
GSP28mimslovu:5882: na ca syād vyavahāro 'yamiti kāraṇādivibhāgenokto vyavahāra ityartha' ||48,49||
GSP28mimslovu:5887: tacca pūrvavagatamiti taddharmo bhaviṣyatītyata āha--- yatreti /
GSP28mimslovu:5888: na hi bhūtale pratyakṣānutpatti', jñāyamānatvāt tasyeti ||50||
GSP28mimslovu:5889: ghaṭasya tarhi dharmo bhaviṣyati tadgocare pratyakṣādīnāmanutpatterata āha---yaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5891: yatra pratyakṣādīni notpadyante taddharmatā kathañcid bhavedapi, na tvasāviha pramīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5896: tajjñānād viṣaytavaṃ ca jñāne meyaṃ na vidyate // Msv_5,8.52 //
GSP28mimslovu:5898: nāgṛhīte hi dharmatvaṃ gṛhīte siddhasādhanam // Msv_5,8.53 //
GSP28mimslovu:5902: prameyatvād yathā bhāvastasmād bhāvātmakāt pṛthak // Msv_5,8.55 //
GSP28mimslovu:5903: karmāṇi sarvāṇi phalai' samastai' sarvairyathāvacca yadaṅgakāraṇḍai' /
GSP28mimslovu:5904: na saṅgatānīha parasparaṃ hi nāṅgaṃ tadetatprabhavaṃ kratūnām // Msv_5,8.56 //
GSP28mimslovu:5906: nāpi tadviśiṣṭaṃ bhūtalādi, tadānīṃ tasya tatrābhāvāditi ||51||
GSP28mimslovu:5907: abhāvasya tu sādharmo bhaviṣyati tadviṣayatvāt tasyā' /
GSP28mimslovu:5908: abhāve hi prameye sā liṅgaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:5909: kintu nāsrañcetito bhāvo viṣayo bhaviṣyati, jñāte ca prameyābhāva ityāha---abhāveneti ||52||
GSP28mimslovu:5914: atha tadvadabhāvo 'pi prāk pratīyata ityucyate, siddhaṃ tarhi sādhyata iti ||53||
GSP28mimslovu:5915: evaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ prasādhitaṃ bhedaṃ prayogeṇa darśayati---abhāvaśabdeti ||54||
GSP28mimslovu:5919: yo 'yaṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ phalāsaṅkara' parasparāsaṅkaraśca paraspamaṅgāṅgibhāvābhāva', nāsāvabhāvaprāmā
GSP28mimslovu:5922: tato 'dhikaṃ yad dvayamiṣṭamanyairbhedo na tasyetyapi siddhametat // Msv_5,8.57 //
GSP28mimslovu:5923: iha bhavati śatādau sambhavādyā sahasrānmatiraviyutabāvāt sānumānādabhinnā /
GSP28mimslovu:5924: jagati bahu na tathyaṃ nityamaitihyamuktaṃ bhavati tu yadi satyaṃ nāgamād bhidyate tat // Msv_5,8.58 //
GSP28mimslovu:5934: āgamaśca mīmāṃsātantram, ato yuktyāgamābhyāmiha śābare bhāṣye pramāṇaṣaṭkameva pravivicya tarkitam /
GSP28mimslovu:5937: yā tāvat sahasrācchate mati' sambhavākhyaṃ pramāṇamiṣyate sānumānānna bhidyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5954: bhāṣyapāṭho vicārya',atra bhāṣyam--- 'nanu bhavantvanyāni pramāṇāni, śabdastu na pramāṇam, kuta'?
GSP28mimslovu:5956: asyārtha'--- yadyapi sarvapramāṇāvyabhicārānna pramāṇasāmānayabhāvinā dharmeṇa śabdo 'pi na pramāṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:5958: tathā hi citrayā paśavo bhāvyanta iti citrayā yajetetyasyāratha' /
GSP28mimslovu:5962: kimuktaṃ bhavati--- upalambhanāni hi cakṣurādīni paśūnāṃ vidyante /
GSP28mimslovu:5968: asyārtha' paralokaphalā hi tatra svargakāmo yajetetyevamādicodanā vedabāhyaboddhādiparamatenākṣiptā' /
GSP28mimslovu:5970: nanūbhayīmapi codanāmākṣeptuṃ śakyata eva vākyatvādayo hetava' /
GSP28mimslovu:5971: ta eva tatra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'yat kiñcana laukikaṃ vanacam' iti darśayatāntarṇītā' /
GSP28mimslovu:5972: vārtikakṛtāpi---'yadi vā puruṣādhīnaprāmāṇyā' sarvacodanā' iti vivṛtā' /
GSP28mimslovu:5975: ihāpi ca---'evaṃ dṛṣṭāpacārasya vedasya svargādyapi phalaṃ nāstīti manyāmaha' iti sarvākṣepa' kṛta' /
GSP28mimslovu:5995: kathamaparathā'yadāsau vidyamānāsīt tadā palaṃ na dattavatī,
GSP28mimslovu:5996: kālāntare punarasatī kathaṃ dāsyati' iti na ca paśavo 'nantasamabhavadbhāvanā',
GSP28mimslovu:5999: amī puna' paśava' sambhavanti yajamānasyātraiveti svahetusamanantaramanupalabhyamānā dṛṣṭapratigrahādihetvantarā' śrutacitrādiphalatayā na śakyante 'vagantum /
GSP28mimslovu:6000: ayameva tu śabdaśaktiparāmarśo vārtikakṛtā tārkikaprakriyāmanuvidadhānena 'na vā paśuphale'tyādinā sādhanaprayogairupadarśita' /
GSP28mimslovu:6005: yadāmuṣmikasvargādi tanmā nāma karmānantaramupalabhyatāmaihikaphalaṃ tu paśvādi kiṃ nopalabhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6007: tanna nūnaṃ tat phalamiti aihikaphalakarmacodanāvyabhicāreṇānyāsāmapi paralokaphalānāṃ tatsāmānyādākṣepa' /
GSP28mimslovu:6008: pūrvaṃ tu tā' parata' prāmāṇyamāśritya paroktairaiva vākyatvādibhirhetubhirākṣiptā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6011: ayamabhiprāya'--- codanāsūtre bhāṣyakṛtā sūtrakāreṇa vakṣyamāṇākṣepaparihārāvanāgatāvekṣaṇena pratijñāsamarthanārthabhupavarṇitau /
GSP28mimslovu:6012: idānīṃ tu sūtrakāreṇa svayamevocyata iti tenedameva sarvacodanākṣepakṣetramityuktamiti ||1||
GSP28mimslovu:6013: atra parihāre pūrvokta evākṣepaheturiti, tamupanyasyati--- citreti phalānītyantena /
GSP28mimslovu:6017: nadītīre phalānīti tatrādṛsyāni tāni cet // Msv_5,9.3 //
GSP28mimslovu:6018: na vā paśuphalā citrā svakāle tadadānata' /
GSP28mimslovu:6019: snānabhujyādivat te 'pi tatsādhyā na bhavanti vā // Msv_5,9.4 //
GSP28mimslovu:6032: prāyeṇa caitrañjātīyakaṃ vipralipsureva prayuṅkta iti vipralipsorityuktamiti ||2,3||
GSP28mimslovu:6033: idānīmaihikākṣepa ityuktaṃ vivṛṇoti--- na veti vadantena /
GSP28mimslovu:6034: citreṣṭirdharmiṇī, na paśuphaleti sādhyam, svakāle paśvadānāt, snānādivaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:6036: te paśavo na citrāsādhyā' , citrotpattāvasadbhāvāt svargatṛptisukhādivat /
GSP28mimslovu:6039: karmakāle ca karmaphalena bhavitavyam' iti bhāṣyoktau veditavyāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:6040: atrānantaraṃ 'yatkālaṃ hi mardanaṃ tatkālameva mardanasukham' iti bhāṣyakāreṇoktam,
GSP28mimslovu:6042: citrā na paśuphalā paśavo na tatsādhyā ityubhayatrāpi prayoge vaidharmyeṇa sukhamardane bhavetām,
GSP28mimslovu:6046: yacca yatsādhyaṃ tat tadutpattau bhavatyeva sukhamiva mardanotpattāviti ||4,5||
GSP28mimslovu:6049: na hi kṛte karmaṇi tāvatyeva phalena bhavitavyamiti śabdo brūte, kintu asyedaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:6062: yaiva hyasyedaṃ phalamityuktaṃ tadaivamarthādevāvagamyate anantaramanena bhavitavyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6065: aviśeṣapravṛttā tu codanā kataṃ bādhyate ata āha--- śabdeti /
GSP28mimslovu:6066: na hi sāmarthyaṃ nāma pṛthak pramāṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:6067: api tarhi sarvākhyātānāmarthaṃ bruvatāṃ śakti' sahakāriṇīti śabdaikadeśa eva /
GSP28mimslovu:6068: ata' sruvāvadānamivāpyadravyeṣvarthādanantarameva phalaṃ niścīyata iti tadbodhe 'pi śābdabodho bhavatyeveti ||6||
GSP28mimslovu:6070: yadi hyatra phalaṃ dāsyatīti ḷṅśroṣyat tadā tatsāmarthyena kalpanā kācidapyabhaviṣyat /
GSP28mimslovu:6071_0: adya punarasyedaṃ karmaṇa' phalamiti paryavasite vacasi sarvakarmaṇāmanantaraphalopalambhād
GSP28mimslovu:6072: atrānantaramaparaṃ bhāṣyam--- 'dṛṣṭaviruddhamapi kiñcit vaidikaṃ vacanaṃ 'sa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamāno 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokaṃ yātī'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:6075: uttaratra yajñāyudhivākye pratyakṣādivirodha iti virodhamabhidyotayati--- svargayāna iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6076: yajamānasya niratiśayānandātmana' svargādatidūramapabhraṣṭo bhasmībhāva' pratyakṣamupalabhyate, citrādicodanā
GSP28mimslovu:6080: śarīdād yadi cānya' syānnāsau yajñāyudhī bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:6081: na cāsya yajamānatvaṃ sadbhāvo 'pi ca durlabha' // Msv_5,9.10 //
GSP28mimslovu:6082: su tvanantaraphalānupalambhamātraṃ na tu viruddhopalambha' kaścidastīti syādapi kālāntare phalakalpanā,
GSP28mimslovu:6083: bhasmībhūtaṃ tu śarīraṃ kālāntare 'pi svargaṃ lokaṃ yāsyatīti na sambhavatīti pūrvasmād viśeṣa' ||8||
GSP28mimslovu:6084: aparamapi ca 'evañjātīyakaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ vacanamapramāṇam--- ambuni majjantyalābūni,
GSP28mimslovu:6085: grāvāṇa' plavanta iti yathā ' iti bhāṣyam,
GSP28mimslovu:6091: yathā grāvāṇa' plavanta iti śilā vākyaṃ sādharmyeṇa yatheti darśayitavyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6094: pūrvaṃ tu mardanasukhayorvaidharmye dṛṣṭāntaratayopanyāsācchilāvākyamapi vaidharmyeṇa bhāṣyakṛtoktamiti bhrāntimapanetuṃ sādharmyavaidharmyaviveko vārtikakṛtā darśita' ||9||
GSP28mimslovu:6096: asti hi paralokaphalabhoktā cetana' karmaṇāṃ kartā,
GSP28mimslovu:6101: bhavedapi na tasya yajñāyudhairasti kaścit sambandhaprakāra',
GSP28mimslovu:6103: yadyajñāyudhī yajamāna iti tadabhiprāyeṇa matvarthasaṃyogo ghaṭate /
GSP28mimslovu:6104: api ca 'sa eṣa' ityaparokṣapratinirdeśa', so 'pi śarīrasyaiva pratyakṣatvādupapanno nātmana' /
GSP28mimslovu:6113: viśeṣo 'syeti bhedena nopāttaṃ syādidaṃ tata' // Msv_5,9.11 //
GSP28mimslovu:6116: phalaṃ ca na bhavedevaṃ bhasmībhāvād vidhāvapi /
GSP28mimslovu:6117: tatsāmarthyena yānyapi kalpanā tāṃ niṣedhati // Msv_5,9.13 //
GSP28mimslovu:6120: paramārthena tu dehendriyavyatiriktātmasadbhāvo 'pi pramāṇābhāvād durlabha ityāha--- sadbhāva iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6121: prapañcayiṣyate caitadātmavāda itīha na pratanyata iti ||10||
GSP28mimslovu:6122: aparaṃ ca--- 'na caiṣa yātīti vidhiśabda''iti bhāṣyam /
GSP28mimslovu:6126: tadā citrādīnāmanantaraphalādarśanād bhedena virodhopanyāsārthaṃ yajñāyudhivākyopādānaṃ nopapadyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6128: vidhiśabde ko viśeṣa', ata āha--- vidhīti /
GSP28mimslovu:6129: vidhiśabde hi kālaviśeṣānupādānād vidhisāmarthyādeva kālāntarabhāvitāṃ phalasya parikalpya syādapi citrādicodanāsvivābhāvavirodhaparihāra' /
GSP28mimslovu:6130: iha tu yātīti vartamānāpadeśānna pratyakṣavirodha' śakyate parihartumityadarśanād viśeṣa iti ||12||
GSP28mimslovu:6131: citrādivākyābhiprāyeṇa cedamasmābhiruktam--- vidhiśabde bhaviṣyattvaṃ phalasya parikalpya virodha' śakyate parihartumiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6132: iha tu pratyakṣeṇa bhasmībhāvopalambhānna kālālantaraphalabhāvitayā svargagamanaṃ phalamiti śakyate kalpayitum /
GSP28mimslovu:6135: takiṃ tarhi vidhiśabdatānirākaraṇasya phalamata āha--- tatsāmarthyeneti /
GSP28mimslovu:6139: mantreṣu ceti te sarve pakṣīkāryā' prayatnata' // Msv_5,9.14 //
GSP28mimslovu:6149: sa ca sarva evātra prayatnato mukhyatayā mithyātvena aihikākṣepe pakṣīkārya',
GSP28mimslovu:6154: ata' kṛtsnasyaiva vedasyāprāmāṇyānna cojanālakṣaṇārtho dharma ityākṣepa'||
GSP28mimslovu:6164: yattu tamadūṣayitvaivānyaducyate tadasaṅgatamevāta āha--- svapakṣa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6165_1: prāmāṇyaṃ na pratipādyate tāvad dūṣite 'pi sādhane na 'canodanālakṣaṇo dharma' iti pratijñā sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:6169: na cedamākṣepeṇa na saṅgacchate, dvedhāpi pratyavasthānadarśanāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6173: na cātra parasādhanadūṣaṇaṃ na kariṣyate 'tatra hetorasiddhatvam' iti citrāparihāre vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6174: anena tu krameṇa tat kartavyamiti tāvadityuktamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6175: tacca svapakṣasādhanaṃ tārkikāṇāṃ cittamanurañja yituṃ prayogadvāreṇāha---amṛṣeti /
GSP28mimslovu:6179: yat svārthe vaktāraṃ nāpekṣate tat satyam,
GSP28mimslovu:6181: padaṃ hi svabhāvādeva svārthena sambaddhaṃ tatpratipādanāya vaktāraṃ nāpekṣata iti sambandhaparihāre vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6184: na hi svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryādityādyarthe svargakāmo yajeteti vākyaṃ samyagiṣyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6186: yāgena svargaṃ kuryāditi hi tatra sthāsyati /
GSP28mimslovu:6194: vyaktaye vaktrapekṣā, svārthe tu pratyāyayitavye na vaktāramapekṣante, apauruṣeyatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6204: atraiva sādhye pūrvoktā'--- 'nānyatvāt' iti bhāṣyavyākhyānāvasara uktā'--- doṣavarjitai' kāraṇai' janyamānatvāt,
GSP28mimslovu:6206: deśādibhede 'pi deśādibhede 'pi bādhavarjanāt iti hetavo darśayitavyā ityāha--- atreti ||2||
GSP28mimslovu:6211: asyārtha'--- śabdārthasambandhānāṃ nityatvamāśrityānapekṣatvāditi sūtrakāreṇa yo hetu' svata' prāmāṇyasidhyarthamukta',
GSP28mimslovu:6212: tena codanānāmaprāmāṇye nirākṛte 'dhunā sambandhodbhavatvābhāvena paro bauddhādirmithyātvamuktavān /
GSP28mimslovu:6213: evaṃ ca tadā vārtikakāreṇa vṛttikāramatenātraiva svata' prāmāṇyaṃ vyutpādyamiti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:6214: tathā ca 'sūtrakāreṇa cocyata' iti punaruktiparihāre parata' paprāmāṇyoktairevākṣepahetubhi' pūrvapakṣo 'bhihita' /
GSP28mimslovu:6215: ihāpi ca bhāṣyakāreṇa 'brūta' ityucyate--- avabodhayati budhyamānasya nimittaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:6218: naiva vāstyatra sambandha' kṛtako veti vakṣyate ||5||
GSP28mimslovu:6222: codanāmithyārthanirāsārthaṃ hi sambamandhasadbhāvo nityatā ca heturukta' /
GSP28mimslovu:6225: kṛtakatvaṃ tu 'yadi prathamamaśruto na pratyāyayati, kṛtakastarhi' ityanena vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6230: anādṛtapratibandhastu yatkiñcid vidvān sa sarvaṃ jānīyādityatiprasajyata iti ||4,5||
GSP28mimslovu:6231: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvādaya' sambandhā' śabdasyānupapannā ityuktvā saṃśleṣasambandhabhāva eva darśita',
GSP28mimslovu:6239: evaṃ hi manyante--- na tāvad varṇā' śabda', pratyekamavacākatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6241_0: ata eva gośabdatvādijātyasambhavāt bhūtādiviśeṣāṇāṃ ca pratiprayogamanyatvenāvācakatvād
GSP28mimslovu:6249: sa cāyamevambhūtor'tha' śabdena janyata eveti kāryakāraṇabhāvameva śabdārthayo' sambandhamātiṣṭhante /
GSP28mimslovu:6251: dṛṣṭā hi khalu mṛtsalilapracchannā api vrīhayo 'ṅkurādikāryamārabhamāṇā aviditasvarūpaśaktayo 'pīti sūktam--- asambhavena śeṣāṇāmiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6252: kathaṃ tu saṃśleṣa' pariśiṣyata iti, pratīterabhyupagamācca /
GSP28mimslovu:6253: gaurayamiti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdopaśliṣṭamarthamavayanto laukikā dṛśyante /
GSP28mimslovu:6256: laukikāśca prāyeṇa saṃśleṣameva saṃbandhaṃ manyante iti sa eva sambandha' prasakko nirākārya ityāha--- tasminniti prāhāyena bhavati sa taddeśa eva dṛśyate rañjuriva ghaṭe,
GSP28mimslovu:6261: dvayaṃ vā parasparamasambaddhamitaretaradeśe tadanantaradeśe vādṛṣṭe' sādhyamityāha--- dvayamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6262: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'syāccedarthena sambandha' kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhyasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām', ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:6264: asyārtha'--- atra bhāṣyakāreṇa śabdārthayo' sambnadhasiddhyarthaṃ taddeśānantarādṛṣṭeriti heturantarṇīta',
GSP28mimslovu:6265: taṃ ca gaurayamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītibhramād yo nāmāsiddhaṃ manyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6273: mukhaṃ ca tasya deśa iti kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām,
GSP28mimslovu:6274: na ca te sta'ṣa tasmānmodakādyarthakriyānupalambhācchabdadeśe taddeśānantarādṛṣṭeriti siddho hetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:6281: atrāyamabhiprāya'---- pratyāyyapratyāyakaśaktirūpo hi na' śabdārthayo' sambandho 'bhipreta', tad yadi
GSP28mimslovu:6285: yadi tu vācyavācakasambandhamevābhipretya na śabdār'thena saṅgata iti sādhyate tato laukikavirodha ityāha---vācyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:6288: ayamabhiprāya'--- caturvidho hi puruṣa', pratipanno 'pratipanna' sandigdho viparyastaśceti /
GSP28mimslovu:6292: tadya eva teṣāmanyatama' para' pratipādayitumabhipreto bhavati sa eva vācyavācakasambandhavarjitai' pratijñārthagaucarai' padai' pratipādayitumaśakya',
GSP28mimslovu:6293: ata' pratijñāṃ prayuñjānairāśrita' śabādarthayorvācyavācakalakṣaṇasambandha iti tanninirākaraṇe svavāgvirodha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6299: śabdānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā kartṛtvaṃ vā nirūpita' /
GSP28mimslovu:6302: asyārtha'--- ekasyāmabhidhānakriyāyāṃ śabda' karaṇaṃ kartā vā, vivakṣāta' kārakapravṛtte' /
GSP28mimslovu:6305: nirūpita'--- sambandha iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6306: yadvā--- ekasyāṃ gavādyarthapratipattau sādhyamānāyāmekena vaktropādīyamānāvaruṇaikahānīvadvivakṣitasāhityau śabdārtho yanniyamyete so 'nayo' sambandha ityāha--- pratipattāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:6308: upādeyasya hi viśeṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitaṃ bhavati śorivaikatvaṃ--- paśunā yajeteti /
GSP28mimslovu:6317: (śabdārthau tu) naiva pratītikriyā(yāṃ viśeṣa)ṇatayāśrutau, kathamanayo' sāhityavivakṣā /
GSP28mimslovu:6321: vyavahāradarśanāt anabhihitamapyarthaṃ jānāti tadā sthālyādīnāṃ vivakṣitaṃ sāhityaṃ manyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6323: evamihāpi bāla' prayojyavṛddhasya viviṣṭārthavyavahāradarśanena tadviṣayāṃ buddhimanumāya śabdānantarabhāvitayā śabdakāraṇatāṃ tādavavadhārayati /
GSP28mimslovu:6326_0: evaṃ ca viditvā svayamapi parārthaprayoge sahitau śabdārthau hṛdayamāveśitāvupādāya
GSP28mimslovu:6326_1: śabdaṃ coccārya parapratipattiṃ bhāvayatīti sūktaṃ sāhityavivakṣā varṇasāhityavivakṣāvaditi ||12-13 1/2 ||
GSP28mimslovu:6331: nanvevaṃ vadatā śabdārthayo' kriyāsambandha eva darśita',
GSP28mimslovu:6334: vakṣyati hi--- 'guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvādasambandha' samatvāt' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6336: kriyākārakasambandhapūrvakatvāt sarvasambandhānāṃ kriyākārakasambandha eva darśita iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6337: astu tāvat, taduttarakālabhāvī tu ko 'nayo' sambandha iti vācyameva /
GSP28mimslovu:6341: tasyāṃ ca kriyākārakasambandhottarakālabhāvī parasparopakāryopakārakalakṣaṇa' śabdārthayorasti sambandha'||
GSP28mimslovu:6343: tathāhi --- atra tāvadekasyāṃ kriyāyāmupakāryopakārakatvaṃ śabdārthayo' sambandha ityuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:6353: ato vivecanīyamidam--- ko 'tra sambandha' śabdārthayorvārttikakārasyābhimata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6357: na ca guṇena svamahimnā āśrayabhūtadravyamātramupādīyamānamapi kraye gṛhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6360: vacchedāt tad guṇamātramupādīyamānamapi krayakriyā na pratīcchati svakīyāruṇimaguṇāvarodhāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6365: śrūyatām--- artho hi na pratipādakamantareṇa pratipādyo bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:6375: kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā sambandha ityevamādaya' samullāpā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6379: na ca sadānīṃ tau na sta', nityatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6385: saṃjñeti gamakatvaṃ cenna tadaṅgamiyaṃ bhavet // Msv_5,9.16 //
GSP28mimslovu:6389: arthe ca pratipādyaśakti' ata eva sambandho nitya ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6390: nanvemapi karahastādibhiranekai' śabdairekatrārthe pratipādye anekārthavacane caikasmin gavādiśabde kathamavyabhicāra' śakyate 'vagantum /
GSP28mimslovu:6391_0: ata' prakaraṇādīnāmapi padārthāvadhāraṇāpoyatvād vṛddhavyavahāre hi bālena kevalapadāprayogādāvāpoddhārabhedenaitadavadhāritam---
GSP28mimslovu:6391_1: yadā yadarthavivakṣayā śabda' prayujyate sa tasyārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6395: tadevamarthaprakaraṇādibhedabhinnamanyayānyayā ca śaktyopahitamanyadanyacca padamanyasyānyasya vācakamiti na padavyabhicāra' /
GSP28mimslovu:6396: artho 'pi codbhūtatatpadābhidhānayogyāvasthābhedabhinno hastādiranyo 'nyaśac karādipadānāṃ vācya iti na padaṃ vyabhicarati /
GSP28mimslovu:6400: nanvevamekriyānimittako niyama' śabdārthayo' sambandha ityucyamāne 'numānāṅgamavinābhāva evāśrito bhavet,
GSP28mimslovu:6401: atastadabalena dhūmādivāgnijñānaṃ śabdādarthajñānamupajāyamānamanumānaṃ syādata āha---na cāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:6412: sānaṅgaṃ tadvadeva syānneyaṃ dhūmādibhi' samā // Msv_5,9.18 //
GSP28mimslovu:6414: gamakatvena pūrvaṃ ca tatra notpadyate mati' // Msv_5,9.19 //
GSP28mimslovu:6416: yadaiva ceha sambandhaṃ vṛddhebhya' pratipādyate // Msv_5,9.20 //
GSP28mimslovu:6427: yathaivāvinanābhāva eva dhūmādau pratītyaṅgaṃ na taduttarakālabhāvi gamakatvam,
GSP28mimslovu:6431: tatra hi dhūmādau mahānasādideśe 'gnyavinābhāvanirūpaṇottarakālaṃ tatkṛtaivāsau gamakateti /
GSP28mimslovu:6432: api ca dhūme prathamaṃ gamakatvaṃ nāvagamyata ityāha -- gamakatveneti ||19||
GSP28mimslovu:6434: gamakatvenaiva śabde prathamaṃ vyutpattirityuktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti---kathayantītitrayeṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:6435: ayamartha'--- tredhā hi śabde vyutpatti', vṛddhopadeśāt tadavyavahārāt padāntarasamabhivyāhārādvā /
GSP28mimslovu:6437: tathāha--- vṛddhopadeśe tāvadayamasya vācya' ayamasya vācaka
GSP28mimslovu:6442: itthaṃ vācakatā siddhā saṅkīrṇāpi tata' param // Msv_5,9.24 //
GSP28mimslovu:6448: yatrāpi kvaciduccaritād vākyāt prayojyavṛddhasyārthāviṣayāṃ kriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā ceṣṭānumānena gavādyarthaboddhṛtvamupakalpyate tatrāpi yasmādata' śabdādanenāyamartho 'vagata',
GSP28mimslovu:6450_0: prasiddhapadāntarasamabhivyāhāre 'pi iha sahakāratarau madhuraṃ piko rautītyevamādau
GSP28mimslovu:6450_1: viditasahākarādādyartho 'viditapikādyarthaśca yo 'yaṃ sahakāratarau rauti tasya pikaśabdo
GSP28mimslovu:6450_2: gamaka iti gamakatvamevāvagacchatīti siddhaṃ sarvatra gamakatvaṃ na vyutpattiriti ||21-23 1/2 ||
GSP28mimslovu:6459: na ca tān pratyavacākā' śabdā iti yuktaṃ vaktum /
GSP28mimslovu:6471: tena tarhi kimarthaṃ vivañcate ata āha--balābalādīti /
GSP28mimslovu:6472: śāstrasthā hyanirūpitaśaktayo na śāstrārthamanuṣṭhātuṃ śaknuvantīti teṣāṃ hānopādānopayogī śabdaśaktiviveka iti te viviñcata iti ||26 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:6480: tatra ca sāmānyaviśeṣā' sāmānyaśabdasya svārthena kakṣyayāntaritā bhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:6481: yathā sacchabdasya sattāmācakṣāṇasya tadantaritā dravyatvādaya' sāmānyaviśeṣā',
GSP28mimslovu:6482: teṣu cāsau lakṣaṇābalena pravartamāno durbalo jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6483: svarthe tu śrutyā vartate iti sa tatra balavān /
GSP28mimslovu:6484: kā punariyaṃ lakṣaṇā nāma--- abhidheyavinābhāvena pratīti' /
GSP28mimslovu:6487: kriyā kiyadvābhidheyāvinābhāvena lakṣyate kiyat svamahimnā śabdenocyata iti śāstrasthānāmanuṣṭhānaviśeṣārthaṃ viveko yukta' /
GSP28mimslovu:6488: sā ca lakṣaṇā prāyeṇa nityasambandhād bhavatīti nityasambandhādityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:6495_0: ṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti brāhmaṇasāmānyasthā brāhmaṇaśrutirlakṣamayā
GSP28mimslovu:6495_1: tadviśeṣaṃ kauṇḍinyamavatarantī durbalā bhavati ityavyavahitaviśeṣasthayā kauṇḍinyaśrutyā bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6497: yaju' sāmānyasthā 'upāṃśuyajuṣā'iti śrutistadviśeṣasthayā 'uccairnigadena' iti śrutyā bādhyata ityevamādi darśayitavyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6498: sāmānyaśabdenātra viśeṣān viśiṃṣanna sāmānyatiriktā' kecana viśeṣā vidyanta iti darśayati /
GSP28mimslovu:6499: asati hi keṣāñcid darśanaṃ-- nityadravyavṛttayo 'ntyā viśeṣā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6500: te ca vyāvṛttibuddhereva hetutvād viśeṣā eveti /
GSP28mimslovu:6501: paramāṇukārayamakaṃ hi kāṇādā dvyaṇukādikrameṇa jagato nirmāṇamātiṣṭhante /
GSP28mimslovu:6503: ata' santi kecanāṇusamavāyino viśeṣā nāma ye tānitaretarato vyāvartayantīti saṅgirante /
GSP28mimslovu:6510: śiṃśapātvena śiṃśapā vṛkṣāntarebhya ityevamaṇūn yāvadiya viśeṣakathā vartayitavyā /
GSP28mimslovu:6514: pṛthaktvākhyo vā guṇasteṣāmanyonyasya viśeṣakatvād viśeṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:6517: akṣaṇe vā tadānantyam, ato manda evāyaṃ viśeṣāntarābhyupagama' /
GSP28mimslovu:6518: yoginastu tān paśyantīti śraddhadhānā budhyante vayamaśraddhadhānā' sma',
GSP28mimslovu:6519: ye yuktiṃ prārthayāmaha iti sūktaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣeṣviti ||27-28 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:6532: gośabdasya bahulaṃ prayogāt tadviśeṣeṣu ca śābaleyādiṣu asatsvapi bāhuleyādiṣu proya(gā?ga)
GSP28mimslovu:6533_0: darśanāt parasāmānye ca sattādau satyapi bhāvāntare 'prayogāt sāsnādibhi' sahaikāvayavirūpārthasamnabdhigotvamātrasya
GSP28mimslovu:6533_1: gośabdo vācaka ityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jñānaṃ janyate sāsnādyekārthasambandhīti cāvinābhāvinā
GSP28mimslovu:6534: ata' siddhaṃ gamyagamakabhāva eva śabdārthayo' sambandha' prathamamavagamyate na punaravinābhāva iti ||29-30 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:6537: na ca gamakaṃ saṃjñeti laukikā manyante,
GSP28mimslovu:6545: avinābhāvitā tu sambandhaniyama', na sambandha ityāha--- sambandheti /
GSP28mimslovu:6556: devadattādayo hi yadṛcchāśabdā yatraiva saṅketyate tameva pratīpādayanti /
GSP28mimslovu:6561: yadupāyāntarāpekṣaṃ tanna svarūpata' śaktam, devadattādipadamiva saṅketagrahaṇāpekṣamiti ||33||
GSP28mimslovu:6562_0: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'yadi pratyāyaka' śabda' prathamaśruta' kiṃ na pratyāyayati' iti
GSP28mimslovu:6562_1: paricodya 'sarvatra no darśanaṃ pramāṇam' ityādinā darśanabalena gṛhītaśaktika' pratyāyayatīti parihāra ukta',
GSP28mimslovu:6568: syādetat--- prakāśakā' pradīpādayo 'viditasambandhā api svārthaṃ prakāśayanto dṛśyante,
GSP28mimslovu:6576: api ca vrīhyādayo 'gṛgītasvarūpā api kāryamārabhanta eveti śabde taddharma' kiṃ nāropyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6579: kena vedamājñāpitaṃ jñāpakena svarūpagrahaṇamapekṣitavyaṃ na sambandhagrahaṇamiti,
GSP28mimslovu:6585: na hi tatkāṇaṃ loke vede vā kiñcidīdṛśam /
GSP28mimslovu:6588: bāhyāntaravibhāgena kvacit syād vā vivakṣayā // Msv_5,9.38 //
GSP28mimslovu:6590: kiṃ cakṣuṣā mamaitena dṛṣṭaṃ dīpena yanmayā // Msv_5,9.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:6591: kṣāyāmapi, darśanabalādeva hi liṅgaśabdādayo jñāpakaviśeṣā' sambandhagrahaṇamapekṣante /
GSP28mimslovu:6594: kārakāścakṣurādaya iti nānumanyāmahe, jñānakāraṇasyaiva jñāpakatvāt, tadetadāha---svarūpeti ||35||
GSP28mimslovu:6595: nanu ca sambandhagrahaṇāt prāgapyabhidhāne śabda' śakto na vā /
GSP28mimslovu:6602: yadi hyanugrāhakāpekṣā svaśaktiṃ vihanyāt sarvameva laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ karaṇaṃ karaṇatāṃ jahyāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6604: kiñca--- astu tāvaditikartavyatāpekṣā karaṇabhāvaṃ na vihantīti,
GSP28mimslovu:6608: ata āha--- bāhyāntareti bāhyamapi kvacid vivakṣāta' kārakapravṛtte' karaṇatayā vivakṣyata ityāha--- kvacitsyādveti ||38||
GSP28mimslovu:6615: gauravāt karaṇatvena mataṃ cet kena vāryate // Msv_5,9.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:6620: kintu kitaścittāratamyaviśeṣād bāhyameva pradīpaṃ karaṇatayā vivakṣatīti ||39||
GSP28mimslovu:6622: nityavṛttau nityaṃ tu kāryasiddhau āntarasya takṣuṣa' karaṇatvamavagamyata ityāha---nityavṛttāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:6626: ata' kathaṃ tadapekṣayā cakṣuṣa' karaṇatvaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---śarīreti /
GSP28mimslovu:6630_0: ātmamana' saṃyogo hi rasādijñānasādhāraṇo nāvyabhicāritayā rūpadarśanakāraṇamiti
GSP28mimslovu:6632: anena yattadāgamanyāyena sambandhagrahaṇameva kāraṇamāpadyetetyuktaṃ tadapi vivakṣāviśeṣavaśenāstviti darśitamiti ||42||
GSP28mimslovu:6633: aparamapi--- 'yathā cakṣurdraṣṭṭana bāhyena prakāśena vinā' ityādi parihārabhāṣyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:6640: ya' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' sa ceṣṭaśced dhruvaṃ kṛta' // Msv_5,9.45 //
GSP28mimslovu:6642: samaṃ nāstyanayo' kiñcit tenāsaṅgatatā svata' // Msv_5,9.46 //
GSP28mimslovu:6645: yadṛcchāśabdānāmapi jñānasāmarthyaṃ vidyamānameva niyogenābhivyajyata ityadhyāsavāde varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:6646: atra ca yathā cakṣuriti bhāṣye cakṣuṣa' karaṇatvamityatropapattimāha---prakāśaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6648: tadevamupapādita' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' kṛtakatvena bhāṣyakṛtākṣipta'--- 'yadi prathamaśruto na pratyāyayati kṛtakastarhi' iti,
GSP28mimslovu:6650: evaṃ cātra prayoga'--- ya' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' sa kṛtaka',
GSP28mimslovu:6653: aparamapi 'svabhāvato hyasbandhāvetau śabdārthau' ityādi bhāṣyaṃ, tasyābhiprāyamāha---bhinneti /
GSP28mimslovu:6654: ayamartha'--- yathā rajjusarpādiṣu bhinnadeśakālādhiṣṭhāneṣu kiñcid deśādi samaṃ nāsti,
GSP28mimslovu:6657: īdṛśī cātra prayogaracanāśabdārthau svabhāvato 'saṅgatau, asamadeśakālatvāt, rajjvādivat /
